Text: while the defense of three member of trump s camp meeting with russian last year ha taken more turn than a roller coaster one defense ha been constant it s a nothing burger while donald trump jr jared kushner and paul manafort did meet with russian to get dirt on hillary clinton the argument is that it doesn t matter because they didn t actually receive any dirtof course that argument gave u a whole host of botched bank robber and to catch a predator analogy basically saying that if you intend to commit a crime and you act upon it you have committed a crime whether or not you get the goodsno matter how flawed that defense is though it turn out it s not even true trump jr kushner and manafort were given some dirt on hillary clinton from near the bottom of an ap articleveselnitskaya brought with her a plastic folder with printedout document that detailed what she believed wa the flow of illicit fund to the democrat akhmetshin said veselnitskaya presented the content of the document to the trump associate and suggested that making the information public could help the campaign he said this could be a good issue to expose how the dnc is accepting bad money akhmetshin recalled her sayingtrump jr asked the attorney if she had sufficient evidence to back up her claim including whether she could demonstrate the flow of the money but veselnitskaya said the trump campaign would need to research it more after that trump jr lost interest according to akhmetshin they couldn t wait for the meeting to end he saidakhmetshin said he doe not know if veselnitskaya s document were provided by the russian government he said he think she left the material with the trump associate it wa unclear if she handed the document to anyone in the room or simply left them behind he saidso if the member of the trump campaign didn t take the information it wa only because they would have had to do some of their own legwork not only is this administration the most crooked in american history they are the most lazy they didn t just want some opposition research from the russian they appeared to want the russian to do all their work for themfeatured image via win mcnameegetty image
Title_Text: bombshell report show the russian meeting wa no nothing burger

Text: special prosecutor robert mueller is growing his team it appears the office of special counsel ha secured the service of greg andres a former justice department lawyer specializing in foreign bribery and fraud he began work on tuesday becoming the th lawyer on mueller s now allstar team bribery of course is a much easier charge to prove than intentional collusion and having a specialist may indicate mueller is exploring the possibility of taking down trump using whatever method are available to him and most effectiveit s easy to lose hope these day from sunup to sundown we are treated to some of the worst example of corruption greed and incompetence america ha ever known and it s all coming from an administration we know is illegitimate and without the kind of leak that helped derail the clinton campaign which must have overjoyed trump fan every time they happened there doesn t seem to be much news on just when we can expect some justice so don t be too disappointed when i tell you this is the way it should bethat s right in a proper investigation the public know almost nothing about the internal proceeding and it s with good reason because james comey flipped on the trump administration we forget that in the beginning he wa the guy giving traction to unfounded story about clinton s email if that had been a real case comey himself would have ruined it with his careless premature release it would have fallen apartmueller is too smart to be that reckless by limiting what the public know other than the occasional tidbit about a new person of interest an alternative angle at the president s financials or something new happening within his office mueller can rest assured that no improper access to evidence can spoil his casebelieve me when this all go down we want it to go down for goodin the meantime we can enjoy the fact that we now know mueller ha andres on the team by adding more hard hitter to the lineup we know that mueller is ready to go a long a it take to eradicate the kind of corruption that brought u the alliance of donald trump and vladimir putinfeatured image via alex wonggetty image
Title_Text: mueller brings in bribery specialist to crack open trumps russian piggy bank

Text: washington reuters  the prospect of japan and south korea obtaining nuclear weapon would be incredibly destabilizing the white house said on wednesday a day after leading republican presidential candidate donald trump said the two u ally should build such weapon to deter enemy mr trumps suggestion that somehow we should encourage our ally in south korea to develop nuclear weapon is directly contrary to a policy that the united state ha long pursued and that the international community ha long supported white house spokesman josh earnest told reporter at a daily briefing
Title_Text: trump idea of japan south korea with nuclear weapon is destabilizing white house

Text: washington reuters  the tax overhaul pushed by president donald trump and fellow republican is prompting a slew of attack ad by democrat and progressive group that say the legislation would lavish benefit on corporation and the rich while harming the middle class one ad launched on tuesday warns that the republican tax plan would leave maine resident lost in the wilderness a it pan through a dark deserted forest the television spot paid for by the group not one penny urge the states republican senator susan collins who is undecided on the plan and whose vote could help decide it fate in the senate not to lose her way another not one penny ad in nevada where republican senator dean heller face a tough reelection race next year say that the senate plan is a tax break for billionaire and wealthy corporation paid for by higher tax on every day nevadans republican are looking to pas tax legislation within the next few week group spending million on the ad are aiming to sway public opinion in the final stretch of debate over the legislation which would cut the corporate tax rate to percent from percent and reduce individual income tax rate liberal see criticism of the tax plan a a potent issue for the u congressional election when all house seat are up for reelection along with in the senate the house of representative passed it tax bill last week the senate plan to vote once lawmaker return to washington after this weeks u thanksgiving holiday republican are under pressure to deliver a tax bill to score their first major legislative achievement since taking control of the white house and both chamber of congress in january many democratic ad focus on republican thought to be vulnerable in the election others target republican such a collins in the senate where republican have a slim  majority and can afford to lose just two republican vote and still pas a tax bill with democrat united in opposition republican say their tax plan would provide acrosstheboard cut for both business and middleclass worker along with tax code simplification that would make it easier for individual taxpayer to file republican tax writer contend their plan would mean a typical family of four would see their tax bill drop by nearly percent but democrat say republican have used a a model a family with a specific set of tax circumstance and that other family at similar income level could end up paying more both the house and senate plan cut individual tax rate but eliminate popular deduction in the senate plan the tax rate cut for individual is temporary while the corporate rate cut is permanent the senate plan would repeal a key provision of the affordable care act that requires individual to pay a penalty if they do not have health insurance the nonpartisan joint committee on taxation ha estimated that the senate bill would beginning in lead to higher tax bill on average for household earning  to  annually by most taxpayer earning  or less annually would be paying more tax the jct said democratic advocacy group priority usa on tuesday increased to  million a taxrelated digital ad campaign targeting voter in house district where republican voted for the house bill it also plan ad in state represented by senate republican collins maine heller nevada john mccain arizona bob corker tennessee and lisa murkowski alaska the democratic congressional campaign committee is running digital ad in more than republicanheld house district the group save my care is running digital ad in the district of house republican who voted for the bill and in alaska arizona and maine republican and conservative group are running ad of their own the national republican congressional committee started running spot in multiple district last week promoting the tax bill america first policy a nonprofit run by former trump campaign adviser is spending  this week for spot on conservative radio program
Title_Text: democrat advocacy group launch blitz of ad attacking tax plan

Text: colombo reuters  sri lankan monk and hardline nationalist protester forced rohingya muslim asylum seeker to flee a united nation safe house in the capital colombo on tuesday police said the refugee who were arrested in april along with two suspected indian trafficker in a boat in sri lankan sea were taken into protective custody and then to a detention center outside colombo police spokesman ruwan gunasekara said a live telecast on the facebook page of sinhale jathika balamuluwa a hardline nationalist group showed the buddhist monk and some civilian storming the safe house chanting do not allow terrorist into this country the rohingya group fled myanmar in and lived in india a refugee for nearly five year before trying to migrate illegally a lawyer representing them told reuters a local court later handed them over to un human right council unhrc unhrc official were not immediately available for comment these rohingyans are a group of terrorist they have slaughtered our buddhist monk in myanmar akmeemana dayarathne a buddhist monk who led the protest told the gathering ten of thousand muslim rohingya have fled mostly buddhist myanmar since tension between majority buddhist and rohingya most of whom are denied citizenship ha simmered for decade in rakhine but it ha exploded several time over the past few year a old enmity and buddhist nationalism surfaced with the end of decade of harsh military rule about rohingyas have fled to bangladesh since october straining relation between the two neighbor who each see the stateless muslim minority a the other nation s problem
Title_Text: protester force rohingya refugee to flee sri lanka safe house

Text: nairobi reuters  in a heist reminiscent of a hollywood movie kenyan robber spent month tunneling into the bowel of a bank located opposite a police station and stole the equivalent of half a million dollar police said on tuesday police said they had arrested two men and one woman over the robbery but had not recovered the million kenyan shilling reported missing by staff at the branch of kenya commercial bank kcb on monday when they showed up to work we have not recovered the stolen money said simba willy subcounty police commander in the town of thika northeast of nairobi where the heist took place we suspect the robber hired one of the shop near the bank while digging their tunnel willy told reuters the robber were able to remove the earth during their monthslong excavation without arousing suspicion by concealing it in box the daily nation newspaper quoted local trader a saying the trader described the two young men who had rented the store a very hardworking and introvert kcb which is the region s biggest bank by asset confirmed the breakin on twitter but the kenyan have competition for the title of most ingenious robbery last month brazilian police foiled a plot to rob a sao paulo bank after discovering a metre underground tunnel kitted out with lighting and ventilation system
Title_Text: in moviestyle heist kenya robber tunnel into bank opposite police station

Text: the federal election commission ha issued a page report on trump s campaign that appears to contain a number of campaign finance violation in the form of excessive and prohibited contribution why doe this matter now that all is said and done from page of the fec s letter if you have received prohibited contribution you must make a refund cfr b the refund must be made within day of the treasurer becoming aware of the illegality of the contribution cfr b that notice is all over the initial letter before they get into each and every single donation that might be in violation of election lawamong the violation are anonymous contribution in excess of  contribution from unregistered organization contribution from prohibited corporation llcs and labor organization and contribution that exceed federal campaign finance limit all told trump s campaign appears to have received illegal donation from company and excessive donation from hundred of individual donorsnow a christina wilkie point out on twitter it s not unusual for the fec to send letter to campaign after the election is over that seek clarification on thing however wilkie also tweetedimportant note most campaign get a letter asking for clarification but they re usually around  page i ve never seen page httpstcovuocoxwtx christina wilkie christinawilkie january fec say trump campaign took illegal donation from more than llcs and corp clinton didn t have any of these httpstcooqjsudim pictwittercomeziuzsbih christina wilkie christinawilkie january like trump himself his campaign couldn t be bothered to actually figure out what the rule were and abide by them the money wa rolling in and they didn t really seem to care or if they did they were extremely sloppy about trying to stay within the law even after subtracting allowable donation from what s listed trump could owe well more than  million in refundsthe fec can take enforcement action against the trump campaign if they don t bring themselves into compliance including issuing refund check to everyone from whom they illegally accepted moneyfeatured image by spencer platt via getty image
Title_Text: fec find numerous election law violation in trump camp filing  could cost trump million

Text: bernie sander recently received a major shoutout from one of the most ignored bloc of primary voter in the united state hundred of people marched through the street of london on tuesday showing their support for the democratic candidate super tuesday marked the beginning of the democrat abroad global primary given the logistics of the global operation voter will have eight day to cast their vote with the primary concluding on march here is video footage of the londoner for bernie eventthese people will be doing more than just march for sander they plan on voting for him a well american expat make a small but very real impact in the democratic primary racespeaking to business insider uk former chair of democrat abroad uk bill bernard said it s a great occasion we had a similar turnout in when it wa hillary clinton versus obama the turnout wa enormous that year and today seems to be equaling that globally american who are living abroad will have delegate representing them at the democratic national convention in july first they will meet up for a global convention in berlin germany on may of those delegate are super delegate despite the medium s spin sander is doing very well for himself in the primary election the only loss for the campaign on super tuesday wa clinton s very narrow win in massachusetts that being said sander entered the race knowing he wa in for a long uphill battle against another candidate with global name recognition so for sander every delegate is crucialaccording to the london for bernie website sander is currently beating clinton globally that isn t surprising when you consider the fact that much of sander platform could be considered a list of thing the united state need to catch up to the rest of the developed world onhere is more video footage that show sander supporter chanting feel the bern featured image from video screenshot
Title_Text: hundred of londoner march to go vote for bernie sander video

Text: new york reuters  democrat hillary clintons lead over republican rival donald trump ha slipped by about five percentage point since midjune according to a reutersipsos poll released on tuesday bringing the race for the white house to within nine point the poll showed that percent of likely voter supported former secretary of state clinton while percent backed businessman trump that compare with percent support for clinton and percent for trump on june a date that marked her widest lead for the month trump ha focused much of his energy in recent day on the mass shooting in orlando florida by a usborn gunman pledging allegiance to islamic state militant group trump vowed to ban people from entering the united state from country with link to terrorism against america or it ally hardline national security proposal have help trump win increased support from voter in the past including after the shooting in san bernardino california and paris late last year clinton responded to the orlando attack by calling for increased intelligence gathering and air strike on islamic state force while warning against demonizing american muslim she ha also criticized trumps position on foreign policy and the economy saying a trump presidency would be a disaster the june  poll of likely voter ha a credibility interval a measure of accuracy of percentage point
Title_Text: clinton lead over trump narrow to nine point reutersipsos

Text: we all know by now that the biggest threat to the integrity of our vote is our very own president the democrat party and their operative lol russian are the least of our concern the u government is gearing up for an unprecedented effort to protect tuesday s presidential election from cyber attack u official told nbc news there are a lot of eye on this presidential election more than there normally would be a senior obama administration official saidcyber center at the department of homeland security the justice department and the fbi a well a the pentagon the cia and other intelligence agency will be on alert with extra staff hunting for any possible threat official saythe concern is so high intelligence official told nbc that for the first time hundred of military and intelligence cyber expert who work out of top secret facility including underground bunker will be monitoring intelligence about a u presidential election they will react to any threat to the federal government s communication and command system it s all hand on deck a senior intelligence official saidus official have accused russia of using cyber operation to meddle in the election hacking into democratic party account and leaking the material to embarrass the hillary clinton campaignamerican official are worried russia will use it cyber capability to try to disrupt the presidential election itself possibly by releasing fake document and creating bogus social medium account designed to spread misinformationon tuesday former nato commander admiral james stavridis told cnbc his concern about possible russian activity included a dump of false document and an attack on the u power grid there is maybe a one in three chance of this happening but it s not insignificant said stavridison friday the hacker known a guccifer which u official say is a front for russian intelligence tweeted a threat to monitor the u election from inside the system nbc
Title_Text: obama unleashes hundred of intelligence agent to protect elections from outside forceshacker known a guccifer  warns of threat from inside the system

Text: washington reuters  u president donald trump reluctantly signed into law a sweeping sanction bill against russia iran and north korea this week a u secretary of state rex tillerson and russian foreign minister sergei lavrov meet this weekend at a regional forum in manila here is a look at new russia sanction the law establishes a review process that allows congress to block any effort by trump to ease or lift sanction on russia lawmaker passed the bill to punish russia over it alleged interference in the u presidential election it annexation of ukraines crimea region and it involvement in syrias civil war trump or any u president must submit a report to the appropriate congressional committee describing the rationale behind any easing of sanction on russia and how it would affect u national security interest congress would have at least day to hold hearing and then vote on any proposed change if lawmaker back a joint resolution of disapproval the president would be barred from changing the sanction new sanction are introduced on entity doing business with russian military or intelligence agency company involved in russian offshore oil project and those participating in russian oil or gas pipeline construction within russia the bill target a wide range of russian industry which might further hurt russias economy already weakened by sanction imposed after the annexation of crimea the law also ramp up sanction against any entity involved in any cyber attack on behalf of the russian government or that is owned by or acting on behalf of any such entity the president is allowed to waive these sanction if he determines it is in the national security interest to do so subject to congressional review six executive order signed by president barack obama are codified which would prevent trump from using an executive order to revoke them the measure from  targeted russias financial service energy defense and other industry in retaliation for it annexation of crimea and incursion into ukraine a well a cyberattacks and election interference in the united state the law also requires an interagency report on senior foreign political figure and oligarch in russia their estimated net worth and source of income any indication of corruption and their connection to russian president vladimir putin
Title_Text: factbox what do the new u sanction on russia target

Text: istanbul reuters  turkish authority issued arrest warrant for people from a seized company over alleged link to the usbased cleric who ankara say orchestrated last year s attempted coup dogan news agency and other medium said on friday it said the police operation to seize the suspect who were manager partner and employee of the publishing group kaynak holding and related company wa focused on istanbul but spread across province kaynak holding wa seized by the state in over link to the movement of islamic preacher fethullah gulen who ha lived in selfimposed exile in pennsylvania since he ha denied involvement in the july abortive putsch hundred of firm like kaynak many of them smaller provincial business were seized by authority in a postcoup crackdown and are now run by governmentappointed administrator under the crackdown more than people have been jailed pending trial over alleged link to gulen while people have been sacked or suspended from job in the military public and private sector in a separate operation centered in ankara former employee from school owned by the gulen network were arrested on friday according to turkish medium the school were closed by a decree after the failed coup the government dismisses right group concern about the crackdown saying only such a purge could neutralize the threat represented by gulen s network which it say infiltrated institution such a the judiciary army and school
Title_Text: turkey order arrest of people over gulen link medium

Text: report from several source revealed on november that clinton campaign chief john podesta wa taking meeting with a group claiming it had discovered irregularity in several county of some of the state that trump wonapparently a group of prominent computer scientist and election lawyer met with podesta to express their belief that they found persuasive evidence that result in wisconsin michigan and pennsylvania may have been manipulated or hacked according to new york magazinein order to overturn the election these challenge would have to succeed in multiple county and multiple state all at the same time to swing the electoral college to clinton so it certainly seems like a desperate long shotit is such a long shot that even the left s favorite number guru nate silver essentially dismissed the effortto follow some very quick analysis which suggests the claim here of rigged result in wisconsin is probably b httpstcosylebnmq nate silver natesilver november
Title_Text: breaking hillary camp looking to challenge votesuspects irregularities in wi mi and pa

Text: it turn out that there are a few new reason for wisconsin to proceed with their recount and they have nothing to do with jill stein s recount petition yes she filed the petition and yes she paid the fee but the state needed to do this even without stein s request a new analysis in the washington post discovered significant voting anomaly in several wardstrump now lead hillary by just over vote in wisconsin the wapo analysis didn t look at precinct or county they looked at ward which are the smallest unit where vote are counted this helped create a more detailed picture of what s happening therewalter mebane an associate researcher at the center for political study and a professor of political science and statistic at the university of michigan looked at small ward that used optical scanning technology and found that certain feature in the vote tabulation reveal the possibility that these count were tampered withfor instance using a method called last digit diagnostics mebane found that the tabulation he looked at should have last digit that when averaged together show a mean of around lower could mean that the count were manipulatedin the small ward he looked at where optical scanning tech wa used the last digit diagnostics reveal a mean average much lower than another statistic mebane looked at wa how often the last digit of a vote tabulation wa zero or five if there are no problem then the mean average of that variable should be around larger could mean someone wa sloppy and smaller could mean vote were manipulatedin these small ward that number wa significantly smaller than for hillary meaning that the vote count show a last digit of zero or five far less often than they shouldhe also found evidence of something called signaling in the tabulation which is when fraudsters leave a type of trail that more or less claim credit for the fraud mebane point out that this is actually a fairly common tactic amongst fraudsters in russiafinally a simple test revealed something called multimodality which could show that someone wa receiving fraudulent vote these small ward exhibited that anomaly toonone of this is absolute proof of election fraud or vote fraud in wisconsin and mebane is careful to note that however it give credence to the need for a recount whatever jill stein s motivation are if nothing else conducting a thorough recount will lend further legitimacy to our democratic process or concretely reveal problem that need to be fixed it might also serve to weaken trump s effort to undermine our democracy by repeatedly cry fraud fraud everywhere the recount begin todayfeatured image by darren hauck via getty image
Title_Text: new analysis find significant voting anomaly in wisconsin  recount to begin today

Text: washington reuters  white house spokesman sean spicer declined on wednesday to say whether president donald trump ha decided to withdraw from the paris accord to fight climate change despite report indicating that he would pull out of the global deal asked whether trump planned to remove the united state from the paris accord or remain in spicer said when the president ha a decision hell make that announcement and hell make it clear what the basis of that is asked if that meant trump had not made a final decision spicer said i obviously dont know whether or not hes made it but when hes ready to make an announcement hell make it clear
Title_Text: white house decline to say if trump ha made decision on climate accord

Text: this is a perfect example of big government gluttony and waste we should start here with cut to the budget sitting at home collecting a paycheck the government employee is all too happy to just say whatever while hard working american are working month of the year to pay tax dozen of employee at the gigantic agency created after to prevent another terrorist attack have been on paid administrative leave for more than a year many of them for a long a two and three yearsit s part of a pervasive problem among the nation s federal government agency where it s a common practice to let employee collect their taxpayerfunded check during investigation for wrongdoing and a series of other personal issue sometimes internal probe drag on with seemingly no end in sight but that doesn t stop the compensation for those sitting at home paid administrative leave is supposed to be reserved for rare circumstance in which employee may pose a threat to themselves or others result in loss of or damage to government property or otherwise jeopardize legitimate government intereststhe reality is much different and the department of homeland security dhs is a recent example though there are countless others across the government dhs spent about  million last year to keep employee on paid leave and many of them have been collecting their government pay without working for longer stretch four dhs employee were on paid administrative leave for three year or more and for two year or more of the face misconduct charge have security clearance problem and dhs had question about the fitness for duty of the chairman of the senate judiciary committee iowa republican charles grassley made the figure public this week and is demanding answer government employee getting paid to stay home sometimes for more than a year is detrimental to taxpayer and good government grassley say this week the senator fired off a letter to dhs secretary jeh johnson with a detailed list of question involving the circumstance surrounding the paid leave of his employeesthis is part of a broader and quite serious issue among government agency in fact last year a federal audit revealed that the u spent an eyepopping  billion during a threeyear period on salary for government employee on paid administrative leave at least worker were on paid administrative leave during the period analyzed and around stayed home with full salary for three month to a year according to the probe which wa conducted by the government accountability office gao the investigative arm of congress the scary part is that this particular audit only considered five agency so the gao s report only feature a snippet of the true problemhere are some of the reason that the five investigated agency the department of defense interior veteran affair general service administration and the u agency for international development granted administrative paid leave investigation for alleged misconduct security threat criminal conduct or adverse action donating blood dismissal due to hazardous weather or emergency condition physical examination to determine fitness for duty and voting attending conference convention or meeting and performing task necessary for change of duty station are also covered under administrative paid leavebesides the typical incompetence of a bloated government part of the problem is that there is no uniform policy for paid leave and instead each agency just make their own the office of personnel management opm the agency that manages the government s civil service is evidently trying to correct this by implementing a governmentwide policy earlier this year opm director katherine archuleta sent agency head a memo to inform them that opm will begin collecting information from payroll provider to initiate the collaboration process presumably to crack down on paid administrative leavevia judicial watch
Title_Text: dhs spends million to keep employee on paid leave for up to three year

Text: washington reuters  a president barack obama unveiled his supreme court nominee on wednesday a carefully crafted operation to sell his choice to american and to resistant republican rolled into action liberal group announced a national campaign to target republican senate opponent with demonstration and television ad in what is likely to be one of the most bitter fight ever over a supreme court nomination the white house ha enlisted legal scholar and corporate executive to make the case for centrist judge merrick garland despite resistance from senate republican leader mitch mcconnell and other senior republican who have said obama should let the next president fill the position garland himself an appealscourt judge immediately started making call to capitol hill signaling the start of a battle for public perception a obama seek to highlight what democrat characterize a unprecedented obstructionism the pressure may not be enough to convince republican to give garland a hearing let alone a confirmation vote but the white house is betting that since many republican face tough reelection battle they may be less willing to reject garland out of hand the white house ha enlisted former white house official stephanie cutter and katie beirne fallon to mobilize liberal group which see the fight a a historic chance to push the supreme court to the left a well a mobilize their supporter ahead of the election were going to organize in record numbers said mary kay henry president of the service employee international union which plan rally outside the office of republican senator in pennsylvania ohio illinois wisconsin and new hampshire starting next week republican likely wont be swayed by such message but voter may be said michael gottlieb a lawyer at washington firm boy schiller flexner who wa involved with the last four supreme court nomination what move the needle is if your average person an independent voter or a moderate republican see inaction on a nominee a the senate not doing it job gottlieb said some percent of american believe obama should name a replacement for the vacant seat while percent say he should not according to reutersipsos polling event planned by a slew of democratlinked group will feature working american telling senate republican to do their jobs according to a former white house official who is involved in the effort social medium will play a big part a petition under the twitter tag doyoujob ha already collected million signature a central target is republican senator charles grassley of iowa who ha said any obama nominee would not get a hearing before his judiciary committee facing a tough democratic challenger and pressure from liberal activist grassley talked with garland by phone on wednesday and held out the possibility of a meeting democratic aide say they aim to pressure grassley into holding a hearing whether he doe or not they see grassley in the meantime struggling to justify his current hardline position which they think could help his democratic opponent in november former lieutenant governor patty judge reelection worry republican senator facing reelection in new hampshire illinois and ohio have said they are willing to meet with garland democrat view those seat a among the most promising target in their effort to win back control of the seat body some seat are up for grab in the senate where republican have a  seat majority democrat say the fight could make senate race in missouri and north carolina competitive a well though independent analyst say they still face an uphill climb with the election still seven month away it will be tough to keep the issue at the forefront of voters minds said nathan gonzales who track election for the rothenberg gonzales political report despite the political overtone obama opted to pick a relatively uncontroversial candidate garland the top judge on the u court of appeal for the district of columbia is viewed a a centrist who is not ideologically driven some conservative group say garlands past ruling indicate that he would push the court to the left on gun right government regulation and other key issue but others plan to keep the focus on obama not his nominee if you start eviscerating him in the public sphere youre going to create sympathy and the white house will use that said jason pye a spokesman for libertarian group freedomworks member of the network have sent more than email urging republican senator to stick to their position he said the white house said it had enlisted legal scholar corporate lawyer and environmental executive in a letterwriting campaign urging republican senator to act some on the left say they may have a hard time rallying their member behind a centrist yearold white male candidate we have to go where grassroots energy is we cant just manufacture it out of thin air said neil sroka a spokesman for democracy for action a network of million progressive activist
Title_Text: attack ad protest and phone call selling the supreme court nominee

Text: sydney reuters  north korea ha sent a letter to australia s parliament warning it is a nuclear power and will not be cowed by u president donald trump s threat to destroy it according to a copy of the letter published in an australian newspaper on friday if trump think that he would bring the dprk a nuclear power to it knee through nuclear war threat it will be a big miscalculation and an expression of ignorance said a facsimile of the letter published by the sydney morning herald and verified by australia s foreign ministry trump threatened to totally destroy the dprk it is an extreme act of threatening to totally destroy the whole world a spokeswoman for australia s foreign minister told reuters the herald report wa accurate and the paper s copy of the letter dated sept wa genuine titled open letter to parliament of different country the note said it wa sent from north korea s embassy in jakarta indonesia to australia s embassy in the same city a well a to other country without naming them dprk stand for the democratic people s republic of korea north korea s official name tension ha soared on the peninsula following a series of weapon test by north korea and a string of increasingly bellicose exchange between trump and north korean leader kim jong un trump in a speech last month at the united nation threatened to totally destroy north korea if necessary to defend itself and ally and called the north s leader kim jong un a rocket man on a suicide mission the letter call for country loving independence peace and justice to discharge their duty and keep sharp vigilance against the heinous and reckless move of the trump administration trying to drive the world into a horrible nuclear disaster at a press conference in sydney australian foreign minister julie bishop said the note wa an unprecedented communication it is not the way they usually publish their global message the collective strategy of imposing maximum diplomatic and economic pressure through sanction on north korea is working this is a response to the pressure
Title_Text: north korea warns threat a big miscalculation in letter to australia lawmaker

Text: panmunjom korean demilitarized zone reuters  u defense secretary jim mattis peered across south korea s heavily fortified border with the north on friday saying america s goal wa not to wage war with pyongyang but to convince leader kim jong un to give up his nuclear arsenal north korean provocation continue to threaten regional and global security despite unanimous condemnation by the united nation security council mattis said in prepared remark a he visited the demilitarized zone dmz dividing the peninsula a secretary of state tillerson ha made clear our goal is not war but rather the complete verifiable and irreversible denuclearization of the korean peninsula
Title_Text: trump defense chief at dmz our goal is not war

Text: new york reuters  myanmar national security adviser thaung tun told reuters on monday that rohingya muslim who had fled to neighboring bangladesh to escape violence in rakhine state would be able to return but the process would have to be discussed we will make sure that everybody who left their home can return to their home but this is a process we have to discus he said after a ministerial meeting on the crisis hosted by british foreign secretary boris johnson on the sideline of the un general assembly we want to make sure that everybody who need humanitarian assistance get it without discrimination that is one of the thing we agreed on tun said
Title_Text: myanmar adviser rohingya can return but process to be discussed

Text: reuters  republican in the u house of representative have unveiled a plan to replace obamacare known formally a the affordable care act stripping away much of president barack obamas signature domestic policy achievement that insured million american president donald trump and his republican had vowed for year to dismantle the law it wa a central campaign issue in the house of representative way and mean committee approved the bill along party line early thursday after nearly hour of debate the house energy and commerce committee wa still debating the bill thursday after an allnight session where democrat fought the measure and used numerous tactic to delay a vote the bill could still change substantially a it make it way through committee here are it main provision the republican want to eliminate next year obamacares incomebased tax credit that help lowincome people purchase individual insurance these would be replaced with tax credit ranging from  to  per year that would be capped at upper income level while obamacares credit provided more assistance to those with lower income those in the republican plan would be largely based on age the republican bill would abolish most obamacare tax including tax on medical device health insurance premium tanning salon and prescription medication it would also delay a tax on highcost employerprovided insurance known a cadillac plan until those tax paid for obamacare republican have not said how they would pay for the part of the law they want to keep the bill also repeal the obamacare financial penalty for the tax year for not purchasing insurance a well a a surtax on investment income earned by upperincome american and it repeal the mandate that larger employer must offer insurance to their employee under obamacare more than state including several republican state made the medicaid government health insurance more accessible to the poor about half of obamacare enrollee obtained insurance through the expansion the bill would allow the medicaid expansion to continue until january providing state that chose not to expand under obamacare a window to enroll more people after that date the expansion would end and medicaid funding would be capped on a perperson basis state that did not expand medicaid would receive additional fund through a number of change including the reinstatement of disproportionate share hospital payment money that is provided to hospital that serve a large number of medicaid and uninsured people state medicaid plan would no longer have to cover the same essential health benefit that health insurer on obamacares exchange must provide that fulfills a republican promise to return more control to the state a they can decide what their medicaid plan must cover the republican plan would maintain some of obamacares most popular provision it would allow young people to stay on their parents health plan until age ban insurer from discriminating against those with preexisting condition and ban insurer from setting a lifetime dollar limit on coverage but the bill would allow insurer to mark up premium by percent for those who have a lapse in insurance coverage of about two month or more insurer won another provision they had long sought the ability to charge older american up to five time more than young people under obamacare they could only charge up to three time more it would also allow state to set their own ratio the measure also provides state with  billion to create program for patient population including highrisk pool to provide insurance to the sickest patient the bill would also revoke federal funding for planned parenthood for one year
Title_Text: factbox republican obamacare plan would repeal medicaid expansion tax

Text: the house select committee on benghazi which wa actually just an attempt to smear hillary clinton all over the sidewalk ha pretty much concluded and they found exactly nothing republican should is likewise wheeling around on gowdy the american people want to know from a group that spent almost two year on it what the conclusion are that s what we pay you for mr gowdy but perhaps the silliest most ridiculous moment came when a woman from the crowd at that meeting asked a truly outthere question ha someone in the gop leadership gotten their finger involved in watering down some of this to slander and that the obama administration switched side in the war on terrorand since gowdy couldn t deliver what they wanted in an official report he s now solely to blame for the failure of what wa supposed to be the investigation that would finally prove hillary guilty this is absolutely hilariousgowdy s career will probably end in disgrace it s hard to feel sorry for him though he did everything he could no matter how dishonest or unethical it wa to help the gop bury hillaryfeatured image by mark wilsongetty image
Title_Text: angry that benghazi panel couldnt bury hillary rightwing nut hilariously turn on trey gowdy

Text: st century wire say here s something quite pavlovian to think about what if it were a goal of government and their security service to ensure that we feel we re being watched at every turn in everyway feasible but reality is not exact what we think it is and we re doing most of the censoring all by ourselvesadam garrie from the duran take u on an interesting journey in the below article it also contains an important element of what we ve talked about on show at st century wire and alternate current radio s the boiler room regarding this fourth wall that people find it difficult to push through which is fear the fear of losing their job loved one social acceptability and so forthmore on this article from the duran adam garrie the duraneven prior to the release of vault from wikileaks people knew that socalled intelligence agency in western state had the mean to spy on their own citizen many also assumed that the typical illegality of such activity wa of no consequence for agency and individual in those agency who regard themselves a being above the lawnow that we know the cia and other institution have such ability to digitally hack just about every household device from the smart phone and smarttv to the good old fashioned pc the biggest question is when do these deep state organisation implement these measure to spy on civilian and compromise their livesthe answer can be found without needing to resort to conspiracy theory nor even speculation the answer lie in the private sectororganisations like the cia mi fbi etc need only do what the private sector isn t all ready doing for them and a it is the private sector is doing a hell of a lotif one wonder why major financial academic diplomatic trading banking security and even artistic institution in the west tend to have people on their payroll who follow the western ideological narrative there are two reasonsthe first is that people are attracted to likeminded people and by extrapolation likeminded professionsbut there is a second more devious reason those who think outside the western box those who question more simply cannot get a foot through the door technically one needn t have any view on vladimir putin to be on the board of a major western construction company law firm private bank or hedge fund these profession do not involve knowledge of russian politics or society but those who have and even casually express a view of putin or of the arab world or of east asia and latin america that differs from the neolibneocon point of view are blacklistedsocial medium ha made this blacklisting easier to do than ever if two equally qualified candidate were applying for a high level position at a financial institution and one person had a picture of himself at a hillary clinton fundraiser on his facebook and the other had a save palestine picture or a proputin meme on his social medium account there would be no prize for correctly guessing who would almost certainly get the jobin the word of george carlin it s a big club and you ain t in it the punitive blacklisting of those who don t follow the cnnbbcnyt script ha a double effectfirst of all it keep those who think outside the box away from position of power in the private sector and in most western country without a prominent position in the business or mainstream entertainment community achieving political office is next to impossiblesecondly there is a powerful deterrent effect many people would like to post proputin prodonbass prosyria or propalestine item on social medium but they are afraid that it could cost them their job their bonus or even their friend in the west such thing can breakup family it happens every day at this very movement someone in a western country is contemplating suicide because of being on the losing end of a divorce settlement very sad yet very truethis kafkaesque reality is achieved without the cia needing to hack people s phone or computer the private sector doe the job for themfor every tabloid story about a woman losing her job because she posted a photo of her genitals online there are many more people who are professionally compromised for posting photo of patriotic russian or arab leadersthroughout the th century the private sector ha always been happy to do the bidding of the deep state hollywood wa largely compliant with the red scare tactic of the s and frankly hollywood producer did more to censor freespeech than the drunk and soon discredited joseph mccarthy ever could have donewhy should the cia waste time and money to read people s email when their much more local bos or chairman of human relation can take a quick look at facebook and achieve the cia s goal far more easilythe answer is that they don t the beauty of a police state is that unquestioning citizen are deputy of the secret police and they work for free some do it willfully and others do it unconsciously but they do it nevertheless continue this article at the duranread more wikileaks news at st century wire wikileaks filessupport our work by subscribing becoming a member wiretv
Title_Text: the cia doesnt need to spy on free thinker the private sector doe it for free

Text: washington reuters  eight republican candidate have qualified for the primetime fox newsgoogle debate on thursday with donald trump winning the centerstage spot a the toppolling candidate fox news announced on tuesday but trump said on tuesday he likely will not attend the debate this will be the last one before the iowa caucus on monday marking the first contest in the nomination race for the nov presidential election trump ha been engaged in a public spat with fox news that began at a debate last august in which he said he wa subject to unfair questioning by moderator megyn kelly lets see how much money fox make without me in the debate trump told the news conference in marshalltown iowa senator rand paul of kentucky who failed to qualify for the main event in the last debate made the cut this time the other participant in the pm est debate will be texas senator ted cruz florida senator marco rubio retired neurosurgeon ben carson new jersey governor chris christie former florida governor jeb bush and ohio governor john kasich former hewlettpackard chief executive carly fiorina former arkansas governor mike huckabee former pennsylvania senator rick santorum and former virginia governor jim gilmore qualified for the pm est debate for lowpolling candidate after failing to qualify for a primetime debate held earlier this month paul declined to participate in the socalled undercard debate reporting by eric beech editing by eric walsh sap is the sponsor of this coverage which is independently produced by the staff of reuters news agency

Text: within hillary clinton s stump speech she describes a working class upbringing where her dad toiled away making drapery you d think it wa a true working class environment for little hillary rodham but it wasn t her upbringing wa actually more upper middle class than working class this is really what we ve come to expect from hillary clinton many of her other recollection have been proven false in fact it s been so many that we can t begin to name them all this make you wonder if she even realizes that people in this day and age can fact check pretty easily check out the video at the bottom of this article where she describes her struggle in speech on the campaign trail hillary clinton ha portrayed her upbringing a working class she talk about how her father eked out a living making drapery to support his family a nice story but a check of the fact prof otherwise hillary clinton s childhood home is proof she is misleading her supporter about her beginning in truth her family wa uppermiddle class at worst and their wealth gave hillary a good life and an opportunity to attend yale universitylocated at n wisner st in the affluent chicago suburb of park ridge the clinton childhood home is a beautiful twostory house that her father paid for in full in cash he wa the owner of a successful drapery business and did quite wellclinton wa able to attend wellesley college a private woman s college in massachusetts she then went on to yale which of course all kid from working class family do it wa at yale that hillary met bill clinton hillary wa raised a conservative republican but wa radicalized in college and became a democratit should be noted that a childhood friend that went to high school with clinton recall that she ran for student council president once she wanted to be the first female student council president in her school s history she lostlisten to hillary tell of her struggle via silence is consent
Title_Text: hillarys working class upbringing isnt so working classanother lie from lyin hillary

Text: the democrat have been in washington dc only because of the negro vote you put them first and they put you last because you re a chump a political chump malcolm xif malcolm x were alive today how would he feel about our first black president how would he feel about obama encouraging million of illegal alien and refugee to come to america and take the job of million of unemployed american struggling to find work the truth of the matter is obama will go down a the worst president in history for black in america while we definitely don t agree with some of the position malcolm x took we do agree that the democrat have been selling the black community a bill of good for decade perhaps it s time to get off the democrat plantation and vote for a candidate who genuinely want to put every unemployed black citizen back to work perhaps it time for someone with no political tie to come in and clean obama s corrupted house larry elder had a fascinating column discussing malcolm x and how he really felt about the democratic party and black people who voted in lockstep with this party he even go on to show how the democrat have continued to destroy almost every aspect of the black family and how their policy are exactly against what malcolm x had been advocatingback in the black community gave percent of their vote to the democratic party a a result of this malcolm x called them political chump why because the black community had been betrayed by the democrat the white vote wa so close that they always need to go back and recount which mean that if black people were to stick together they have the power of determining who is ultimately elected still the democrat failed to deliver on a promised civil right bill because they correctly anticipated that they could still count on the black vote and their blind support in the next electionhttpsyoutubebyvvlykqstrong word indeed but it also begs the question of what would malcolm x think about the situation today today it is even worse with about to percent of the black vote being in lockstep with the democratic party yet the democrat have not kept their promise of family stability education and job creationover the last year the black community and it family unity ha been completely destroyed even when slavery prevented marriage a black child wa more likely to be raised in a home with their biological mother and father than today according to economist walter williams during the period of  a black child wa slightly more likely to grow up with married parent than a white childback in percent of black baby were born to unmarried mother then the war on poverty began and today this number is up to percent interesting to see that the more money we supposedly threw at helping the black family the worse thing have become plus it ha not helped to reduce the rate of poverty either since the government ha spent nearly  trillion fighting poverty when this started the poverty rate wa percent after this spending started the rate began to flat line it had been consistently going down since before this because people learned that they could marry the government and that men could abandon their financial and moral responsibilitymalcolm x wa also fond of pointing out how he learned from a good library wonder how he would feel today about the democratic opposition to school voucher allowing money to follow the student rather than the school urban school with predominantly black student have unquestionably failed they continue churning out kid who cannot read write and compute the drop out rate approach percent in some district teacher even send their own kid to private schoolsplus there is percent black unemployment thanks to our wonderful community organizer in chief heck emanuel cleaver dem mo former chair of the congressional black caucus ha admitted that if this had happened under a white president there would be hell to pay but obama know that black are going to show him more slack since he black himselfall of this is interesting to think about it show u just exactly what the democrat really think of the black community they have never been about actually doing something to help and improve the life of their constituent rather they are only focused on increasing their power starting with kennedy and lbj the whole idea wa to trap the black vote in a cycle of dependence so that they would need to rely on the government for everything downtrend
Title_Text: flashback malcolm x on black who keep voting for democrat who lie to them youre not only a chump but youre a traitor to your race

Text: michigan s governor rick snyder is desperately trying to retain some credibility by increasing his presence in the medium it isn t working all he is doing is proving to the world that he is a much a scumbag a the world think he isin an interview with fox snyder said that he would let his grandchild be bathed in flint michigan during the interview charlie leduff asks rick snyder would you have your grandchild bathe daily in that water coming out of those pipe now yeah because again that s the advice i ve gotten snyder say i wouldn t let my child chew on a chinese made toy i don t think i d let my child a just a person a rational person that doesn t know that much bathe in water what we know there s high level of lead leduff responds you would let your grandchild bathe in that snyder then try to squirm his way out of the gaffe he just made by giving this poor explanation for his claim we don t know that there s necessarily high level of lead in every bath tub but again there could be this risk but we ve been told by the expert by itself you just don t leave them by themselves you need to monitor that to make sure they don t drink the water here s the interviewit really sounded like snyder wa trying to make the contamination of flint s water sound safer than it is didn t it that s really weird because just hour earlier snyder went on cbs for an interview where he said that they don t want people to assume that the water in flint is safer than it isduring that interview snyder wa again completely hammered for his utter incompetence snyder failed to answer even basic question about what people desperately want to knowthe interviewer scott pelley asks snyder governor is the water in flint safe today snyder responds saying we don t want to consider it safe scott i think we ve seen progress in term of improvement in the water testing but until it s been thoroughly tested including thirdparty verification we want people to assume that they should be using filter or bottled water a an interim measure pelley press snyder so fair to say you don t know what the lead content is in the water snyder responds saying well again we don t want people to believe it s safe extensive testing is going on ha been going on for some time at that point pelley seems to have had enough of snyder s evasiveness he grill snyder saying i don t understand why you can t give u the latest testing data and what it show for the water in flint what is the number snyder still trying to down play his incompetence say i don t have the number at the top of my head of the very latest data and it varies by part of the city to this pelley eviscerates snyder saying i would think that the governor of michigan would have those number at the top of his mind right now you can watch the interview belowfeatured image credit video screenshot via fox
Title_Text: watch the medium give mis gov rick snyder the tongue lashing he deserves video

Text: on april los angeles county superior court judge halim dhanidina overturned the conviction of rory moroney a gay man arrested by an undercover long beach police officer in october in overturning moroney s conviction the judge confirmed what lgbtq advocate have been saying for year that gay men are routinely targeted by member of the long beach vice squadthe judge agreed with moroney s attorney who sought to have their client s conviction on charge of lewd conduct and indecent exposure thrown out citing the discriminatory nature of long beach lewd conduct sting during the sting male officer are sent out into the community to specifically target gay menin moroney s case an undercover officer made gesture toward him in a public restroom moroney wa arrested after responding to what he presumed to be sexual advance on the part of the officer by exposing himselfdhanidina found that the presence and tactic of the decoy officer actually caused the crime to occur the judge also found that long beach s vice tactic are discriminatory because the squad us only male officer a undercover decoy in lewd conduct sting he went on to say that the police department intentionally targeted men who engaged in homosexual sex during the stingswhile the police department claimed that the sting were only done in response to citizen lewd conduct complaint the judge shut down that argument after they failed to show evidence of citizen complaininglgbtq activist and civil right attorney have long criticized the tactic used by police to arrest gay menjim key a spokesman for the los angeles lgbt center told the los angeles time that police who use these tactic aren t saving life they re destroying them by branding innocent men a sex offender john duran west hollywood councilman and expert witness said the lewd conduct sting came out of the era when homosexuality wa criminal calling them a leftover from the last century while the judge s decision is a step forward both for moroney and others who have been entrapped by long beach police these same tactic are unfortunately used to persecute gay men all across the countrylast year police in baton rouge louisiana finally apologized for destroying hundred of life after they entrapped and arrested gay men using a ban on sodomy struck down by the supreme court almost year agowatch video from the young turk which talk about how police targeted and trapped the victim of these false arrestsjust a we have a long way to go in the u to eliminate institutional racism we still have a long way to go to eliminate institutional homophobia which includes a multitude of tactic used by police and lawmaker to profile target entrap criminalize and imprison member of lgbtq communityphoto by ulrich baumgarten via getty image
Title_Text: long beach police have discriminatory policy targeting gay men judge say video

Text: washington reuters  the senate passed legislation on tuesday that would revamp federal chemical safety protection for the first time in decade sending it to president barack obama for his expected signing into law the senate approved the measure that wa overwhelmingly passed by the house of representative on may the bill would update the toxic substance control act amid complaint that it yearold provision hobble the u environmental protection agency from effectively regulating chemical including those ranging from asbestos and flame retardant to everyday household product no one dispute that this bill transfer power from the state to the federal government republican senator rand paul of kentucky complained during debate of the bill he said it would add hundred of new regulation that will burden the u chemical industry and hurt job the epa under the bill would have to consider the impact of a chemical on human health and the environment a well a the chemicals benefit and the economic impact of regulation
Title_Text: congress approves bill updating chemical safety oversight

Text: washington reuters  a group of former u national security official including some who have worked for top republican called donald trumps recent comment about nato russias annexation of crimea and other matter disgraceful in a letter released on thursday in the last month the republican presidential nominee ha suggested he might not defend nato ally if they did not spend more on defense appeared to invite russia to hack the email of democratic opponent hillary clinton and suggested he might accept russias annexation of crimea from ukraine these are disgraceful statement that betray our longstanding value and national interest embraced by president of both parties said the open letter first reported by the washington post most of the who signed the letter appear to be democrat including madeleine albright and leon panetta respectively former secretary of state and defense but others served under republican president and lawmaker among these john bellinger wa state department legal adviser for former secretary of state condoleezza rice and randy scheunemann a neoconservative political operative wa foreign policy advisor to republican john mccains presidential campaign other signatory included former career diplomat tom pickering bill burn nicholas burn and marc grossman all of whom served a undersecretary of state for political affair effectively the thirdranking u diplomat the letter is the latest in a series from former national security official dismayed at the thought of a trump presidency in march more than republican foreign policy veteran including former deputy secretary of state robert zoellick signed a letter pledging to oppose trump and saying his proposal would undermine u security
Title_Text: former u security official call trump comment disgraceful

Text: washington reuters  president donald trumps choice for deputy secretary of commerce todd ricketts ha withdrawn his nomination a source close to ricketts said on wednesday ricketts a coowner of the chicago cub baseball team pulled his name from consideration due to difficulty untangling his financial holding to the satisfaction of the government ethic watchdog the chicago suntimes reported i hope there are other opportunity to contribute to his administration in the future ricketts said in a statement
Title_Text: trump pick for no at commerce dept withdraws name source

Text: here we go again we just reported on a man who wa caught in walmart videotaping woman and using a mirror to look into stallsit begin man dressed a woman arrested in woman s bathroom you won t believe what he wa doingthis guy wa caught at macy s with a video camera in his purse containing hour of video of woman using the bathroom woman noticed the camera light from the video camera and reported it to police this guy is just one of so many we ve reported on who will have even more right to enter the woman s bathroom or locker room and woman will have no right to say a word a palmdale california man wearing woman s clothing wa arrested in a lancaster macy s store after he wa seen in a woman s bathroom the man wa allegedly videotaping woman in the bathroomjason pomare wa arrested over the weekend after mall security officer learned he had been hanging out in a macy s department store woman s bathroom the security guard contacted a los angeles county sheriff s department lasd deputy who found the crossdressing man in a mall storage area nbc los angeles reportedwhen pomare wa contacted he wa wearing a wig and woman s clothing including a bra a statement from the lasd revealed the deputy noticed he wa wearing a wig and appeared to have breast lasd sergeant brian hudson told the los angeles news outletwhile searching the suspect the deputy discovered a video camera in his purse the camera allegedly contained hour of woman using the bathroom inside the storewitnesses told police that pomare would conceal the camera in bathroom stall the woman who contacted store security noticed the recording light on the camera it appears pomare wa in the bathroom for around two hour hudson told the reporterread more breitbart

Text: singapore reuters  a singapore mass transit train bumped into another at a station on wednesday injuring people authority said the latest mishap on the transit system in a citystate that ha long prided itself on it efficient public service transit operator smrt said passenger and two staff suffered light to moderate injury and had been taken to hospital it s an awful day transport minister khaw boon wan said commuter were inconvenienced and some even injured we are deeply sorry for that khaw wa quoted by the strait time newspaper a telling a news conference densely populated singapore is highly dependent on public transport it is one of the world s most expensive place to own a vehicle and it recently announced that it would not allow any net growth in it car number from february next year the accident happened at am gmt smrt said in a statement a faulty westbound train had stalled at joo koon station on the system s eastwest line two minute earlier it said a second train stopped behind the faulty train but moved forward unexpectedly a minute later coming into contact with the stationary train a software glitch in the signaling system wa the cause of wednesday s accident the transit authority later said a photograph posted on the strait time website showed two train stopped and in contact but with no major damage apparent earlier the singapore civil defence force said in a twitter post that it had been alerted to an incident at the station at am the collision come after a string of disruption to mass rapid transit service last month service were partially suspended on a weekend because of flooding in a tunnel after heavy rain the mishap have led to a rare public apology by top transit executive and an assurance from the government to address the cause
Title_Text: latest singapore transit train mishap injures

Text: washington reuters  u house of representative speaker paul ryan and top member of presidentelect donald trumps transition team on monday discussed a controversial plan to tax import during an evening meeting on capitol hill a trump adviser said trumps incoming chief strategist stephen bannon said the meeting examined two provision of ryans better way tax reform blueprint including a borderadjustability measure intended to boost u manufacturing by taxing import while exempting u business export revenue from corporate taxation the discussion also focused on a house territorial tax proposal that would end u taxation on the foreign profit of usbased multinationals bannon told reporter a more than a halfdozen trump transition team member left the  hour meeting bannon said the discussion involved working through border adjustability and added that the territorial measure wa also what this meetings about start working through it make sure everybody understands it and is on the same page some tax expert believe trump ha signalled his support for the border adjustability provision in recent tweet warning that company including automaker could face a border tax if they expand manufacturing abroad and ship product back to the u market trump and ryan agree that tax reform should reduce tax rate for individual and business do away with longstanding tax loophole and broaden the tax base in order to drive u economic growth advocate say the house republican borderadjustability measure could help trump meet his pledge of boosting manufacturing job in the united state it would also pay for lower tax rate by raising more than  trillion in revenue over year analyst say but some industry including retailer automaker and oil refiner claim it would raise consumer price by making export more expensive other critic say it could be vulnerable to a challenge before the world trade organization house republican say their territorial provision would bring the united state into line with other country that do not tax their businesss foreign profit up to now trump ha favored maintaining the current u tax system which tax u earnings abroad but allows company to defer tax until profit are returned u corporation have sought to avoid the tax by stashing about  trillion in earnings overseas also attending mondays meeting with ryan and his staff were trumps soninlaw jared kushner treasury secretarynominee steven mnuchin incoming chief of staff reince priebus and national economic council director gary cohn
Title_Text: ryan trump team discus border tax at capitol hill meeting

Text: crooked hillary ha always been crooked she s just been better than anyone america s ever seen at not getting caught on september eli chomsky wa an editor and staff writer for the jewish press and hillary clinton wa running for a shooin reelection a a u senator her trip making the round of editorial board brought her to brooklyn to meet the editorial board of the jewish pressthe tape wa never released and ha only been heard by the small handful of jewish press staffer in the room according to chomsky his oldschool audiocassette is the only existent copy and no one ha heard it since until today when he played it for the observerthe tape is minute and contains much that is no longer relevant such a analysis of the reelection battle that sen joe lieberman wa then facing in connecticut but a seemingly throwaway remark about election in area controlled by the palestinian authority ha taken on new relevance amid persistent accusation in the presidential campaign by clinton s republican opponent donald trump that the current election is rigged speaking to the jewish press about the january election for the second palestinian legislative council the legislature of the palestinian national authority clinton weighed in about the result which wa a resounding victory for hamas seat over the uspreferred fatah seat i do not think we should have pushed for an election in the palestinian territory i think that wa a big mistake said sen clinton and if we were going to push for an election then we should have made sure that we did something to determine who wa going to win chomsky recall being taken aback that anyone could support the idea offered by a national political leader no less that the u should be in the business of fixing foreign election some eyebrow were also raised when thensenator clinton appeared to make a questionable moral equivalencyfor entire story observer
Title_Text: whoa hillary clinton caught expressing regret about not rigging palestinian election
