Text: reuters  the united nation security council ha issued a wide range of sanction against north korea including entity and individual in the reclusive country for pursuing nuclear and ballistic missile program in defiance of un resolution the united state japan and south korea have also issued sanction on north korea but they are not binding on other country the united nation ha blacklisted north korean individual and entity which are subject to a travel ban and asset freeze un member state are obliged to enforce the sanction which are farreaching and comprehensive however many include gray area and exception which are subject to interpretation the following un sanction are currently in force north korea is under a total un arm embargo the sale of all arm and related materiel is banned any financial transaction related to the procurement of north korean arm are also included under the sanction the embargo ha been in place since and wa expanded in to include small arm and light weapon north korea is also prohibited from selling helicopter under un sanction under un sanction north korea is banned or partially banned from selling coal iron iron ore gold titanium ore vanadium ore copper nickel silver zinc and rare earth mineral coal export are allowed up to a maximum of  million or metric tonne a year whichever is lower provided un member state do not purchase the coal from a sanctioned entity and can prove that the coal is for livelihood purposes china north koreas biggest trade partner said in february it would suspend all import of coal from north korea for the rest of the year a part of it effort to implement the sanction externallysourced coal which transit through the north korean city of rason where russia maintains a warmwater port is exempt from the ban sale of north korean copper nickel silver and zinc are completely banned under un sanction only sale of aviation fuel jet fuel and rocket fuel to north korea are banned under un sanction the ban doe not apply to north korean civilian aircraft including state airline air koryo there are no restriction on crude oil or other oil product any financial service which contribute to north koreas banned missile and nuclear program or help pyongyang evade sanction are banned by the united nation member state are prohibited from opening branch subsidiary or office of north korean bank joint venture ownership or correspondent banking relationship with north korean bank is banned member state are required to expel and repatriate any individual working for a north korean bank or institution on their territory and limit the number of bank account for north korean diplomatic mission un member state are required to deregister any vessel which is owned operated or crewed by north korea meaning north koreanowned ship cannot fly the flag of another country which ha been one way of evading detection member state are also not allowed to provide insurance service to north korean ship north korea is prohibited from selling it ship under un sanction it also cannot provide north korean crew to ship from other country the un ha not sanctioned north koreas stateowned airline air koryo it ha however banned the sale of aviation fuel jet fuel and rocket fuel to north korea but air koryo and any north korean civilian aircraft refueling overseas are exempt from this un member state are required to prohibit inspect or deny landing of any north korean aircraft within their territory they suspect to be carrying banned item or taking part in any prohibited activity separately the united state ha unilaterally sanctioned air koryo banning it citizen from doing business with the airline it is unclear however if the sanction cover u citizen using the airline to travel to north korea for tourism un member state are required to inspect any cargo destined for coming from or brokered by north korea whether by air sea road or rail this includes the inspection of checked or carryon baggage of people traveling to or from north korea it is illegal under un sanction to directly or indirectly supply luxury good to north korea in the case of north korea the un defines luxury good a jewellery and precious stone yacht luxury car racing car luxury watch snowmobile jet ski recreational sport equipment tableware worth more than  and rug or tapestry worth more than  the resolution require member state to reduce the number of staff at north korean diplomatic mission north korean diplomat or consular official are only allowed one bank account each the use of real estate for any nondiplomatic or consular activity in member states territory is banned the training of or by north korean in military police and paramilitary technique is banned with the exception of medical exchange un member state are not allowed to provide training or cooperation in the field of nuclear science aerospace advanced manufacturing and advanced aeronautical chemical mechanical electrical or industrial engineering the sale of north korean statue is banned under un sanction
Title_Text: factbox un sanction on north korea currently in force

Text: in the vatican under pope john paul ii published the catechism of the catholic church which stated among many other thing that homosexual tendency are objectively disordered one of the principal theologian who shaped the document wa cardinal joseph ratzinger who would succeed john paul ii a pope benedict xvi he too would take a hardline stance against homosexualitytwo decade later pope francis ha signaled what many believe to be a softening on the matterin when asked about gay priest he famously replied who am i to judge he ha continued to call for the catholic church to treat lgbt people with dignity and respect and to fight discrimination against sexual minority rnsfrom the milwaukee journal sentinel the rev gregory greiten told his congregation sunday i am greg i am a roman catholic priest and yes i am gay the priest in the milwaukee archdiocese serf a the pastor of st bernadette parish on monday he came out to the rest of the world with a column in the national catholic reporter he received a standing ovation from his parishioner when he made his announcement before the column s publicationgreiten said he wa breaking the silence of gay men in the clergy so he could reclaim his own voicewhile it is established that there are gay men who serve a priest it is rare for a priest to come out to his congregation in this way greiten share an estimate in his article that there are between and gay catholic priest in the united state from the changing face of the priesthood church theology teach that acting upon homosexuality is a sinin announcing his identity a a gay man greiten chastised the catholic church for it stance on homosexualityhe wrote by choosing to enforce silence the institutional church pretend that gay priest and religious do not really exist because of this there are no authentic role model of healthy wellbalanced gay celibate priest to be an example for those young and old who are struggling to come to term with their sexual orientation this only perpetuates the toxic shaming and systemic secrecy nypgreiten wrote that ha decided to stand with the few courageous priest who have taken the risk to come out of the shadow and have chosen to live in truth and authenticity the church s silent stance on gay priest perpetuates toxic shaming and systematic secrecy greiten wrote the church need healthy role model for priest who are struggling to come to term with their sexual orientation he saidgreiten met with milwaukee archbishop jerome listecki before coming out according to an archdiocese spokeswoman we support father greiten in his own personal journey and telling his story of coming to understand and live with his sexual orientation listecki said in a statement monday a the church teach those with samesex attraction must be treated with understanding and compassion
Title_Text: wisconsin priest come out a gay during sunday massgets standing ovationwaitwhat

Text: reuters  below are the highlight from reuters oct exclusive interview with republican presidential nominee donald trump hillary clinton ha no plan for syria look with her youll end up in world war three she doesnt know what shes doing just like with libya just like with everything else shes done so syria now is no longer syria syria is russia and the new iran that we built through the iran deal which is one of the worst negotiated deal ive ever seen so youre not fighting syria anymore youre fighting syria russia and iran alright russia is a nuclear country but a country where the nuke work a opposed to other country that talk i say the first thing we have to do is get rid of isi before we start thinking about syria syrian president bashar alassad is secondary to me to isis if hillary clinton ended the war and left troop behind we wouldnt even be fighting for mosul right now ok she gave them mosul she didnt know what she wa doing the woman is incompetent one of the reason we were going in wa to get the isi leader but if thats the case why didnt we go in a a surprise attack instead of  you know with the element of surprise  instead of announcing three month ago that were going into mosul i would hope to have a good relationship with russia and i would hope to have a good relationship with putin im not friend or enemy with the russian i have nothing to do russia clinton always cast putin a a bad guy and a bad light if she won how is she going to go back and negotiate with this man who she ha made to be so evil hes not going to want to negotiate with her number one number two i dont believe he ha any respect for hillary clinton whatsoever on philippine president rodrigo duterte saying he wa against the presence of any foreign troop in his country he probably made a deal with china hes dealing with china and russia so he probably made a deal with china and russia the philippine are a very important strategic location he ha no respect or liking of obama  i think its a horrible thing that the united state is reduced to being thrown out of a country theres a big group of people that are in that category of world leader who dislike obama because obama want to focus on his golf game he doesnt want to take the time necessary to get along with people its too bad wikileaks on tuesday released a batch of hacked email from the account of clintons campaign manager john podesta that show her democratic presidential campaign reacting after president barack obama said in a television interview that he learned of her private email server through news report trumps response well i now see why the president stuck up for hillary because he didnt want to be dragged into it because he knew all about her private server this is a big thing this mean that he ha to be investigated thousands of people are standing there to vote i think those people are very very disappointed that the leader of the republican party arent helping u win i know this if the leader were helping me we couldnt lose this election it would be an impossibility the medias rigging the system its never been a pile on like this i mean theyre rigging the poll the poll are ridiculous look at that one poll that came out abcwashington post that wa a democratic poll theyre rigging the system an abc newswashington post poll released on sunday showed clinton leading trump by percentage point among likely voter
Title_Text: highlight from reuters exclusive interview with donald trump

Text: madrid reuters  spain s constitutional court ha blocked catalonia s declaration of independence made by the regional parliament on friday a court spokeswoman said on tuesday hour after catalonia s parliament voted on a unilateral declaration of independence the spanish government dissolved the parliament fired the government and set a date for regional election dec
Title_Text: spain constitutional court cancel catalonia declaration of independence

Text: washington reuters  u secretary of state john kerry offered his condolence to the cuban people on saturday adding that the united state would continue to support engaging with them after the death of fidel castro the united state reaffirms it support for deepening our engagement with the cuban people now and in coming years kerry said in a statement he added that a the two country moved forward in the process of normalizing relation it would be done with an earnest desire not to ignore history but to write a new and better future for our two peoples
Title_Text: u to continue supporting engagement with cuban people kerry

Text: donald trump is now demanding that any probe into his administration s connection to russia also include a probe into his wild allegation that president obama tapped his wire in trump tower this dubious claim seems to have originated with a breitbart article that had been circulating among white house staff the article in question claimed that president obama had ordered a wiretap under the foreign intelligence surveillance act which allows a secret court to authorize surveillance in case that involve agent of foreign power in this case trump and two russian banksthe article heavily referenced claimed made by conspiracy theorist mark levin on his farright radio show that we absolutely know this is true that obama wa monitoring trump s team during the campaign but now that his ridiculous allegation are being scrutinized by people who aren t completely batsht insane levin is doing everything he can to walk them back while still maintaining credibility with the stupid part of americaduring an appearance on fox news sunday levin called for a release of fisa court application that may or may not exist a well a all of the daily presidential intelligence briefing for the last year or so he added that this massive conspiracy that suddenly popped up when the russia situation wa becoming too much for the trump team to handle wasn t limited to obama every single democrat according to levin wa involved in trying to take trump downasked about the level of president obama s involvement levin gave himself a huge out i m not nostradamus here i just think that we ought to find outin other word he is pulling his claim out of thin air via a spokesperson president obama cleared up his level of involvement on saturday there wasn t any a cardinal rule of the obama administration wa that no white house official ever interfered with any independent investigation led by the department of justice the spokesman said a part of that practice neither president obama nor any white house official ever ordered surveillance on any u citizen donald trump is being attacked for the accusation he tweeted levin said failing to note that he wa the source of those allegation donald trump is the victim his campaign is the victim his transition team is the victim his surrogate are the victim these are police state tactic to some degree levin is correct but not in the way he think trump ha recently been demanding investigation of his critic member of his administration have also threatened to investigate journalist who do not write nice thing about the donald one trump administration member confirmed that president asterisk wa compiling dossier on journalist he view a unfriendly all of these thing could very accurately be described a police state tactic but we re guessing levin meant something about his favorite bogeyman barack obamalevin admits there is no basis for his claim but that doesn t matter to donald trump or conservative at large by making the allegation knowing that people who can only be described a idiot would eat up the republican are demanding answer and they will not be satisfied with any that do not paint barack obama a the monster they have known him to be ever since they realized he wa blackfeatured image via screengrab
Title_Text: man behind trumps insane claim that obama tapped his wires just admitted he made sht up video

Text: beijingtokyo reuters  hillary clinton put donald trump on the defensive and showed a better grasp of foreign policy issue according to a sampling of people across asia who watched the fiery first u presidential debate in china the debate wa streamed live on chinas twitterlike weibo service and attracted thousand of comment despite the lack of a translation into chinese some called trump a loose cannon while others thought that a a businessman he wa best qualified to lead the worlds largest economy william hua a chinese lawyer who watched the debate at an american chamber of commerce event in beijing said he thought clinton came out on top he wa most concerned though about an issue that didnt come up in the debate donald trump say japan and south korea can develop nuclear weapon it seems absolutely ridiculous hua said trump said in an interview with the new york time in march he would consider letting japan and south korea build their own nuclear weapon rather than rely on america for protection against north korea opinion poll have shown the two candidate in a tight race leading up to the debate a cnn poll of debate watcher released after the event found percent felt clinton won compared to percent for trump in a sign investor also saw clinton a the winner u sp stock future rose a did asian share markets started to call the debate for hillary within the first minute or so with the mexican peso surging in what is probably it busiest asian session in years said sean callow a senior currency analyst at westpac in sydney the mexican currency ha risen and fallen in recent week depending on polling number for trump who ha vowed to take trade protectionist measure against the united states southern neighbor and build a wall across the u border with mexico to prevent illegal immigration trump raised eyebrow among a packed crowd watching the debate at the american club in singapore when he lashed out against china look at what china is doing to our country trump said not long after the debate began they are devaluing their currency and we have nobody in our government to fight them they are using our country a a piggy bank to rebuild china and many other country are doing the same thing landy eng a former employee of the california state government whos been living in singapore the past year said he wa an undecided voter but trumps chinabashing is something im not particularly in favor of he said still eng said he doe like the disruptive factor of trumps campaign and think it is making clinton a better candidate aloysius lee a yearold retiree from hong kong who watched the debate at the foreign correspondents club in the territory said that trump wa too unpredictable hillary is the kind of person you can do business with at least from my point of view lee said with trump you dont know whats going to happen next you dont know what hes going to say next south korean watching the debate on tv screen in the lobby of seouls central train station said they were with clinton on the issue trump ha idea of withdrawing u force from our country and in term of national security trump is a threatening figure said lee hyojin so i support hillary she said trump during the debate again said if u ally like japan and south korea dont pay their fair share they may have to defend themselves or help u out asked about trumps comment japans defence minister tomomi inada told a regularly scheduled news conference on tuesday the usjapan military alliance doe not just benefit japan but is also in the interest of the united states clinton seemed to have the better temperament during the debate according to some asian viewer li jiaoli an editing intern from chinas southwestern province of sichuan said clinton seemed more presidential while trumps expression made her laugh trumps response were too aggressive highlevel politician should have more selfcontrol li said the debate prompted a storm of tweet around the region many of them commenting on the optic of the debate trump is looking worked up and angry and sulky and shouty she look utterly in control by contrast said barkha dutt news anchor on indias ndtv in a tweet she ignores his barb attack he get baited by every one of hers mel fryer a waitress at the mercantile hotel in sydneys historic rock district said she wa terrified at the prospect of a trump presidency while the debate screened to an empty pub but hes going ok she said of his debate performance he us simple word and simple phrase and get his point across
Title_Text: asian viewer give nod to clinton after first presidential debate

Text: a recent opinion poll carried out by nbc newswall street journal showed that percent of american a number that appears to still be growing would prefer to see an independent commissioner or special prosecutor handle the investigation into russia s interference in the u presidential election while a mere percent believe congress can handle any ongoing probelast week wa more than just a turbulent time in washington president trump fired fbi head james comey on tuesday the man responsible for the investigation into trump s russian tie this latest poll wa conducted between thursday may and saturday may just day after comey s ousting among adult and ha an overall margin of error of plus or minus percentage point the firing of the fbi director wa a major upheaval in the investigation process and these poll result reflect the current climate not only around capitol hill but what is a rapidly growing consensus across the nationsince comey s dismissal trump and several member of his administration have tried to downplay the need for an independent commission to continue what the fbi had begun looking into question of russian interference in last year s election a well a the possibility of member of trump s campaign colluding with moscow in fact on saturday the president stated in no uncertain term that the investigation should continue to progress in the house the senate the fbi according to the same poll only percent of american say they approve of comey s firing while percent disapprove another percent of respondent don t have enough to say on the matter yet among those who say they have read seen or heard a lot about the firing percent say they disapprove versus percent who approve the poll also showed a partisan split when it come to the topic of the president s decision with percent of republican approving while percent of democrat disapprove of the move one thing that is clear however is that very few people surveyed had no opinion at all with low singledigit responsesas a whole trump s approval rating ha remained steady at percent since last tuesday however percent of those surveyed claimed that their impression of the president is less favorable since his decision to remove james comey while percent say the move hasn t impacted their impression of president trump whatsoeverfeatured image via drew angerergetty image
Title_Text: the poll from trumps horrific week have been released and hes in a complete tailspin

Text: seoul reuters  the u military on monday flew a pair of bb bomber and f fighter jet in bombing drill with south korea over the korean peninsula in a show of force against north korea south korea s defence ministry said the bomber flew from guam and the fighter flew from japan joined by six south korean fighter jet in the drill a south korean defense ministry official said
Title_Text: u bomber fighter jet in bombing drill over korean peninsula south korea

Text: st century wire say wikileaks ha released it largest ever publication of confidential document on the central intelligence agency entitled vault and containing a password that echoed the alleged jfk quote splinter the cia into a thousand piece and scatter it into the wind this leak comprises document and file from an isolated highsecurity network situated inside the cia s center for cyber intelligence in langley virginia year zero which is part one of the leak and conveniently named after a zero day exploit used by intelligence agency wa gathered throughout and is said to be the largest intelligence publication in history whilst a lot of the information and methodology outlined in year zero is of no surprise to security analyst and researcher since the edward snowden image left revelation once again the public ha explicit confirmation of how one of the most powerful intelligence agency in the world aided by their international counterpart like gchq have been infiltrating and scooping vast quantity of private information from apple and android device right up to samsung smart tv technology where false standby mode and live microphone can be executed to record information and send it back to the appropriate serversthis document dump is a game changer because not only doe the world know what they ve done we now know how they ve done itbased on the cia s own document how do we know it wasn t the cia themselves behind various russian hacking conspiracy circling around trump the question are proliferating a we speakmore on this report from wikileaks wikileaks today tuesday march wikileaks begin it new series of leak on the u central intelligence agency codenamed vault by wikileaks it is the largest ever publication of confidential document on the agencythe first full part of the series year zero comprises document and file from an isolated highsecurity network situated inside the cia s center for cyber intelligence in langley virgina it follows an introductory disclosure last month of cia targeting french political party and candidate in the lead up to the presidential electionrecently the cia lost control of the majority of it hacking arsenal including malware virus trojan weaponized zero day exploit malware remote control system and associated documentation this extraordinary collection which amount to more than several hundred million line of code give it possessor the entire hacking capacity of the cia the archive appears to have been circulated among former u government hacker and contractor in an unauthorized manner one of whom ha provided wikileaks with portion of the archive year zero introduces the scope and direction of the cia s global covert hacking program it malware arsenal and dozen of zero day weaponized exploit against a wide range of u and european company product include apple s iphone google s android and microsoft s window and even samsung tv which are turned into covert microphonessince the cia ha gained political and budgetary preeminence over the u national security agency nsa the cia found itself building not just it now infamous drone fleet but a very different type of covert globespanning force it own substantial fleet of hacker the agency s hacking division freed it from having to disclose it often controversial operation to the nsa it primary bureaucratic rival in order to draw on the nsa s hacking capacitiesby the end of the cia s hacking division which formally fall under the agency s center for cyber intelligence cci had over registered user and had produced more than a thousand hacking system trojan virus and other weaponized malware such is the scale of the cia s undertaking that by it hacker had utilized more code than that used to run facebook the cia had created in effect it own nsa with even less accountability and without publicly answering the question a to whether such a massive budgetary spend on duplicating the capacity of a rival agency could be justifiedin a statement to wikileaks the source detail policy question that they say urgently need to be debated in public including whether the cia s hacking capability exceed it mandated power and the problem of public oversight of the agency the source wish to initiate a public debate about the security creation use proliferation and democratic control of cyberweaponsonce a single cyber weapon is loose it can spread around the world in second to be used by rival state cyber mafia and teenage hacker alikejulian assange wikileaks editor stated that there is an extreme proliferation risk in the development of cyber weapon comparison can be drawn between the uncontrolled proliferation of such weapon which result from the inability to contain them combined with their high market value and the global arm trade but the significance of year zero go well beyond the choice between cyberwar and cyberpeace the disclosure is also exceptional from a political legal and forensic perspective wikileaks ha carefully reviewed the year zero disclosure and published substantive cia documentation while avoiding the distribution of armed cyberweapons until a consensus emerges on the technical and political nature of the cia s program and how such weapon should analyzed disarmed and publishedwikileaks ha also decided to redact and anonymise some identifying information in year zero for in depth analysis these redaction include ten of thousand of cia target and attack machine throughout latin america europe and the united state while we are aware of the imperfect result of any approach chosen we remain committed to our publishing model and note that the quantity of published page in vault part one year zero already eclipse the total number of page published over the first three year of the edward snowden nsa leakscia malware and hacking tool are built by edg engineering development group a software development group within cci center for cyber intelligence a department belonging to the cia s ddi directorate for digital innovation the ddi is one of the five major directorate of the cia see this organizational chart of the cia for more detailsthe edg is responsible for the development testing and operational support of all backdoor exploit malicious payload trojan virus and any other kind of malware used by the cia in it covert operation worldwidethe increasing sophistication of surveillance technique ha drawn comparison with george orwell s but weeping angel developed by the cia s embedded device branch edb which infests smart tv transforming them into covert microphone is surely it most emblematic realizationthe attack against samsung smart tv wa developed in cooperation with the united kingdom s mibtss after infestation weeping angel place the target tv in a fakeoff mode so that the owner falsely belief the tv is off when it is on in fakeoff mode the tv operates a a bug recording conversation in the room and sending them over the internet to a covert cia serveras of october the cia wa also looking at infecting the vehicle control system used by modern car and truck the purpose of such control is not specified but it would permit the cia to engage in nearly undetectable assassinationsthe cia s mobile device branch mdb developed numerous attack to remotely hack and control popular smart phone infected phone can be instructed to send the cia the user s geolocation audio and text communication a well a covertly activate the phone s camera and microphonedespite iphone s minority share of the global smart phone market in a specialized unit in the cia s mobile development branch produce malware to infest control and exfiltrate data from iphones and other apple product running io such a ipads cia s arsenal includes numerous local and remote zero day developed by cia or obtained from gchq nsa fbi or purchased from cyber arm contractor such a baitshop the disproportionate focus on io may be explained by the popularity of the iphone among social political diplomatic and business elitesa similar unit target google s android which is used to run the majority of the world s smart phone  including samsung htc and sony billion android powered phone were sold last year year zero show that a of the cia had weaponized android zero day which it ha developed itself and obtained from gchq nsa and cyber arm contractorsthese technique permit the cia to bypass the encryption of whatsapp signal telegram wiebo confide and cloackman by hacking the smart phone that they run on and collecting audio and message traffic before encryption is appliedthe cia also run a very substantial effort to infect and control microsoft window user with it malware this includes multiple local and remote weaponized zero day air gap jumping virus such a hammer drill which infects software distributed on cddvds infectors for removable medium such a usbs system to hide data in image or in covert disk area brutal kangaroo and to keep it malware infestation goingmany of these infection effort are pulled together by the cia s automated implant branch aib which ha developed several attack system for automated infestation and control of cia malware such a assassin and medusa attack against internet infrastructure and webservers are developed by the cia s network device branch ndbthe cia ha developed automated multiplatform malware attack and control system covering window mac o x solaris linux and more such a edb s hive and the related cutthroat and swindle tool which are described in the example section belowin the wake of edward snowden s leak about the nsa the u technology industry secured a commitment from the obama administration that the executive would disclose on an ongoing basis rather than hoard serious vulnerability exploit bug or zero day to apple google microsoft and other usbased manufacturersserious vulnerability not disclosed to the manufacturer place huge swathe of the population and critical infrastructure at risk to foreign intelligence or cyber criminal who independently discover or hear rumor of the vulnerability if the cia can discover such vulnerability so can othersthe u government s commitment to the vulnerability equity process came after significant lobbying by u technology company who risk losing their share of the global market over real and perceived hidden vulnerability the government stated that it would disclose all pervasive vulnerability discovered after on an ongoing basis year zero document show that the cia breached the obama administration s commitment many of the vulnerability used in the cia s cyber arsenal are pervasive and some may already have been found by rival intelligence agency or cyber criminalsas an example specific cia malware revealed in year zero is able to penetrate infest and control both the android phone and iphone software that run or ha run presidential twitter account the cia attack this software by using undisclosed security vulnerability zero day possessed by the cia but if the cia can hack these phone then so can everyone else who ha obtained or discovered the vulnerability a long a the cia keep these vulnerability concealed from apple and google who make the phone they will not be fixed and the phone will remain hackablethe same vulnerability exist for the population at large including the u cabinet congress top ceo system administrator security officer and engineer by hiding these security flaw from manufacturer like apple and google the cia ensures that it can hack everyone mdsh at the expense of leaving everyone hackablecyber weapon are not possible to keep under effective controlwhile nuclear proliferation ha been restrained by the enormous cost and visible infrastructure involved in assembling enough fissile material to produce a critical nuclear mass cyber weapon once developed are very hard to retaincyber weapon are in fact just computer program which can be pirated like any other since they are entirely comprised of information they can be copied quickly with no marginal costsecuring such weapon is particularly difficult since the same people who develop and use them have the skill to exfiltrate copy without leaving trace sometimes by using the very same weapon against the organization that contain them there are substantial price incentive for government hacker and consultant to obtain copy since there is a global vulnerability market that will pay hundred of thousand to million of dollar for copy of such weapon similarly contractor and company who obtain such weapon sometimes use them for their own purpose obtaining advantage over their competitor in selling hacking servicesover the last three year the united state intelligence sector which consists of government agency such a the cia and nsa and their contractor such a booze allan hamilton ha been subject to unprecedented series of data exfiltrations by it own workersa number of intelligence community member not yet publicly named have been arrested or subject to federal criminal investigation in separate incidentsmost visibly on february a u federal grand jury indicted harold t martin iii with count of mishandling classified information the department of justice alleged that it seized some gigabyte of information from harold t martin iii that he had obtained from classified program at nsa and cia including the source code for numerous hacking toolsonce a single cyber weapon is loose it can spread around the world in second to be used by peer state cyber mafia and teenage hacker alikein addition to it operation in langley virginia the cia also us the u consulate in frankfurt a a covert base for it hacker covering europe the middle east and africacia hacker operating out of the frankfurt consulate center for cyber intelligence europe or ccie are given diplomatic black passport and state department cover the instruction for incoming cia hacker make germany s counterintelligence effort appear inconsequential breeze through german custom because you have your coverforaction story down pat and all they did wa stamp your passport your cover story for this trip q why are you here a supporting technical consultation at the consulatetwo earlier wikileaks publication give further detail on cia approach to custom and secondary screening proceduresonce in frankfurt cia hacker can travel without further border check to the european country that are part of the shengen open border area including france italy and switzerlanda number of the cia s electronic attack method are designed for physical proximity these attack method are able to penetrate high security network that are disconnected from the internet such a police record database in these case a cia officer agent or allied intelligence officer acting under instruction physically infiltrates the targeted workplace the attacker is provided with a usb containing malware developed for the cia for this purpose which is inserted into the targeted computer the attacker then infects and exfiltrates data to removable medium for example the cia attack system fine dining provides decoy application for cia spy to use to witness the spy appears to be running a program showing video eg vlc presenting slide prezi playing a computer game breakout or even running a fake virus scanner kaspersky mcafee sophos but while the decoy application is on the screen the underlaying system is automatically infected and ransackedin what is surely one of the most astounding intelligence own goal in living memory the cia structured it classification regime such that for the most market valuable part of vault the cia s weaponized malware implant  zero day listening post lp and command and control c system the agency ha little legal recoursethe cia made these system unclassifiedwhy the cia chose to make it cyberarsenal unclassified reveals how concept developed for military use do not easily crossover to the battlefield of cyber war to attack it target the cia usually requires that it implant communicate with their control program over the internet if cia implant command control and listening post software were classified then cia officer could be prosecuted or dismissed for violating rule that prohibit placing classified information onto the internet consequently the cia ha secretly made most of it cyber spyingwar code unclassified the u government is not able to assert copyright either due to restriction in the u constitution this mean that cyber arm manufacture and computer hacker can freely pirate these weapon if they are obtained the cia ha primarily had to rely on obfuscation to protect it malware secretsconventional weapon such a missile may be fired at the enemy ie into an unsecured area proximity to or impact with the target detonates the ordnance including it classified part hence military personnel do not violate classification rule by firing ordnance with classified part ordnance will likely explode if it doe not that is not the operator s intentover the last decade u hacking operation have been increasingly dressed up in military jargon to tap into department of defense funding stream for instance attempted malware injection commercial jargon or implant drop nsa jargon are being called fire a if a weapon wa being fired however the analogy is questionableunlike bullet bomb or missile most cia malware is designed to live for day or even year after it ha reached it target cia malware doe not explode on impact but rather permanently infests it target in order to infect target s device copy of the malware must be placed on the target s device giving physical possession of the malware to the target to exfiltrate data back to the cia or to await further instruction the malware must communicate with cia command control c system placed on internet connected server but such server are typically not approved to hold classified information so cia command and control system are also made unclassifieda successful attack on a target s computer system is more like a series of complex stock maneuver in a hostile takeover bid or the careful planting of rumor in order to gain control over an organization s leadership rather than the firing of a weapon system if there is a military analogy to be made the infestation of a target is perhaps akin to the execution of a whole series of military maneuver against the target s territory including observation infiltration occupation and exploitationa series of standard lay out cia malware infestation pattern which are likely to assist forensic crime scene investigator a well a apple microsoft google samsung nokia blackberry siemens and antivirus company attribute and defend against attack tradecraft do s and don t contains cia rule on how it malware should be written to avoid fingerprint implicating the cia u government or it witting partner company in forensic review similar secret standard cover the use of encryption to hide cia hacker and malware communication pdf describing target exfiltrated data pdf a well a executing payload pdf and persisting pdf in the target s machine over timecia hacker developed successful attack against most well known antivirus program these are documented in av defeat personal security product detecting and defeating psps and pspdebuggerre avoidance for example comodo wa defeated by cia malware placing itself in the window s recycle bin while comodo x ha a gaping hole of doom cia hacker discussed what the nsa s equation group hacker did wrong and how the cia s malware maker could avoid similar exposurethe cia s engineering development group edg management system contains around different project only some of which are documented by year zero each with their own subprojects malware and hacker toolsthe majority of these project relate to tool that are used for penetration infestation implanting control and exfiltrationanother branch of development focus on the development and operation of listening post lp and command and control c system used to communicate with and control cia implant special project are used to target specific hardware from router to smart tvssome example project are described below but see the table of content for the full list of project described by wikileaks year zero the cia s hand crafted hacking technique pose a problem for the agency each technique it ha created form a fingerprint that can be used by forensic investigator to attribute multiple different attack to the same entitythis is analogous to finding the same distinctive knife wound on multiple separate murder victim the unique wounding style creates suspicion that a single murderer is responsible a soon one murder in the set is solved then the other murder also find likely attributionthe cia s remote device branch s umbrage group collect and maintains a substantial library of attack technique stolen from malware produced in other state including the russian federationwith umbrage and related project the cia cannot only increase it total number of attack type but also misdirect attribution by leaving behind the fingerprint of the group that the attack technique were stolen fromumbrage component cover keyloggers password collection webcam capture data destruction persistence privilege escalation stealth antivirus psp avoidance and survey techniquesfine dining come with a standardized questionnaire ie menu that cia case officer fill out the questionnaire is used by the agency s osb operational support branch to transform the request of case officer into technical requirement for hacking attack typically exfiltrating information from computer system for specific operation the questionnaire allows the osb to identify how to adapt existing tool for the operation and communicate this to cia malware configuration staff the osb function a the interface between cia operational staff and the relevant technical support staffamong the list of possible target of the collection are asset liaison asset system administrator foreign information operation foreign intelligence agency and foreign government entity notably absent is any reference to extremist or transnational criminal the case officer is also asked to specify the environment of the target like the type of computer operating system used internet connectivity and installed antivirus utility psps a well a a list of file type to be exfiltrated like office document audio video image or custom file type the menu also asks for information if recurring access to the target is possible and how long unobserved access to the computer can be maintained this information is used by the cia s jqjimprovise software see below to configure a set of cia malware suited to the specific need of an operation improvise is a toolset for configuration postprocessing payload setup and execution vector selection for surveyexfiltration tool supporting all major operating system like window bartender macos jukebox and linux dancefloor it configuration utility like margarita allows the noc network operation center to customize tool based on requirement from fine dining questionnaireshive is a multiplatform cia malware suite and it associated control software the project provides customizable implant for window solaris mikrotik used in internet router and linux platform and a listening post lpcommand and control c infrastructure to communicate with these implantsthe implant are configured to communicate via http with the webserver of a cover domain each operation utilizing these implant ha a separate cover domain and the infrastructure can handle any number of cover domainseach cover domain resolve to an ip address that is located at a commercial vps virtual private server provider the publicfacing server forward all incoming traffic via a vpn to a blot server that handle actual connection request from client it is setup for optional ssl client authentication if a client sends a valid client certificate only implant can do that the connection is forwarded to the honeycomb toolserver that communicates with the implant if a valid certificate is missing which is the case if someone try to open the cover domain website by accident the traffic is forwarded to a cover server that delivers an unsuspicious looking websitethe honeycomb toolserver receives exfiltrated information from the implant an operator can also task the implant to execute job on the target computer so the toolserver act a a c command and control server for the implantsimilar functionality though limited to window is provided by the rickbobby projectsee the classified user and developer guide for hivewikileaks published a soon a it verification and analysis were readyin february the trump administration ha issued an executive order calling for a cyberwar review to be prepared within dayswhile the review increase the timeliness and relevance of the publication it did not play a role in setting the publication date continue this story at wikileaksread more wikileaks at st century wire wikileaks filessupport our work by subscribing becoming a member wiretv
Title_Text: breaking wikileaks release vault  part  year zero

Text: washington reuters  the u senate voted on thursday to bolster travel security in the wake of the brussels attack with measure that include doubling the number of transportation security team with bombsniffing dog at domestic airport and other transit hub lawmaker voted overwhelmingly to add security measure to a separate bill that call for renewing the program of the federal aviation administration through september the faa bill is expected to come up for a final vote later this month after republican and democrat reached a deal on security measure earlier in the day lawmaker voted to raise the number of visible intermodal prevention response or viper team within the transportation security administration from to viper team which are intended a a visible deterrent to attack can be deployed at airport and train or bus station other measure would bolster the vetting of airport employee add security to vulnerable checkin and baggage claim area and authorize the tsa to donate security equipment to foreign airport with direct flight to the united state the approved provision would also order a new u assessment of foreign cargo security program and provide grant money to train state local and foreign authority in how to respond to masscasualty and active shooter incident it is unclear what kind of reception the faa bill if passed by the senate might receive in the house of representative house lawmaker have been considering their own faa legislation that bill also call for the privatization of the u air traffic control system a measure that is not in the senates legislation
Title_Text: u senator vote to bolster travel security in faa bill

Text: san francisco reuters  california attorney general xavier becerra said on friday he wa prepared to take whatever action it takes to defend the obamacare mandate that health insurer provide birth control now that the trump administration ha moved to circumvent it the administrations new contraception exemption are another example of the trump administration trampling on peoples right but in this case only women becerra told reuters becerra and other democratic attorney general have filed courtroom challenge to other trump administration policy involving healthcare immigration and the environment
Title_Text: california ag pledge to defend birth control insurance coverage

Text: reuters  moodys investor service on tuesday slapped a negative outlook on kansas aa credit rating citing the states reliance on oneshot measure to balance it budget that followed action late last month by standard poors which put kansas aa rating on review for a possible downgrade after the state lowered it revenue estimate for the current and next fiscal year by  million governor sam brownback plan to divert  million in sale tax revenue from the state highway fund to the general fund and delay a  million fiscal pension payment to help fill the gap by continuing to balance it budget with unsustainable nonrecurring resource including pension underfunding it is accumulating large and expensive longterm liability that it will be paying off for a long time moodys said in a statement the credit rating agency also revised the outlook on  billion of aarated kansa highway revenue bond to negative from stable the kansa budget is feeling the effect from action taken by brownback and the republicancontrolled legislature in recent year to cut corporate and other income tax to help the state compete with bordering missouri and other state for business development and job the states fiscal year begin on july
Title_Text: kansa budget woe weigh on state credit rating

Text: berlin reuters  she ha earned a reputation a europe s chief crisis manager now germany s angela merkel must forge a government out of an awkward group of ally bent on nailing down a coalition deal so tight it risk limiting her room to act if crisis strike again the chancellor go into talk this week about forming a government but her task already tough after she lost ground in a sept national election is all the harder after defeat in a regional vote on sunday further weakened her hand the upshot is that she must draw on all her consensusbuilding skill to form a ruling alliance of her conservative the probusiness free democrat fdp and the green the term of a coalition deal should one be reached could determine merkel s room for maneuver on both the domestic and international stage during her year in power she ha been able to steer europe through it euro zone and refugee crisis in part due to her dominance at home any constraint on her ability to swiftly shape and enact policy could compromise germany s leadership role if the three party group fail to reach a deal at all some in their rank fear this could lead to public disenchantment and fuel further support for the farright alternative for germany afd which entered parliament for the first time last month the combination of the group going into coalition talk is untested at national level and merkel s wouldbe ally are not guaranteeing success the chancellor s christian democrat cdu and their bavarian ally meet the fdp and green separately on wednesday before they all meet on friday now we must gauge whether a platform for common policy can be found for me that is undecided fdp leader christian lindner told deutschlandfunk radio on tuesday adding to the complication the cdu fdp and green want to put any deal to their grassroots party member for approval fdp deputy leader wolfgang kubicki ha said it would be illusory to believe we could conclude negotiation by christmas one major area of contention is immigration policy the cdu and their conservative bavarian ally the christian social union csu have agreed a limit of a year on the number of migrant germany would accept on humanitarian ground but the other party reject a cap and instead favor an immigration law with criterion to attract highly educated worker to plug skill shortage they say the cducsu migrant agreement should not be baked into a coalition deal juergen trittin of the green said pressure on the conservative bloc to shift right  after bleeding support to the afd  could complicate the talk on forming a jamaica coalition socalled because the party color correspond with the jamaican flag i fear this will make the jamaica exploratory talk much more difficult trittin told the passauer neue presse the three party group also have deep difference on issue ranging from european union reform and tax to the environment a jamaica coalition wa formed in the tiny western german state of saarland in october but collapsed in january the same formation took power in the far northern region of schleswigholstein after election there in may this year annegret krampkarrenbauer the conservative state premier of saarland who led the former jamaica alliance there stressed the need to establish trust between the three national group it is important that there is a basic understanding among those people negotiating she added asked how to foster trust and understanding she replied talk talk talk but the size of the negotiating team  the cducsu and green have and people respectively  is undermining trust before the talk have even begun kubicki told focus magazine it wa a cardinal error to enter the discussion with such large team adding this wa not conducive to building trust and no basis for good and confidential negotiation the result of the mutual suspicion is that negotiator are pushing for deeper agreement in a coalition deal than in the page agreed by the outgoing grand coalition of merkel s conservative and the centerleft social democrat spd this risk limiting merkel s freedom in policymaking the euro zone and refugee crisis which were not foreseen in coalition agreement were addressed with ad hoc decision germany s budget surplus may help smooth the path in the coalition talk however it give scope to satisfy all side to some degree by paying for both tax cut and investment in area such a upgrading infrastructure for the digital age but if merkel is unable to form a threeway coalition with the fdp and green she could try to team up again with the spd  though the spd ha said it want to go into opposition should the spd reject her approach and merkel find herself unable to form a government she could try to form a minority government or else call fresh election  an unprecedented scenario if we don t get this under control the political system we ve had for year  and the stability it ha brought  will be threatened said one senior conservative speaking under condition of anonymity
Title_Text: mission impossible merkels coalition conundrum just got harder

Text: one of donald trump s latest conspiracy theory he s been spreading far and wide about his opponent hillary clinton is that she s on drug and there should be a drug test before the next debateof course he s likely saying this because a per usual anything said about him he turn around to say about hillary he s a master projector and this drug test poppycock is no different he s been sniffing constantly through the debate and many have asked if he may be on cocaine or something elsewhen white house press secretary josh earnest wa just asked about a potential drug test he said you re telling me that the candidate who snorted his way through the first two debate is accusing the other candidate of taking drug that s a curious development in the campaign watch for yourself herepresssec on trump call for candidate drug test trump snorted his way through the first two debate httpstcopcmfmeuldy politico politico october of course when pressed if he wa insinuated trump wa on drug earnest said he wa jokinghowever one doe wonder why trump keep sniffing is he sick doe he lack stamen is he taking drug to stay awake who s really to know but since trump did raise the question of drug test maybe we should find out maybe he s saying it to deflect because everyone ha been questioning himsee two can play at this conspiracy theory gamehow about we stick to the issue or the fact that trump is still deflecting from his lack of showing his tax you know someone ha something to hide when they can t answer question and choose to make lame claim about their opponentgood on earnest for laughing it off a we all shouldfeatured image via video screen capture chip somodevillagetty image
Title_Text: the white house just mocked trumps drug test request say hes the one on drug video

Text: donald trump fell on his face repeatedly during sunday night s debate perhaps he wa too busy thinking about what president obama said about him only hour earlierthe republican nominee is under tremendous fire and his campaign is imploding after some lewd comment about groping woman dropped like a bombshell on friday trump and his team have been scrambling ever since while republican have been running a far away a they can from the blast radiusduring an event in chicago in support of rep tammy duckworth s senate bid president obama finally chimed in on the disgusting remark which wa perfect timing considering the second presidential debate between hillary and trump wa only a few hour away from commencing in st louis one of the most disturbing thing about this election is just the unbelievable rhetoric coming at the top of the republican ticket obama said of the remark i don t need to repeat it there are child in the room president obama wa clearly referencing trump s remark which included a declaration that he is so famous that he just walk up to woman and grab them by the pssy demeaning woman degrading woman but also minority immigrant people of other faith mocking the disabled insulting our troop insulting our veteran that tell you a couple thing obama continued it tell you that he s insecure enough that he pump himself up by putting other people down not a character trait that i would advise for somebody in the oval office it tell you that he doesn t care much about the basic value that we try to impart to our kid it tell you he d be careless with the civility and the respect that a real vibrant democracy requires here s the video via cnnso maybe donald trump had a hard time during the debate last night partly because he wa seething from being burned by president obama regardless of why trump got his as handed to him on the debate stage again the fact remains that he is unfit to be president and president obama perfectly made it clear that insulting a great majority of american is the biggest reason to keep trump out of the white houseamerica need a president who respect all of the people not someone who ha disrespected more than half of themfeatured image screenshot
Title_Text: president obama blast insecure trump make it clear trump is unfit video

Text: gaza reuters  mohammad dahlan who played a key backroom role in a major new effort for palestinian unity ha said a twostate peace agreement with israel wa impossible and healing wound from a civil war that split palestine wa now a priority once of the fiercest foe of hamas the islamist group that seized the gaza strip in a civil war in dahlan a member of the rival mainstream fatah party spoke to reuters after a unity cabinet held it first meeting in the enclave in three year the internal palestinian situation is more sacred is more important and is more useful now than the socalled negotiation the veteran politician said of talk with israel that collapsed in over issue such a israeli settlementbuilding in occupied territory and fatahhamas reconciliation a former peace negotiator with israel who speaks hebrew and who wa born in a refugee camp dahlan noted jewish settlement in the occupied west bank and east jerusalem area captured in a war and which palestinian seek along with gaza for a future state there is a complete judaisation of the west bank not only of jerusalem it ha become impossible for the twostate solution to be implemented therefore there is no political horizon he said in the rare interview israel ha built about settlement in the west bank about settler live there and a further in east jerusalem among about million palestinian fatah led by the secular heir of yasser arafat run the west bank head the internationally recognized palestinian authority and ha been responsible for negotiation with israel it rival hamas an offshoot of the muslim brotherhood drove fatah force loyal to president mahmoud abbas from gaza and ha run the tiny coastal strip that is home to two million people relation eased on monday when hamas handed over control of gaza to a unity government although it agreed to the deal three year ago the decision to implement it mark a striking reversal for hamas considered a terrorist group by israel the united state and most powerful arab country official on both side of the palestinian divide and in other arab country say dahlan based since in the united arab emirate wa behind an influx of cash to prop up gaza and a detente between hamas and arab state including egypt that led the group to dismantle it shadow government last month it wa an honor for u that we succeeded to have those understanding between hamas and egypt dahlan said by telephone from abu dhabi the former gaza security chief said he had kept silent during mediation effort but decided to speak out now that they have borne fruit dahlan said egypt which ha accused hamas of aiding an islamist insurgency in the sinai peninsula across the border from gaza held meeting with senior official of the group which denies aiding the militant both side agreed to shore up security along the border and prevent militant from crossing without reconciling with hamas and without hamas understanding the need of the egyptian national security there can be no serious palestinian reconciliation and no one but egypt is capable of playing an effective role dahlan said cairo will host hamas and fatah official next tuesday for further talk on powersharing and the holding of palestinian election longdelayed by the internal rift a first sign of discontent surfaced with hamas criticizing abbas s decision to await the outcome of the talk before lifting sanction he ha imposed on gaza in the interview dahlan called on hamas to show more patience because all the good thing are on the way thanks to egyptian mediation he dismissed any notion that egypt with the uae and saudi arabia wa pursuing palestinian reconciliation a part of any wider usinitiated push for a regional peace deal with israel the chance of the socalled deal of the century is zero because israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu doe not want peace and he imposed a reality of settler in the west bank and in jerusalem that made it impossible for the twostate solution to be implemented dahlan said netanyahu on tuesday warned palestinian against engaging in bogus reconciliation under which hamas kept it military arm in gaza which bristle with hundred of it rocket turning to palestinian politics dahlan who recently formed the fatah reformist and democratic party to challenge abbas  now in the th year of a fouryear term  accused him of committing crime and mistake but said he wa ready to reconcile with the yearold leader to reunite the fatah movement the ball is in his court and we are ready whenever he is said dahlan in exile since after quarrelling with abbas ambitious and charismatic he ha long been suspected of harboring design to succeed abbas dahlan said his strong tie with the uae helped him to raise hundred of million of dollar in aid for palestinian in gaza the west bank and east jerusalem in the past year a recent poll by the west bankbased palestinian center for policy and survey showed that those who still support fatah in gaza are shifting loyalty to dahlan his popularity among gazans ha risen over the past nine month from nine to percent dahlan said he wa not obsessed by opinion poll and a decision on whether he would run for a president would await until an election date is set
Title_Text: mohammed dahlan speaks about palestinian unity and his backroom role

Text: london reuters  under the gaze of a lifesized cardboard figure of donald trump some of his supporter gathered at an exclusive club near the ritz hotel in london to celebrate fridays inauguration of americas th president bunch of red white and blue balloon some of them starshaped adorned the wall of the royal overseas league where trumps appearance on the balcony outside the domed u capitol wa greeted with whooping and cheering a he completed the oath the room broke into a standing ovation complete with highfive celebration later trumps inaugural speech wa punctuated with cheer especially his pledge to eradicate radical islamic terrorism while at the end the room chorused along with trumps trademark promise to make america great again the speech wa great  mr trump just touched the most important subject for america said polishborn university professor victoria gorskarabuck his speech wa very appropriate very uplifting and promise a lot we hope he can deliver what he promised she told reuters businessman david pattinson said he thought trump would be a successful president i think hell succeed in cutting government spending although i dont know whether he will be successful in getting rid of the establishment he said i wasnt surprised when he won i wa satisfied he added i wa expecting him to win it wa the same with brexit in how the poll got it wrong
Title_Text: republican in london celebrate trump inauguration

Text: washington reuters  in a lastditch effort five u senate democrat are urging president donald trump to veto a resolution that would repeal a labor department rule designed to help city launch retirement saving plan for lowincome privatesector worker by exempting such program from strict federal pension protection law in an april letter that reuters saw on thursday the lawmaker told trump a republican that killing the rule could harm more than million american who would otherwise benefit from cityrun retirement plan we ask you to work with u to increase access to retirement saving program and promote greater retirement security they wrote the senator signing the letter are patty murray of washington and ron wyden of oregon the top democrat on committee overseeing pension and tax matter maria cantwell of washington kirsten gillibrand of new york and robert casey of pennsylvania the resolution on cityrun retirement plan is one of measure that congress ha passed to repeal rule enacted under previous president barack obama a democrat an obscure law called the congressional review act give congress a tool to repeal regulation that it find objectionable all that is required is a simple majority vote in both chamber and the presidents signature the law is limited however in how it can be used only rule that were finalized within legislative day are eligible for repeal trump ha signed of the resolution so far the white house office of management and budget ha advised trump to sign the cityrun retirement plan measure and a white house official said on wednesday that the president would sign more resolution this month the labor department adopted two rule at the end of obamas tenure that exempted both city and staterun retirement plan from the employee retirement income security act or erisa a law designed to protect workers saving the plan are geared toward privatesector worker whose employer do not offer k or other retirement benefit and would let them enroll automatically in plan like those being introduced in place like california city and state say they need the exemption for the plan to work effectively but trade group like the chamber of commerce and investment company institute want it repealed amid concern that worker would not have adequate pension protection the resolution to repeal the cityrun retirement plan rule narrowly passed the senate in a  vote the senate is expected to take up a separate resolution to repeal the rule on staterun retirement plan after the easter recess
Title_Text: democrat ask trump to veto measure repealing city retirement plan rule

Text: london reuters  prime minister theresa may said on sunday she would not be derailed from leaving the european union laying the groundwork for difficult meeting this week in which she will try to unite a divided cabinet behind her vision for postbrexit britain may wa applauded by european union leader in brussels on friday after securing an agreement to move previouslydeadlocked talk forward onto the topic of interim and longterm trading arrangement the progress ha gone some way to easing concern of business and investor who fear britain could crash out of the bloc without an exit deal or that may s fragile government could collapse under the pressure of delivering brexit amid all the noise we are getting on with the job may wrote in the sunday telegraph my message today is very clear we will not be derailed from this fundamental duty to deliver the democratic will of the british people but may can expect some difficult exchange this week when she and senior minister discus the socalled end state of the brexit negotiation for the first time since britain voted to leave the eu in a referendum in june the type of longterm relationship the country should have with the eu is a vexed question at every level in britain including within may s cabinet where some want to keep close tie with the eu and others want a more radical divorce from brussels mindful of the need to keep both side happy may ha so far plotted a careful path may say she want a wideranging free trade deal with the eu and a more outwardlooking trade policy but ha largely steered clear of the more contentious issue such a whether britain should stay aligned with eu trading rule and the future role of european court meeting expected to take place on monday and tuesday are likely to force those issue out into the open one of the key probrexit voice in the cabinet foreign minister boris johnson ha set out his own view ahead of the meeting warning may that britain must avoid becoming subordinate to the eu what we need to do is something new and ambitious which allows zero tariff and frictionless trade but still give u that important freedom to decide our own regulatory framework our own law and do thing in a distinctive way in the future he told the sunday time newspaper he said that mirroring eu law would leave briton asking what is the point of what you have achieved because we would have gone from a member state to a vassal state
Title_Text: brexit will not be derailed say may ahead of crunch cabinet meeting

Text: united nation reuters  un secretarygeneral antonio guterres on wednesday called on authority in myanmar to end violence against the majoritybuddhist country s rohingya muslim and acknowledged the situation there is best described a ethnic cleansing the humanitarian situation in myanmar wa catastrophic guterres said and called on all country to do what they could to supply aid i call on the myanmar authority to suspend military action end the violence uphold the rule of law and recognize the right of return of all those who had to leave the country guterres said at a news conference pressure ha been mounting on myanmar to end violence that ha sent about rohingya muslim fleeing to bangladesh with the united state calling for protection of civilian and bangladesh urging safe zone to enable refugee to go home asked if the situation could be described a ethnic cleansing guterres replied well i would answer your question with another question when onethird of the rohingya population had to flee the country could you find a better word to describe it the secretarygeneral also said he ha spoken to aung san suu kyi myanmar s national leader several time this is a dramatic tragedy people are dying and suffering at horrible number and we need to stop it that is my main concern he said suu kyi canceled a trip to the upcoming un general assembly to deal with the crisis her office said on wednesday the un security council is to meet on wednesday behind closed door for the second time since the crisis erupted british un ambassador matthew rycroft said he hoped there would be a public statement agreed by the council the government of myanmar also known a burma say it security force are fighting rohingya militant behind a surge of violence in rakhine state that began on aug and they are doing all they can to avoid harming civilian the government say about people have been killed in the fighting the latest in the western state the un s top human right official earlier this week denounced myanmar for conducting a cruel military operation against the rohingya branding it a textbook example of ethnic cleansing
Title_Text: un guterres call on myanmar to end violence urge aid

Text: madrid reuters  spanish prime minister mariano rajoy s decision to fire catalonia s government and force a new election is a coup and an attack against democracy the speaker of the catalan parliament said on saturday prime minister rajoy want the parliament of catalonia to stop being a democratic parliament and we will not allow this to happen carme forcadell said in a televised speech this is why we want to send to the citizen of this country a message of firmness and hope we commit today after the most serious attack against the catalan institution since they were restored to the defense of the sovereignty of the parliament of catalonia she said
Title_Text: spain conducting coup in catalonia regional parliament speaker

Text: reuters  donald trumps soninlaw jared kushner informally approached liontree advisor chief executive aryeh bourkoff about setting up a trump tv network after the u presidential election but the investment bank doe not want to be involved according to a person familiar with the matter kushner contacted bourkoff one of the medium industrys top dealmakers in the past few month but there have been no further conversation the source said on monday the source asked not to be identified because the discussion were private there wa no reason given for liontrees reluctance to participate in the process the financial time first reported the liontree talk earlier on monday citing sourcesonftcomdibnrx trump the republican u presidential nominee told the washington post last month he had no interest in a medium company and that report he wa considering setting up one were a false rumor he trail democratic rival hillary clinton in opinion poll ahead of the nov election kushner the owner of the weekly new york observer newspaper is married to trumps daughter ivanka kushner did not respond to request for comment liontree declined comment to set up a television network trump would have to negotiate with cable and satellite carrier which can be an arduous task it can then take year to turn a profit fox news channel the mostwatched u cable network took five year to be profitable it might be easier and less expensive for trump to launch an online streaming service
Title_Text: trump soninlaw held talk to set up trump tv network source
