Text: reuters  u president donald trump ha interviewed several top prospect for the post of chair of the federal reserve a nomination could come within week a the term of current chair janet yellen end in february yellen will meet with trump about the job on thursday for a graphic on the next chair of the federal reserve click tmsnrtrsyqjhi he face a choice between two continuity candidate yellen and governor jerome powell and a clutch of outsider including gary cohn currently his top economic advisor former fed governor kevin warsh and stanford university economics professor john taylor here are short profile of the candidate gary cohn director of the national economic council experience longtime goldman sachs employee and president and chief operating officer of the wall street bank from to education bachelors degree in business american university policy position cohns current job a director of the nec ha given him little reason to comment on monetary policy but he ha worried in the past that the fed ha been constrained by the action of other central bank trying to keep their currency weak in his own word if we woke up tomorrow and every central bank in the world raised their interest rate by percent the world would be a much better place pro to candidacy a practitioners understanding of financial market at a time the fed is attempting to unwind it bond portfolio bought after the financial crisis the trust of the white house and many congressional republican given cohns highprofile role in the trump administration con to candidacy no formal economics background at a time when the fed lean ever more on econometric model to decipher mixed signal in inflation and employment data a decadeslong career at goldman sachs and a personal fortune worth at least  million which could raise eyebrow when it come to confirmation by the senate where member on both side see the investment bank a a symbol of financial industry excess criticism of trump in the wake of charlottesville virginia protest jerome powell federal reserve governor experience lawyer and investment banker partner in private equity firm carlyle group from  senior treasury official under george hw bush fed governor since appointed by president obama education bachelors degree in politics princeton university law degree from georgetown university policy position powell ha never dissented while at the fed and in line with yellen support slowly raising interest rate a long a the economy continues growing and inflation is expected to rise he advocate easing some aspect of the doddfrank regulation and ha discussed way to revise the volcker rule in his own word the committee ha been patient in raising rate and that patience ha paid dividend i would view it a appropriate to continue to gradually raise rates pro to candidacy an uncontroversial pick for the position could be the compromise who both replaces yellen and provides continuity only republican currently on the board of governor ha already helped guide the economy in it recovery and would likely get bipartisan support in congress familiarity with market and financial regulation may be considered a plus con to candidacy a a current fed member identified with the more centrist wing of the republican party may not provide enough of a change if trump decides to replace yellen expertise is less in formal economics and more in market and financial regulation which may seem too much of an overlap with the new vice chair for supervision randal quarles john taylor senior fellow at stanford universitys hoover institution experience undersecretary of treasury for international affair in the george w bush administration from to member of council of economic adviser under president jimmy carter and george h w bush education phd in economics stanford university policy position developer of the eponymous taylor rule for setting interest rate taylor feel the fed should transition to a rulesbased policy in order to make it decisionmaking predictabletransparentaccountable in his own word it is very important to have a basic understanding of the monetary policy strategy the fomc should be required to adopt and explain it monetary strategy and then compare that strategy with monetary policy rule that are out there in a transparent way pro to candidacy a trained economist whose elegantly simple research in the s transformed the debate over how central bank set rate support among key capitol hill republican who feel the fed ha too much discretion well known in central banking circle even if his idea are not universally supported con to candidacy a longterm member of the central banking and academic clique trump may want to disrupt advocacy of rulebased policy may land with a thud in an institution that thrives on consensus and judgment break with yellen and current policy framework could disrupt market if taylor insists on broad reform kevin warsh visiting fellow at stanford universitys hoover institution experience fed governor from to economic adviser to president george w bush from to ma lawyer at morgan stanley for seven year education bachelors degree in public policy stanford university law degree from harvard university policy position warsh feel the fed should not try to finetune the economy and argues policymakers have too much discretion he feel the fed should aim for inflation between and percent effectively lowering it inflation target in his own word we should not accept the feds newfound conviction that a very low neutral equilibrium real shortterm interest rate r is a fixed feature of future monetary policy the central bank and the academic community should engage in a fundamental rethinking of the feds strategy tool governance and communications pro to candidacy former banker and for several year former fed chair ben bernankes righthand man on financial market ha a familiarity with wall street wife jane lauder warsh is a daughter of cosmetic magnate ron lauder a longtime friend of trump served on the presidents economic advisory council before it disbanded con to candidacy may be seen a too hawkish by a president who call himself a low interest rate person not an academic economist like yellen or bernanke but ha still maintained u monetary policy need a full makeover worried about inflation even a the financial crisis hit and quit the fed over it second round of bondbuying a possible black mark against his judgment given the success of the quantitative easing program even while quitting over fed bond buying never dissented on fomc decision janet yellen federal reserve chair experience also served a a fed governor president of the san francisco fed and the feds vice chair from to education phd in economics yale university policy position yellen steered the fed towards gradual rate increase and a slow reduction of it balance sheet dependent on evidence of a continued economic recovery she argues that postcrisis financial regulation ha made the economy more stable without sacrificing growth in her own word my colleague and i may have misjudged the strength of the labor market or even the fundamental force driving inflation how should policy be formulated in the face of such significant uncertainty in my view it strengthens the case for a gradual pace of adjustments pro to candidacy after a career in the fed system and four year a it head ha earned the trust of market and shown she can shift policy without major disruption a growing economy low unemployment and strong stock market make the case for continuity while trump ha said publicly he feel she is doing a good job con to candidacy could be seen a a democratic holdover by a president who may want to put his own stamp on the fed feel the core regulation approved after the financial crisis should remain intact a possible friction with the administrations deregulatory bent some republican leader want the fed to have less discretion over monetary policy an idea yellen resists
Title_Text: factbox who will trump pick to lead the federal reserve

Text: clevelandhershey pa reuters  democrat hillary clinton and republican donald trump battled over the strength of the economy in the final stretch of their race for the white house on friday with clinton praising the latest u job report and trump dismissing it a a fraudulent disaster with four day left in an often bitter contest that ha tightened in the last week each candidate attacked the other a unfit to be president in a late push for vote in battleground state that could decide the outcome in tuesdays election clinton lead trump by percentage point according to a reutersipsos tracking poll released on friday maintaining her advantage in the national survey even a the race tightens in several crucial swing state in the oct nov opinion poll percent of likely voter supported clinton while percent supported trump clinton wrapped up her day of campaigning with a nighttime concert in cleveland headlined by rapper jay z he wa joined by rapper big sean chance the rapper and j cole and by his wife popular singer beyonce a a surprise guest we have unfinished work to do more barrier to break and with your help a glass ceiling to crack once and for all clinton said at the concert at his final rally of the day in pennsylvania trump mocked clinton for her celebrity supporter i am here all by myself just me no guitar no piano no nothing he said earlier in the day at a rally in pittsburgh clinton cited the governments latest job report a evidence of the economys strength the report showed higher wage for worker a well a the creation of job in october and a dip in the unemployment rate to percent from percent i believe our economy is poised to really take off and thrive clinton told the gathering after being introduced by billionaire investor mark cuban when the middle class thrives america thrives trump disputed clintons rosy view telling a crowd in new hampshire that the job report wa an absolute disaster and wa skewed by the large number of people who have stopped looking for job and are no longer in the labor market nobody belief the number anyway the number they put out are phony he said referring to the figure released by the u labor department the economy and the candidates competing vision for the future could be critical in swaying voter in ailing rust belt state like ohio pennsylvania and michigan both candidate made stop in ohio and pennsylvania on friday with trump adding a stop in new hampshire and clinton adding one in michigan each of those state is key in the statebystate quest for the electoral vote needed to win the white house the race ha tightened significantly in the past week a several swing state that are considered mustwins for trump shifted from favoring clinton to tossup according to the reutersipsos state of the nation project the two candidate are now tied in florida and north carolina and clintons lead in michigan ha narrowed so much that the state is too close to call ohio remains a dead heat and clinton ha a slight lead in pennsylvania clinton is still the favorite to win tuesdays election with a clearer path to winning of the electoral college but trump now ha a plausible route to victory especially if there is a sharp fall in turnout among africanamerican from the level of the election trump a new york businessman and former reality tv star ha made a pitch for bluecollar worker who have been angered by freetrade deal and feel abandoned by washington but his protectionist rhetoric  he ha promised to review trade agreement  appears to be having mixed success in the rust belt reutersipsos polling from midoctober found a majority in both ohio and pennsylvania believe that international trade benefit american by keeping the cost of good low although they also think it hurt average americans by depressing wage and causing job loss at home clinton appears to be leading among labor union household in both state the poll found she ha a doubledigit lead with woman in both while trump ha a more modest lead with men among white trump ha a point lead over clinton in ohio and a point lead over clinton in pennsylvania in the final stretch the two candidate continued to paint a dire scenario of life in the united state if their opponent capture the white house trump said the fbis fresh examination of email that may be related to clintons use of a private email server for government work while she wa secretary of state could lead to a constitutional crisis arent we tired of all this stuff he asked america deserves a government that can go to work on day one getoutthevote push clinton suggested the volatile trump who ha feuded with and insulted a wide array of people and group including muslim mexican immigrant and woman wa too unpredictable to trust think about what it would mean to entrust the nuclear code to someone with very thin skin who lash out at anyone who insult him she said clinton ha deployed highprofile supporter to campaign for her in the final day of the long race president barack obama praised her work a his firstterm top diplomat during an appearance in north carolina she wa outstanding in her job she wa loyal to me he said obama is trying to energize africanamerican with whom he is very popular and young people to turn out for clinton the way they did for him in and hispanic group in swing state cranked up their getoutthevote effort for the final stretch of the race on friday hoping to push the contest clintons way
Title_Text: clinton trump clash over economy in final campaign stretch

Text: berlin reuters  the german military need a fifthgeneration replacement for it tornado fighter jet that is hard to detect on enemy radar and can strike target from a great distance the chief of staff of the air force said on wednesday lieutenant general karl muellner s comment are his clearest public statement to date on the tornado replacement program they indicate a preference for lockheed martin corp s f fighter jet the only western aircraft that meet those requirement the air force last month issued a formal request for information about the f a well a three other jet the f and faef both built by boeing co and the european eurofighter typhoon germany is kicking off the process of replacing it tornado jet which will go out of service around the program could be worth billion of euro for the winning bidder in coming year muellner told reuters germany would need to buy an offtheshelf replacement that could enter service around to facilitate a smooth transition with the tornado noting that did not leave enough time to develop a unique solution but he said changing warfare requirement and the need for a credible deterrent meant the successor fighter had to be lowobservable and able to identify and strike target from a great distance it will have to be a fifthgeneration jet to meet the full spectrum of our need muellner said many german ally in europe including norway the netherlands britain italy turkey and denmark have selected the f and some have received initial delivery belgium is expected to make a decision next year lockheed is rolling out the red carpet bringing it f flight simulator to berlin and offering member of parliament ministry and military official and a journalist a chance to fly the stealthy singleseat singleengine fighter it even printed a new version of it standard f lapel pin in the black red and gold color of germany s flag any new fighter jet purchase would have to be approved by parliament in the next two year and a contract signed by or to ensure delivery by a purchase of around jet would help ensure german industry got a decent share of work on the program steve over lockheed s director of f international business development welcomed the comment and said lockheed stood ready to support the german government in it selection process he said most f foreign military sale involved some work for company in the buying country over told reuters the price of the aircraft would have dropped to around  million by the time germany would need to sign a contract he said interest wa growing in the f given the changing threat environment it s really about giving nation a deterrent capability because if you re got the capability to take an airplane into another country s airspace and they don t even know you re there that s an incredible deterrent he said muellner said he also strongly supported a francogerman plan to develop a successor for it fleet of what will be eurofighter typhoon jet built by britain s bae system plc italy s leonardo and airbus the project unveiled in july would help preserve critical technology skill in europe and allow europe to develop it own lowobservable technology muellner said airbus last week said that choosing an interim u fighter that could eventually become a longer term commitment might interfere with the francogerman fighter industry source said a decision to order the f would be negative for airbus which is part of the eurofighter consortium and is seen a one of the key partner in the francogerman initiative announced earlier this year muellner said the german air force had also committed to nato to provide a fleet of electronic warfare aircraft by the middle of the next decade which meant it would likely have to buy around such jet possible candidate could be the boeing ea growler a modified am transport plane that could provide standoff jamming capability or a modified eurofighter expert said no decision on that program have been made
Title_Text: tornado replacement must be fifth generation german air force chief

Text: brussels reuters  european union leader will demand on thursday that north korea end it nuclear and ballistic weapon program according to the draft final statement of an eu summit the statement to be delivered after a discussion among leader on thursday evening will follow the latest eu sanction agreed on monday by foreign minister which go beyond united nation measure leader will tell pyongyang to abandon it nuclear and ballistic missile program in a complete verifiable and irreversible manner the draft said leader will also say they are ready to consider further measure without specifying what they might be diplomat said they could include sanction on noneu country still doing business with pyongyang among other step the european union ha now banned the sale of oil and oil product to north korea although that is largely symbolic aimed at encouraging country that have more significant level of trade with the country to follow suit china and russia have resisted an outright ban on crude export the eu ha imposed a blanket ban on doing business with north korea
Title_Text: eu leader to call for end to north korea weapon program draft

Text: gallup polling recently had donald trump s approval rating at a dismal percent the lowest for any newly inaugurated president in modern american history similarly the poll also had trump s also found that the majority of american do not think he ha the right quality to lead the nation nor do they think he will be good for country however the majority of respondent are somehow optimistic about his presidency and think he will be good for the economy they probably haven t heard about his percent tariff on mexican importstim malloy assistant director of the quinnipiac university poll said stumbling out of the block president donald trump is considered a divider not a uniter flunking on honesty empathy and level headedness while his predecessor see his legacy burnished by better and better number every polling cycle but voter are optimistic in general and confident he will help the economy being unfavorably compared to president obama will no doubt hurt trump s fragile thinskinned egothe american people are not liking what they re seeing from the authoritarianinchief judging by how it s going right now it will only continue to get worse so far trump ha signaled that he ha no desire whatsoever to change his way we re stuck with a factsuppressing executiveorder signing loudmouthed fascist for the foreseeable futurefeatured image by alex wong via getty image
Title_Text: trumps approval rating drop again to new record low

Text: nancy pelosi had another strange moment during her weekly press conference a she wa confused about what time of day it wa struggled to recall her latest accusation against russia just six minute later and again awkwardly stopped speaking midsentence and stared at reporter before resuming classic pelosi a pelosi approached the podium on thursday she muttered to herself on the hot mic it s afternoon it is afternoon good afternoon everyone she then immediately got confused about what time of day it wa thank you for being here i m honored this morning or now afternoon she said she went on to refer to her democratic colleague a the chairman of a committee before correcting herself and calling him the ranking member going off script proved to be a disasterwhile denouncing republican attempt to replace obamacare pelosi said and what doe that mean higher cost fewer benefit uh terrible age tax undermining medicare uh uh stealing from medicare and maidicaid a i should have said mispronouncing the worda statement about medicaid left the listener to wonder what other thing pelosi think are covered by the program a they do this they re making an assault on medicaid which is again very dangerous to child and other living ch thing she said and other living thing haha pelosi then criticized republican on the hacking by russia they hacked our democracy twentyone state local election system were per penetrated six minute later she struggled to remember the accusation oy vey we re finding out thing that we didn t even know before for example wa it how many state have been compromised in all of this twentyone thompson muttered under his breathpelosi muttered twentyone twenty twentyone state all we can say about this is term limit nowread more american mirror
Title_Text: nancy pelosi confused about time is it afternoon and forgets what she said minute beforeterm limit now video

Text: amman reuters  jordan ha begun consultation on convening an emergency meeting of the arab league and the organisation of islamic cooperation before an expected move this week by u president donald trump to recognize jerusalem a israel s capital a senior jordanian source said a senior u administration official said on friday that trump wa likely to make the controversial declaration in a speech on wednesday recognizing jerusalem would upend decade of american policy and possibly inflame tension in the middle east jordan the current president of the arab summit would invite member of the two body to convene if the recognition is extended to discus way of dealing with the consequence of such a decision that raised alarm and concern the senior jordanian diplomatic source told reuters it could ultimately hamper all effort to get the peace process moving and would certainly be provocative to arab and muslim country and muslim community across the west said the source asking not to be named no issue can move arab and muslim in the same potent way a jerusalem doe king abdullah s hashemite dynasty is the custodian of the muslim holy site in jerusalem making amman sensitive to any change of status of the disputed city official are worried the move could trigger violence in the palestinian territory and a spillover into jordan a country where many people are descendant of palestinian refugee whose family left after the creation of israel in a tremendous wave of anger will spread across the arab and muslim world said another regional diplomatic source in touch with u official on the issue tension in jerusalem s al aqsa compound the third holiest site in islam earlier this year provoked day of unrest word of trump s planned announcement which would deviate from the line taken by previous u president who insisted jerusalem s status must be decided in negotiation drew criticism from the palestinian authority the palestinian want east jerusalem a the capital of their future state and the international community doe not recognize israel s claim on all of the city home to site holy to the jewish muslim and christian religion jordan lost east jerusalem and the west bank to israel during the arabisraeli war and say the city s fate should only be decided only at the end of a final settlement king abdullah warned of the repercussion of trump s expected move in talk this week in washington with top administration official trump suggested earlier this year he wa open to new way to achieve middle east peace that did not necessarily entail the creation of a palestinian state a hallmark of u policy for decade if it happens recognition of jerusalem it will jeopardize all effort towards stability and peace in the region and thwart a resolution of the conflict the regional diplomatic source said
Title_Text: jordan begin diplomatic offensive ahead of trump move on jerusalem

Text: aboard air force one reuters  u treasury secretary steven mnuchin said on wednesday he expects president donald trumps tax plan to be considered by congressional committee later this month we have a plan the plans being socialized with members mnuchin told reporter on air force one after trump touted tax reform in a speech in north dakota our expectation is it will be in the committee later this month mnuchin said
Title_Text: mnuchin expects u tax bill to be in congressional committee later this month

Text: long before presidential scandal were a serious a conflict of interest and obstruction of justice conservative had to content themselves with bashing president obama over every small thing however silly naturally those criticism have come back to haunt them a their own new president s bull in a china shop approach to governance mean he doe every single thing conservative once accused obama of doing but worseit s exposed the conservative medium a a clown car overflowing with hypocrite before fbi investigation and russian collusion this is the sort of thing conservative reporter spent week endlessly coveringeven nearly a decade later the comment section on site like breitbart and infowars feature commenters who love to attack president obama for this supposed bow ironically the fact that they can t think up anything better to criticize him for inadvertently highlight how relatively scandalfree obama s presidency wasthat hasn t stopped fox news the network seemed eager to smear obama during it coverage of trump s visit to the middle east in an hilariously halfbaked report on foreign policy fox ran with this headline early into trump s saudi arabian visit ughthat headline becomes extremely awkward when the latest video from trump s visit emerged the man conservative say is an alpha male leader gave a small curtsy after he wa presented with a medal in saudi arabiaunlike obama trump didnt bow he curtsied pictwittercomthajlgw bluepixie bluepixie may what a bold presidential gesture i m sure fox news will cover it with just a much seriousness a they had obama s trip to saudi arabia righthere s another angle that s definitely a curtsytrump once criticized obama for bowing to foreign leader a is customarytrump curtsy instead pictwittercomsoezyiqgx mikel jollett mikeljollett may in trump s defense he is uniquely susceptible to flattery giving trump a medal or praising him are extremely easy way to get him to do what you want in saudi arabia s case the small gold token seems to have been enough to compel trump to rubberstamp a  billion arm deal including weapon obama had withheld from the saudi for fear they would be used in war crime and an additional  billion investment dealand trump got to get a shiny medal a winwinfeatured image via twitter
Title_Text: conservative bashed obama for bowing to saudi trump justcurtsied video

Text: washington reuters  the trump administration said on tuesday it will end a program that shielded young undocumented immigrant from deportation called deferred action for childhood arrival or daca but the administration is phasing the program out instead of ending it immediately here are the detail on how the winddown will happen immigrants who have current daca status can remain on the program until their twoyear work permit expire those whose work permit expire before march can apply to renew those permit for another two year but they must apply to do so before oct in addition u citizenship and immigration service uscis will consider any pending initial or renewal application received by sept a of aug nearly new daca application and nearly renewal request were pending at uscis uscis will reject all daca renewal request filed after oct the structure of the phaseout mean that hundred of thousand of daca recipient will continue to be able to work in the united state legally through proimmigrant advocate had raised concern that immigration enforcement agency will use the data the immigrant provided to target them for deportation official said on tuesday that uscis will not proactively provide a daca recipients information to law enforcement agency unless the individual present a national security or public safety risk nearly daca recipients work permit have expired or will expire between august and december and more than will expire in according to dhs official the administration did not immediately have figure on how many daca recipient will see their work authorization expire between now and march
Title_Text: how the trump administration will wind down protection for dreamer

Text: los angeles reuters  a federal appeal court on monday revived a lawsuit by prospective gun shop owner who were banned by alameda county california from opening within foot of a residential district ruling that local official had failed to justify their law in the face of a constitutional right to bear arm a threemember panel of the ninth u circuit court of appeal did not strike down the local ordinance but voted  to overturn a federal judge who threw the gun store owners lawsuit out of court gun right group quickly hailed the decision a an important protection of the second amendment were very happy to see the court take a very principled and reasoned approach to protecting the fundamental individual right to keep and bear arms brandon comb executive director of the calguns foundation said in a written statement the ninth circuit panel ordered that judge to take up the case again and said that if alameda county wanted to enforce the guncontrol ordinance official there would have to prove that there wa a basis for the restriction alameda countys ordinance may very well be permissible thus far however the county ha failed to justify the burden it ha placed on the right of lawabiding citizen to purchase guns judge diarmuid oscannlain wrote in a page opinion for the majority the second amendment of the u constitution requires something more rigorous than the unsubstantiated assertion offered to the district court oscannlain wrote representative for the alameda county board of supervisor could not immediately be reached for comment in tossing the lawsuit out of court the lowercourt judge found that alameda countys gun restriction were permissible to achieve such important governmental objectives a protecting public safety preserving the character of residential area and guarding against secondary effects of gun store but the ninth circuit majority said that alameda county had not provided any evidence that such objective would be achieved the plaintiff also asserted that no parcel in alameda county would fit within the regulation which meant that gun sale were effectively banned there in dissenting from the majority judge barry silverman said that the ordinance did not infringe upon anyones right to bear arm and that what were dealing with here is a mundane zoning dispute dressed up a a second amendment challenge
Title_Text: appeal court revives challenge to california county gun law

Text: vienna reuters  austria s ruling social democratic party spo is suing foreign minister sebastian kurz the chairman of it junior coalition partner after he accused chancellor christian kern s party of secretly accepting a euro  donation the lawsuit mark a new low in the already strained relationship between the coalition partner who have engaged in public squabble for year poll for parliamentary election scheduled for oct show kurz s conservative people s party ovp ahead of the spo the lawsuit relates to an interview shown on public broadcaster orf on monday in which kurz said industrialist hanspeter haselsteiner a vocal supporter of the probusiness neos party donated euro to the spo via opaque channel the lawsuit filed at vienna s commercial court on friday said the spo s good reputation economic progress and honor wa damaged by kurz s comment a it implied dishonesty the spo want party donation to be capped at euro with a view to the upcoming parliamentary election there is a very concrete danger that the spo will achieve a worse result because of this accusation the lawsuit seen by reuters said the spo said it ha not been offered or received any donation from haselsteiner who is a key shareholder of construction group strabag haselsteiner denied kurz s accusation in newspaper der standard the spo want kurz to publicly retract his comment in an emailed statement the general secretary of kurz s ovp said haselsteiner had donated money to an association that is critical of the ovp and hence indirectly support the spo she said the spo should make all it donation public kurz s spokesman wa not immediately available for comment
Title_Text: austrian chancellor party sue foreign minister ahead of election

Text: when trump began his disinformation campaign and then started trying to muzzle federal agency employee of some of these agency went to twitter to openly defy him they call themselves altgov and there are dozen of these account that are making a point of pushing out the very fact that trump wish would disappear a well a openly fighting his alternative fact and overall disinformation campaign many have been verified by snopes who now keep a running list of trusted altgov accountshowever no matter who they are they are all very clear about the fact that they are not doing this on behalf of their agency they re operating these account independently and are not official u government twitter account and they re dedicated to maintaining the flow of information from the government to the people that we enjoyed under previous administration please note their work doe not appear to include any sensitive information and they appear to be very careful to keep it that waybelow are some of the agency and department where member of altgov work have inside knowledge of or can otherwise speak the truth about what the government is doingthere are also two alternate account dedicated to sending out fact under the name alt sarah h sander altuspresssec and alt alt press sec altaltpresssec in addition to directly and loudly calling out the trump administration on it lie alt alt press sec speaks truth to power for those who block altuspresssec who ha been blocked by none other than trump himself back when sean spicer wa still trump s press secretary altuspresssec tweeted out a short description of what altgov stand forwe are not scientist we are civil servant and federal contractor united for the preservation of democratic norm we support our altgov alt sean spicer altuspresssec january this is an antitrump resistance movement within the united state government that caught on like a wildfire in a forest canopy shortly after he decided to muzzle the department of the interior and the national park service back in january there are also many many supporting account who aren t government but who support the movement and have way to help what we see here is the backbone of the federal government along with concerned contractor and friend telling trump to fuck right the hell off with his alternative fact and muzzling bullshit they will not be silencedfeatured image by andrew harrer via getty image
Title_Text: the united state government ha told trump to go fck himself

Text: you know that wellregulated militia that is mentioned in the second amendment well one of their member just shot the yearold daughter of the group s leader yes the same group of responsible gun owner our friend on the right deem necessary to fend off a tyrannical government can t handle their toy well enough to avoid shooting child they inexplicably bring to target practicethe iii idaho group wa meeting at a local gun range after the group which wa involved in the armed occupation of malheur national wildlife refuge last month decided to enjoy some target practice to blow off the sort of steam one need to blow off after a total defeat at the hand of a tyrannical government according to the president of the group brandon curtis the accident occurred when a member failed to take proper safety precaution while clearing a guncurtiss say the weapon discharged and the bullet ricocheted off a metal table beside a shelter and struck the girl in the stomach the projectile pierced through the girl s abdomen and exited out the other side a true testament to freedom sandra sullivan shared a post from the pacific patriot network containing detail while clearing a weapon there wa an accidental discharge the bullet hit the metal table under the canopy area and then ricocheted where it then struck the year old daughter of sean odie o donahue in the stomach then exiting through her side sullivan s message read i spoke to sean and it sound a if she is going to be ok she wa able to tell him she loved him a they were loading her into the helicopter the post then begs for donation to help the girl rather than for justice the sort that should end with the shooter behind bar for his negligence reminding member that now is not the time to ask for detail the iii idaho group showed up to aid ammon bundy in the occupation of malheur by securing the perimeter but his group s offer wa ultimately rejected by the armed insurgency leader the group also took part in cliven bundy s armed standoff with federal official in something the fbi may want to remember if they consider any additional charge against militantssure these people believe that they are somehow defending freedom by playing cowboy but in the end they are just a group of people who should never touch a gun a group that unfortunately spends most of it time playing cowboy and tyrannythe girl is reportedly recovering from her injuriesfeatured image via facebook
Title_Text: wellregulated militia member shoot yearold girl in stomach during target practice

Text: a cesspool of corruption newt gingrich call out attorney general jeff session he say it s time for session to step up to the plate we couldn t agree morethe latest dirt to come out on the fbisean hannity interviewed greg jarrett judicial watch s tom fitton and the amazing sara carter last night it wa firework on what s being exposedsara carter speaks up at the point but the entire video is well worth watchingwe were told yesterday that the fix wa in in so many way this is beyond corrupt and is blatant criminality by the intel agency hillary clinton and the obama administrationit s worse than you even know tom fitton the fix wa in watered down document clear clintonthe interview below is pretty much what we all knew but now it s out in the open notice how senator johnson call on the doj to actsenator ron johnson told tucker carlson tonight that the corruption in the intel agency is much worse that we thought he belief that the entire investigation into hillary s email wa a sham used to protect her and not investigate her he say the same cast of character is being used to investigate trump scary stufffox news reportswashington newly released document obtained by fox news reveal that thenfbi director james comey s draft statement on the hillary clinton email probe wa edited numerous time before his public announcement in way that seemed to water down the bureau s finding considerablysen ron johnson rwis chairman of the senate homeland security committee sent a letter to the fbi on thursday that show the multiple edits to comey s highly scrutinized statementin an early draft comey said it wa reasonably likely that hostile actor gained access to thensecretary of state hillary clinton s private email account that wa changed later to say the scenario wa merely possible another edit showed language wa changed to describe the action of clinton and her colleague a extremely careless a opposed to grossly negligent this is a key legal distinctionjohnson writing about his concern in a letter thursday to fbi director christopher wray said the original could be read a a finding of criminality in secretary clinton s handling of classified material clinton and abedin strike a deal to take document here s yet another reason to be very suspicious of the obama administration and hillary clintonvia free beacon former secretary of state hillary clinton struck a deal with the state department while serving in the obama administration that allowed her to take ownership of record she did not want made public according to recently released reportsclinton and her thendeputy chief of staff huma abedin were permitted to remove electronic and physical record under a claim they were personal material and unclassified nonrecord material judicial watch made the revelation after filing a foia request with the state department and obtaining a record of the agreementthe newly released document show the deal allowed clinton and abedin to remove document related to particular call and schedule and the record would not be released to the general public under foia abedin for instance wa allowed to remove electronic record and five box of physical file including file labeled muslim engagement document the released record included a list of designated material that would not be released to the general public under foia and were to be released to the secretary with this understanding electronic copy of daily file which are word version of public document and nonrecords speechespress statementsphotos from the website a nonrecord copy of the schedule a non record copy of the call log press clip and agenda of daily activitieselectronic copy of a log of call the secretary made since it is a nonrecord since her official call are logged elsewhere official schedule and official call logelectronic copy of the secretary s call grid which is a running list of call she want to make both personal and official box personal schedule thru prior to the secretary s tenure at the department of state box miscellaneous public schedule during her tenure a flotus and senatorprior to the secretary s tenure at the department of state box personal reimbursable receipt thru box personal photo box personal schedule  sticky finger clintona physical file of the log of the secretary s gift with picture of gift wa also handed over to clinton gift received by government employee is highly regulated and often strictly limited however gift that are motivated by a family relationship or personal friendship may be accepted without limitation
Title_Text: newt gingrich slam dojs session its time for the attorney general to step up to the plate and do his job video

Text: conservative are already praising god for the murder of or more people at an lgbt night club in orlando floridaon saturday night a gunman walked into the club with an assault rifle and began shooting people so far at least are confirmed dead but police say the death toll could be a high a but it didn t take long for republican to merely offer thought and prayer instead of vowing to take action that would make their nra master very angrysome republican however have absolutely no compassion for those who were slaughtered because they are antigay bigot who believe the victim got what they deservedthe following morning after the terrorist attack took place texas lt governor dan patrick posted a vile bible verse on twitter citing galatian which read do not be deceived god cannot be mocked a man reaps what he sow here s an image of the tweet via the houston chroniclein other word patrick think that the people shot and killed at pulse orlando had it coming because they were at a gay night club according to conservative christian like patrick being gay is a sin against god punishable by deathtwitter user immediately blasted patrick for his lack of compassion have you no shame one user wrotetexas democratic party chair gilberto hinojosa also condemned the tweet hate and violence have no place in america he said unfortunately texan in mourning for our family in florida woke up to an embarrassment from their lieutenant governor ltgov dan patrick please apologize immediately make this right we are better than this but patrick ha not apologized nor ha he expressed condolence to the family of those who were killed he merely deleted the postmake no mistake many conservative are cheering this act of terrorism today and they should be ashamed of themselves for itfeatured image youtube

Text: report from the first presidential debateby pj o rourke on monday night presidential candidate donald trump and hillary clinton met for their first headtohead debate what wa the evening s big news deion jones returned a yard interception to score a touchdown and cap the atlanta falcon victory over the new orleans saint  i didn t get to see that though i wa watching the presidential debate so you didn t have to compared with the nfl matchup watching the presidential debate wa like standing on the sideline at a flag football game between a couple of montessori school the only talented player on the field wa nbc anchor lester holt and what holt wa talented at wa piling on trump and making late hit for team hillary the candidate themselves were no good trump ha the gut issue going for him but he can t articulate them well enough to make your reasoning fully agree with the feeling in the pit of your stomach and he ha trouble giving concise and tothepoint example of what he mean trump is too fond of the broad stroke he s trying to paint a detailed picture of what s wrong with american politics while using only a fourinch brush hillary is good with the detail too good detail are all she ha lot and lot of highly detailed little thises and thats like she s furnishing a dollhouse instead of filling the white house hillary kept saying i have a plan it s a phrase that always set off alarm for me people who really have a plan are acting on the plan not standing around saying they have one i have a plan is right up there with hold my beer and watch this who won the debate that assumes it wa a debate it wasn t it wa a tedious rehash of issue that both candidate had already made a hash of this wa interspersed with some namecalling that commentator characterized a heated harsh or even scorching which show what wimp these commentator are none of it would get you punched in the nose on the playground hillary had the best riposte she brought up the notion yet again that donald is someone who shouldn t be allowed anywhere near the nuclear launch code trump that s getting old hillary but good and trump had by far the best line he saved it for the very end hillary ha experience but it s bad experience the winner wa whomever you wanted to win a far a i can tell from clicking around source on the internet the candidate who won wa the candidate that the source in question had already decided to declare victorious it reminded me of soviet judge scoring olympic gymnastics back during the cold war thus the washington post and all it opinion columnist said hillary won ditto for the new york time and in cnn s instant viewer polling of respondent gave the laurel to hillary on the other hand the drudge report s instant polling awarded trump the prize by and charles krauthammer who to my mind is the smartest person on tv called the debate something like a draw did we learn anything from the presidential debate short answer no long answer no and yet the debate turned out to be highly informative if you turned the sound off the event wa broadcast with a split screen so that each candidate wa visible while the other wa talking or to use a technical term blabbing the blab wa dull but the expression on the candidate face were fascinating trump wa serious of mien he wa concentrating intently on what hillary wa saying he sometimes developed a little twitch of annoyance other time he wore a small frown of disagreement but mostly he looked deeply thoughtful and let s be frank this is a man who could stand to do a bit more deep thinking hillary is supposed to have a whole bunch of deep thought concerning her endlessly convoluted plan to fix all the problem under the sun but there she wa thoughtlessly making rude grimace whenever trump spoke mom always said you shouldn t make face because your face may get stuck that way hillary s face got stuck that way she spent the whole evening with a wipethatlookoffyourface look on her face she smirked she sneered she radiated smugness she repeatedly mugged for the camera with a ham actor s pantomime gasp of disbelief except she is no actor it came off like a cheap infomercial for new denture she indulged in nasty smile of condescension she adopted a pout that said what s a smarty like me doing with a dummy like him hillary had an air about her a if she just couldn t believe that somehow oh my gosh she had been dragged up on stage to debate a talking dog hillary had a plan for the debate of course she did hillary ha a plan for everything and she stuck to her plan the plan wa to be utterly dismissive of trump and anyone who back him and to treat every single thing he ha to say with total contempt a i ve said before i m not happy with either of these presidential candidate it s a tough election do you roll the dice with trump or do you let hillary just set the bone down on the table so you crap out again like always i don t care personally if hillary mock trump but i do care personally when the nature of democracy itself is mocked trump is a man who decisively triumphed in the contest for the republican party s presidential nomination and he is a of the latest polling in a dead heat with hillary in the presidential race when hillary doesn t treat trump with any measure of respect for the public support that he ha achieved she isn t insulting him she s insulting american voter if politics in a democracy ha one rule it s don t insult the voter regard pj o rourke

said if my voice ha been true and positive my hope would be that the panel surface problem it frame them it allows u to wrestle with these issue and try to come up with practical solution he saidobama began touting the panel s recommendation in march the report titled president s task force on st century policing report wa published in may the report urge the federal government to federalize police training and practice via the use of federal lawsuit grant and threat to cut federal aid so far obama s deputy have cajoled and sued more than police jurisdiction to adopt federal rule in a slowmotion Text: paris reuters  french president emmanuel macron offered an ambitious vision for european renewal on tuesday calling for the eu to work more closely on defense and immigration and for the euro zone to have it own budget idea he may struggle to implement in a nearly twohour speech delivered two day after the german election in which chancellor angela merkel s conservative cducsu bloc scored it worst result since limiting her freedom to maneuver on europe the yearold french president held little back in term of sweep selfassurance and aspiration but at a time when europe is beset by tension between east and west and battling to overcome nearly a decade of draining economic crisis macron s earnest and at time highbrow discourse ran the risk of falling on deaf ear speaking at the sorbonne he portrayed europe a needing to relaunch itself saying that on issue a diverse a asylum border protection corporate tax intelligence sharing defense and financial stability it needed much deeper cooperation the only path that assures our future is the rebuilding of a europe that is sovereign united and democratic the former investment banker and philosophy student said flanked by a french and a european union flag at the beginning of the next decade europe must have a joint intervention force a common defense budget and a joint doctrine for action in his run for the presidency macron made european reform a central plank of his centrist campaign and he and merkel have spoken frequently about their desire for france and germany the european union s two largest economy and often it engine of change to take the lead on integration but five month into his fiveyear term macron face the threat that merkel and looking to start her fourth term ha less capacity to move than either would have hoped her alliance is still the largest bloc in the bundestag but to build a working majority she will likely have to form a coalition with the green and the liberal free democrat fdp who are opposed to many of macron s idea german foreign minister sigmar gabriel a senior member of the social democrat spd hailed macron s speech a passionate plea against nationalism and for europe he can count on u said gabriel whose party ha ruled out being part of a new grand coalition rather than tailoring his speech to fit the contour of what the fdp the green or merkel may have wanted to hear macron kept his vision broad and farreaching while also detailing some specific idea for an improved euro zone a budget can only go handinhand with strong political leadership led by a common finance minister and a strong parliamentary supervision at the european level he said emphasizing the need for democratic accountability the fiscally conservative fdp dislike the idea of a euro zone budget or any facility that may lead to financial transfer from wealthier euro zone country to poorer one a well a the possibility of national debt being pooled the party ha also called for phasing out europe s esm bailout fund which macron want to turn into a european monetary fund and want to see change to eu treaty that would allow country to leave the euro zone you don t strengthen europe with new pot of money alexander lambsdorff an fdp member in the european parliament said on twitter in reaction to macron s speech in a statement issued by the fdp in berlin lambsdorff said the problem in europe is not a lack of public fund but the lack of reform a euro zone budget would set exactly the wrong incentive not shying away from addressing germany directly even a it try to resolve the fallout from sunday s election macron set an objective that the two country completely integrate their market and corporate rule by we share the same european ambition and i know her commitment to europe he said of merkel i m proposing to germany a new partnership we will not agree on everything not immediately but we will discus everything in berlin on monday merkel said it wa important to move beyond catchphrase and provide detail on how europe could be improved it wa not immediately clear whether macron had managed to go beyond slogan a far a merkel wa concerned but martin selmayr the chief of staff of european commission president jeanclaude juncker said the proposal to reinforce the euro zone would be discussed alongside juncker s own at a euro zone summit planned for december italy s eu affair minister sandro gozi said the speech would inspire european leader into action an excellent speech by emmanuel macron on reviving the european union let s work on this together starting tomorrow at the lyon summit he said referring to a meeting of the italian and french leader to discus industrial policy macron said he hoped his idea would be taken into account in germany s coalition building negotiation those talk are not expected to begin until midoctober and may take several month some had said i should wait for the coalition talk to be concluded macron said adding had he done so the reaction in berlin would have been your proposal are great but it s too late the coalition deal already lay out what will we do on europe for the next four year
Title_Text: after german election france macron paint sweeping vision for europe

Text: just start asking question and the obama administration revers course very interesting the validity of the claim that prisoner don t like pork wa called into question by sen chuck grassley and then the quick reversal on the prison pork ban the obama administration wouldn t be lying haha hummm the obama administration did a rapid uturn on it decision to remove pork product from federal prison after a few question from iowa sen chuck grassleythe federal bureau of prison reversal of the oct menu change come just one week after it spokesman edmond ross said pork wa the lowestrated food among inmate to corroborate the validity of the claim that prisoner indicated a lack of interest in pork product i am requesting copy of the prisoner survey and response that were used to support the determination to no longer serve pork in federal prison the republican senator wrote to the agency on thursday the washington post reported please provide any economic evaluation the bureau of prison ha relied on that detail the cost of pork a compared to beef chicken and nonmeat product such a tofu and soy product pig product were back on the menu within hour of the letter s publicationgrassley also happens to be the chairman of the senate judiciary committee which oversees the federal prison systemread more wnd
Title_Text: prison pork ban we have great news for prisoner but bad news for pig

Text: president trump addressed the america people today a he outlined a new and bold national security strategy the american people are generous you are determined you are brave you are strong and you are wise when the american people speak all of u should listen and just over one year ago you spoke loud and you spoke clear and on november th you voted to make america great again you embraced new leadership and very new strategy and also a glorious new hope that is why we are here today but to seize the opportunity of the future we must first understand the failure of the past america will pursue threat to their source so that jihadist terrorist are stopped before they ever reach our border legal insurrection reports the white house ha unveiled president donald trump s national security strategy it ha four main point protect america promote our prosperity preserve peace through strength and advance our influencebut one of the biggest point is the return of using jihadist and sharia language president barack obama s administration tried to avoidfrom fox news the primary transnational threat american face are from jihadist terrorist and transnational criminal organization the take direct action eliminate terrorist safe haven sever source of strength share responsibility and combat radicalization recruitment in communitiesdavid reaboi at security study group noted another jihad sharia takfir or umma state the june report by the council s countering violent extremism subcommittee the dhs report stated that to avoid a confrontational u versus them stance in public effort to counter islamic radicalization government program should use the term american muslim instead of muslim american the obama administration insisted on this even though isi made it no secret that Text: it wa like garden and gun today for the president and first lady president trump spoke at the national rifle association convention in atlanta georgiaour first lady dedicated a new garden for patient at one of america s leading child s hospitalsshe s really doing such a great job and seems more comfortable in her role a first lady she s really blossomed patient at the child s national medical center will be able to spend time outside in a healing garden while enjoying view of the national mall and washington monument from the the hospital s new rooftopit wa so sweet the first lady worked with the child a they colored a floral coloring sheet with a pink marker and bonded with a little girl who d just had a birthday my birthday wa this wednesday she told the girl the table continued to chat about birthday and mr trump explained that her husband s birthday is in june and that he is yearsold reported cnnthe precious child were laughing and giving melania hug a they sat around the craft tablethe group chatted about their favorite book and singer and after several minute of crafting she thanked them for spending their afternoon with her one of the young patient even gave her the picture she drewthe new bunny mellon healing garden is dedicated to all of america s first lady and named for an american horticulturalist gardener philanthropist and art collector who died in following the festivity the first lady tweeted wonderful opening ceremony today for the new healing garden childrenshealth it will play a vital role in the recovery of extraordinary patient and now we have the bitter left commentingwhile researching on this great event it became clear that the comment on social medium about melania s visit to the hospital were downright rude and totally uncalled forkeep it up democrat it s just more vote for republican read more daily mail

Text: shanghai reuters  china must win it battle against corruption or face being erased by history it new top graft buster said in an editorial on saturday underscoring the ruling communist party s focus on eliminating corrupt behaviour zhao leji appointed to the new sevenmember politburo standing committee last month and tasked to lead president xi jinping s signature war on corruption wrote in the staterun people s daily that failure would lead to the party s downfall if our control of the party is not strong and party governance is not strict then the party won t be able to avoid being erased by history and the historic task the party carry will not be able to be fulfilled zhao wrote xi like others before him ha warned that corruption is so serious it could lead to the end of the party s grip on power xi s corruption fight ha ensnared more than million official at last month s fiveyearly party congress he said it would continue to target both tiger and fly a reference to elite official and ordinary bureaucrat zhao formerly a lowprofile official replaced wang qishan whose sweeping antigraft campaign had made him china s second mostpowerful politician the fact tell u and warn u that the party s position a the top political leader and power is the foundation of our political stability economic development national unity and social stability zhao wrote zhao lead the central commission for discipline inspection ccdi having previously been in charge of the party s powerful organisation department which is in charge of personnel decision he added that there would be no tolerance of people who just do what they want to do and ignore order or carry on with banned behaviour like trying to get around policy decision promotion also needed to be rigorously scrutinised he said a reference to numerous previous scandal where corrupt official had abused their power or taken bribe to promote friend and family member official personal file must be examined and individual report on their personal matter must be verified zhao wrote above all the leadership of the communist party had to be maintained a the last year of history had shown that without the party s leadership there is no way out he added china ha plan for a national supervision law and a new commission next year to oversee the expansion of xi s graft fight
Title_Text: china face historic corruption battle ruling party new graft buster say

Text: reuters  u vice president mike penny and canadian prime minister justin trudeau discussed ongoing trade disagreement between their two country on friday on the sideline of a gathering of u governor president donald trump plan to renegotiate the north american free trade agreement nafta between the united state canada and mexico with talk to begin in midaugust trump feel the two ally and neighbor are taking advantage of lax american trade policy penny and trudeau met on the fringe of the national governor association meeting in providence rhode island on behalf of president trump the vice president recognized the importance of the beneficial u trade and investment relationship with canada while expressing the need to work together to address lingering trade disagreements a white house statement said it added the two leader also expressed their shared commitment to update and modernize nafta through constructive renegotiation
Title_Text: penny trudeau discus uscanada trade disagreement

Text: washington reuters  two leading critic of president barack obamas move toward normal relation with cuba introduced legislation on wednesday seeking to temporarily halt commercial flight between the united state and the island because of security concern republican senator marco rubio and democratic senator robert menendez both cubanamerican opponent of obamas cuba policy introduced the cuban airport security act the measure would stop commercial flight until after a study of security measure and equipment at airport in cuba the u government ha granted several u airline permission to begin scheduled flight to cuba opening another chapter in the obama administrations effort to improve tie and increase trade and travel with the former cold war foe a jetblue airway corp passenger jet flew to santa clara cuba from fort lauderdale florida on aug it wa the first scheduled commercial passenger flight from the united state to cuba in more than half a century commercial flight to the capital havana are expected to begin later this year obamas cuba policy sharply divide the u congress opponent mostly republican but also a few democrat say he is moving too quickly to ease restriction on travel and trade given continuing human right violation by it communist government backer say it is time to try another tactic in dealing with havana after more than half a century with no change under the previous policy a version of the bill wa introduced in the house of representative in july there ha been no announcement of when the measure might come up for a vote
Title_Text: u lawmaker want moratorium on commercial flight to cuba

Text: beijing reuters  china on monday criticized a visit by indian president ram nath kovind to the remote state of arunachal pradesh which china claim saying china opposed any activity by indian leader in disputed area the latest row over arunachal pradesh suggests the asian giant remain far apart despite recent attempt to defuse tension over a region that china claim a southern tibet the indian president went over the weekend inaugurating a new state assembly building for india the state is where the sun first rise  being it easternmost region  each day and from here light is spread across the country he said in a speech to the state assembly he also remarked on several step taken by the federal government to advance the state s transport link speaking at a daily news briefing in beijing chinese foreign ministry spokesman lu kang said that china had never recognized arunachal pradesh but that china s position on the border issue wa clear which wa to seek a solution both could accept via talk before the border issue is resolved both side should jointly work hard to protect the peace and tranquility of the border region china resolutely opposes indian leader activity in disputed region lu said sinoindia tie are at an important stage in development and china hope india doe not do anything to complicate the border issue but should instead create condition for border talk and the healthy stable development of relation he added china and india have tried to develop twoways tie in recent year but there is still deep distrust over the border dispute in april china slammed india s decision to host tibetan spiritual leader the dalai lama in the same region saying it could cause serious damage to relation
Title_Text: china upset a indian president visit disputed border region

Text: phnom penh reuters  cambodian prime minister hun sen vowed to extend his more than year in power by at least another decade on wednesday week after the highest court dissolved the main opposition party ahead of a general election the cambodia national rescue party cnrp wa dissolved in november at the request of hun sen s government signaling what one right group called the death knell for democracy in the southeast asian country hun sen a former khmer rouge cadre who defected from the genocidal group and helped drive it from power in is credited with helping cambodia achieve economic growth but ha also been criticized for his crackdown on civil society group and the medium china cambodia s biggest backer ha said it support the government s attempt to maintain cambodia s national security at a speech given to thousand of garment worker on wednesday at a pagoda on the outskirt of phnom penh hun sen said he would stay in power for another two term and asked worker to vote for his cambodian people s party cpp i will continue to be the elected prime minister for another two mandate which is not less than year hun sen said i hope that you a well a your parent and grandparent if they are alive and your family continue to vote to support cpp on july garment are cambodia s biggest export by far and garment worker are a politically powerful group in garment export were worth  billion and reached  billion in the first seven month of hun sen ha been courting garment worker ahead of the vote he ha promised money for female worker who give birth among other thing you have to remember that if you want to keep job you should not give opportunity to anyone including cambodian and foreigner to destroy peace hun sen said concern about the impact of next year s election and competition from lowercost asian rival will slow the growth of cambodia s garment industry next year the main manufacturer group said earlier this month
Title_Text: cambodia hun sen vow to stay in power for at least another year

Text: sen harry reid is calling for fbi director james comey to be investigated after friday revealed bombshell after bombshell regarding russia s interference in the u election reid put the head of the fbi on blast saturday morning following the release of a secret cia assessment that concluded russia had meddled in the presidential election with the intent of helping to get donald trump into the oval office i think comey should be investigated by the senate he should be investigated by other agency of the government including the security agency reid told msnbc you look at the account we have just in the press the last few day it stunning stunning the conclusion reached by the press thank goodness we ve got them still around this is not fake news okay he addedthe cia report found that russia had hacked the dnc a well a the rnc however we all know whose information made it onto wikileaks and whose didn t this tidbit of information lends credence to the theory of u intelligence agency who believe that russia interfered for one reason to get trump electedreid is convinced that comey knew russia wa screwing around with the presidential election but chose to withhold this information from the american public until after election day i am so disappointed in comey he ha let the country down for partisan purpose reid added calling for the fbi director to step downreid also took the opportunity to praise sen lindsey graham for his effort to lead an investigation into russia s election meddling i believe lindsey graham is a voice of concern reid saidgraham along with sen john mccain is heading up effort to launch a wideranging probe into russia s hacking and interference president obama ha also ordered a full review of russian interference in november s election which is to be completed before he leaf office in januarywatch more on reid s call for an investigation into comey heresenatorreid say fbi director james comey should be investigated in wake of cia revelation retweet agree amjoy httpstcoxuthtoofz am joy wjoy reid amjoyshow december featured image via alex wonggetty image
Title_Text: harry reid call for fbi head to be investigated following russian bombshell

Text: believe or not moderate do exist in the republican party to those of u on the left they hardly seem moderate but they certainly aren t like say the ted cruz s of the world in the house of representative they even have a name they call themselves the tuesday group and since donald trump took office it ha been republican from that group who have been pushing back the hardest on trump s more extreme and cruel policy to that end it should come a no surprise that trump s band of troll in his base are threatening the people in the tuesday group with primary challenge in at the top of the trump troll list of target is tuesday group cochair charlie dent rpa they re letting rep dent know that his day are numbered in the most public of way by holding a huge event where they blasted their warning to him from a park in allentown pennsylvania adam gingrich who give political advice to hard right politician said to dent you re gonna get primaried this particular rally is just the beginning these people seem to be ready to primary anyone who ha been critical of trump and his agenda from the right there s just one problem with that though they don t seem to understand some of these district in a place like pennsylvania ted cruzstyle policy will not fly these people have to be more moderate than say member of the ultra conservative freedom caucus or they don t get elected and reelected there s that and the fact that most of them seem to at least be attempting to appear reasonable despite these fact though word ha leaked out that trump himself went after rep dent in a private rant saying that dent is destroying the republican party so a they are likely to do the trump troll came out in force on friday in order to back their orange man up northampton county gop chairwoman gloria lee snover said of rep dent i looked charlie dent in the eye and i saw the swamp in time past i ve supported charlie dent a the only alternative but now with his disregard and disrespect to my president i will no longer be able to support congressman dent for the first time we finally are going to have primary challenger we can get behind so in other word fall in lockstep with trump or get out rep dent to his credit is pushing back though he say of the situation i have repeatedly made it clear that on issue such a reforming the va making the regulatory environment more reasonable improving america s infrastructure providing necessary funding to help meet the need of our military and spurring economic growth i will work constructively and supportively with president trump at the same time i am not a sycophant if the president errs on issue that are important to the people of the th or for the entire country i will continue to state my opinion respectfully and civilly the best part of this is that it could be a huge gift to democrat pennsylvania is a swing state that until always went blue therefore the idea of a hard right conservative being elected there is pretty out there we can t rule it out of course but if the gop spends all of it time fighting with itself and the democrat unify around one candidate we winget it together democrat here are a whole bunch of seat we could possibly win simply because trump troll can t abide a gop lawmaker who isn t licking trump s boot featured image via chip somodevillagetty image
Title_Text: trump troll turn on gop moderate youre gonna get primaried

Text: strasbourg reuters  the european parliament named it press room in strasbourg after daphne caruana galizia the maltese journalist killed last month in a car bomb after year of reporting allegation of deeprooted corruption on the island on a day when the eu legislature debated a broadly supported resolution questioning the rule of law in malta and demanding answer on allegation of highlevel money laundering made by caruana galizia the ceremony underlined the pressure the union s smallest state ha found itself under since her oct murder in the auditorium used for news conference in parliament s strasbourg seat the new name above the door would parliament president antonio tajani said ensure that from now on we will not turn our eye away from what happened in malta at the parliament s other home in brussels the press room is named after anna politkovskaya the russian investigative journalist shot dead in her apartment block in moscow in in a killing opposition leader blamed on the kremlin maltese prime minister joseph muscat who had sued caruana galizia and one of her son for libel over allegation of graft ha vowed to track down her killer and insists that the maltese state is fully compliant with eu standard peter caruana galizia the dead journalist s husband said during the naming ceremony in strasbourg in the presence of other family member that malta s political elite had deep and wide link to money laundering network and the country had slipped further and further away from european value
Title_Text: eu parliament name press room after murdered maltese journalist

Text: los angeles reuters  democratic presidential candidate hillary clinton ha hired two people with close tie to u organized labor to try to lock down support from union member a republican candidate donald trump make courting workingclass voter central to his campaign the two new staffer lori dorazio and michele gilliam are to be deputy labor campaign director according to a campaign aide dorazio is moving to the campaign from the biggest u labor federation the aflcio gilliam is a former staffer for senator bernie sander of vermont who wa clintons fiercest primary competitor clinton and sander battled fiercely over union support during the democratic primary with clinton the presumptive nominee ultimately securing the bulk of the national endorsement from labor union but she will need to harness the ontheground manpower of union in crucial battleground state ahead of novembers general election matchup with the populist presumptive republican nominee trump the aide said the campaign is counting on dorazio and gilliam to do just that although organized labor is a traditionally democratic constituency trump ha made a play to win over rankandfile union member by criticizing international trade deal such a the pending trans pacific partnership which labor opposes even so aflcio president richard trumka warned last month when the federation endorsed clinton that a trump presidency would be disastrous for u worker and vowed to mobilize the groups resource to defeat him the aflcio is the largest u federation of labor union that collectively represent more than million worker before joining the aflcio dorazio worked for another large u union the united auto worker and gilliam once served a an organizer for a local chapter of the transport worker union
Title_Text: clinton snag aflcio official former sander staffer in labor outreach
