Text: tripoli reuters  the united nation plan to move up to illegal migrant from libya next year a senior un official said on tuesday in a bid to relieve the plight of thousand stranded in deteriorating condition in detention center there libya is the main departure point for migrant fleeing poverty or war to reach europe by boat a smuggler exploit turmoil gripping the country since the overthrow of muammar gaddafi illegal migrant arrival in italy have fallen by twothirds since july from the same period last year since the unbacked government in tripoli italy s partner cut back human smuggling at one major hub italy also help in the libyan coast guard s operation but activist say the push ha led to worsening of condition in detention center where human right watch and other group say migrant face overcrowding abuse lack of medical facility and a shortage of food the un is repatriating migrant to african country willing to take them back but it wa also in talk with european country and canada to take in some refugee roberto mignone chief mission of the un refugee agency said this week we are going to send out of libya refugee until the end of january we will send out at least he told reuters in an interview in we are planning to send out of libya between to refugee we give priority to woman child elderly disabled person who suffered very seriously a total of had been registered a refugee and asylum seeker in libya he said libyan official deny abuse and say they are simply overwhelmed by a surge in arrival amid little fund to accommodate them a public finance have been hit by a loss of oil revenue the issue of repatriation ha got higher attention abroad since cnn published a video showing what it said wa an auction of men offered to libyan buyer a farmhand and sold for  in november libya s unbacked government said it wa investigating the report and promised to bring the perpetrator to justice but it ha struggled to make an impact a the country is effect controlled by armed faction
Title_Text: un to move migrant from libya in

Text: ben carson who wa once one of the more promising republican presidential candidate before his insanity and outlandish remark ruined his campaign is sounding more and more like frontrunner donald trump a the day go byin an interview with andrea mitchell on msnbc the former candidate and loyal trump supporter complained about the republican national committee rnc convention rule a predictable move considering how much trump himself ha been whining about them ever since he lost every single colorado delegate to his rival texas senator ted cruzmitchell appropriately brought up the discussion reminding the retired neurosurgeon that the rnc had been rather transparent about their nominating process and that those rule had been in place for quite a while mitchell pressed carson the rule surrounding the delegate selection have been clearly laid out in every state and territory and while each state is different each process is easy to understand for those willing to learn it take note donald trump is the p unspoken let s keep in mind that trump ha no one to blame but himself for not being prepared and he made it easy for cruz to win the state yet trump s team and his supporter are still cry foul and carson ha been jumping on every bandwagon ever since trump bribed him with a job in return for his endorsement and unwavering loyalty in trying to criticize the guideline carson made a startling comparison between the gop s nominating rule and jim crow law implying that the delegate process really wa crooked and rigged against trump carson said during the jim crow era those were the rule too they were written everybody knew about them didn t make them right and i m not saying this is the same but you know i think you get the point just because rule are there just because they re written by somebody doesn t mean that they re right it doesn t mean you can t review the system there s some thing we need to look at from a historical perspective why do we need the electoral college anymore stop and ask yourself why wa that put in place and do some same circumstance apply actually they do not we need to look at a lot of different thing you can watch carson make this idiotic comment belowfor carson to compare trump s completely fair colorado loss to what africanamerican were forced to endure under jim crow is absolutely despicable and yet it might a well be expected of trump and anyone who support him carson isn t the only one to make this jim crow comparison another one of trump s diehard fan alex jones also attacked the delegate selection process in a similar manner jones said that colorado s selection process make jim crow look like a blessing featured image via alex wong getty image
Title_Text: ben carson really just compared gops nominating rule to jim crow era law video

Text: london reuters  british prime minister theresa may appointed lawmaker julian smith a her new chief whip on thursday promoting him to head the office which is responsible for making sure may s conservative vote in support of the government smith had previously been a deputy chief whip he replaces gavin williamson who wa earlier appointed a defense minister the government said lawmaker esther mcvey would take on smith s former role
Title_Text: british pm may appoints julian smith a chief whip statement

Text: there s a lot being said about football player across the nfl standing together in unity against police brutality this is even more pertinent now a even more black men have been gunned down in the street just this week by policeusing his press conference to bring further awareness to this topic wa none other than seattle seahawks star cornerback richard sherman he said i m not going to answer any question today and it s no offense to you guy but the state of thing in the world today is very interesting i think you have player that are trying to take a stand and be aware of social issue and try to make a stand and increase people s awareness and put a spotlight on it and they re being ignored whether they re taking a knee or whether they re locking arm you know they re trying to bring people together and united them for a cause and i think that the last couple day a couple more guy have gotten shot and killed in the middle of the street and more video have come out of guy getting killed and i think people are still missing the pointthe reason these guy are kneeling the reason we re locking arm is to bring people together to make people aware that this is not right you know it s not right for people to get killed in the street sherman then explains how he s been proactive in the community and even needing to go so far a to train young people of color on how to behave with the police but still being fearful that they might get shot he say that s an unfortunate time to be living especially when people are being killed for no reasonhe then ha some choice word by those who are supposedly offended by those standing up against police brutality by quietly using their first amendment right of dissent and protest to bring awareness to the plight sherman say when a guy take a knee you can ignore it you can say he s not being patriotic he s not honoring the flag i m doing none of those thing i m saying straight up this is wrong and we need to do something and something most certainly need to be done and done nowwatch sherman speak herewow this is a mustwatchseattle seahawks richard sherman address police killing of african american men at presser then walk out pictwittercomgoaosgufax kyle griffin kylegriffin september featured image via video screen capture
Title_Text: seahawks richard sherman drop the mic on those who ignore police brutality video

Text: rome reuters  the figure jumping from a small boat into the clear shallow water and running ashore on an italian beach look like troop practicing a ddaystyle landing but this is no drill and these are not soldier the image caught on camera show what ha become a increasingly common sight on the beach of italy s southern island  migrant from africa landing in broad daylight in the past these boat came at night said claudio lombardo the local head of the mareamico friend of the sea environmental group who filmed the scene on a beach near agrigento in sicily on wednesday morning when they came at night all you saw wa the abandoned boat on the beach the next day and the people were nowhere to be found and that s why we called them ghost boat the change in tactic by people smuggler come a the number of arrival from libya  long the busiest route for migrant from africa trying to reach the european union  have plummeted since departure from the coastal city of sabratha were stopped by a shadowy armed group this summer a libyan departure slumped wooden boat from neighboring tunisia have started landing on secluded sicilian beach often in broad daylight while tourist are out sunbathing an official leading the investigation into the arrival told reuters some migrant mostly men have come from tunisia in the past two month with between  landing on the south coast of sicily and the rest on the smaller island of lampedusa or linosa said the local investigator who spoke on condition of anonymity it is still fewer than the libyan arrival which totaled well over over the past two month but such number have not been seen since tunisia s arab spring revolution in and said lombardo whose priority is to protect beach from damage caused by the abandoned boat and belonging those who reached the smaller island have almost all been identified by police while between to percent of those who made it to sicily vanished without trace the official said almost all are tunisian and some had already been expelled from italy in the past the investigator said the agrigento court is looking to see if smuggler pick them up upon arrival in italy we re more concerned about the one who try to flee because perhaps they could have problem with the law either in tunisia or italy he said a for the orso filmed by lombardo they climbed up into the dry hill beyond the beach and headed inland discarding tshirt and shoe they have a kit with them which is a bag with a change of clothes and bottle of water and milk lombardo said within minute they disappear they re gone police pick up many found walking along road the investigator said on thursday one young tunisian man wa killed by a car in a hitandrun near agrigento while some of the boat are big enough to make the more than km mile crossing from tunisia some are very small raising question about how they got there we have not excluded the existence of mother ship the investigator said referring to large fishing boat used in the past to ferry migrant close to the coast before putting them onto smaller boat for the last leg of the voyage
Title_Text: ghost boat drop tunisian migrant onto sunny italian tourist beach

Text: here s something not everybody know about vanity fair s graydon carter once called donald trump a shortfingered vulgarian in an article ever since that time trump ha sent him odd little letter defending his small hand digit whatever you want to call themyou d think trump doe this kind of thing for more publicity there s always that inkling of possibility but not so in this case say mr carterhere he is in his own word describing how much it bother trump and the length trump ha gone to dismiss the writer s claim just to drive him a little bit crazy i took to referring to him a a shortfingered vulgarian in the page of spy magazine that wa more than a quarter of a century ago to this day i receive the occasional envelope from trump there is always a photo of him generally a tear sheet from a magazine on all of them he ha circled his hand in gold sharpie in a valiant effort to highlight the length of his finger i almost feel sorry for the poor fellow because to me the finger still look abnormally stubby the most recent offering arrived earlier this year before his decision to go after the republican presidential nomination like the other package this one included a circled hand and the word also written in gold sharpie see not so short i sent the picture back by return mail with a note attached saying actually quite short which i can only assume gave him fit now the internet is finally catching on and in this day in age of social medium twitter facebook and internet meme to boot the combination is quite hysterical there s even an entire page on twitter devoted to making fun of trump s finger called you guessed it trumpfingersbut trumpfingers isn t the only one getting in on the action a simple search on twitter of trump finger or trump small hand will display all sort of result a if the internet didn t already have enough meme mocking trump now there s more on a different subject matter entirelypic via twitterpic via twitterpic via twitterpic via twitterpic via twitterpic via twitterpic via twitterpic via twitterpic via wikimediait sound silly once you think about it but the fact that it bother trump is even sillier no one want to worsen any further trump s apparent body dysmorphic disorder but nobody said politics wa easy if trump wa even halfway a nice to muslim at his rally a they are to him we might lay off of it but guy like him don t deserve any remorse from usif everybody show up to vote this november you can rest assured donald trump will never get the privilege of holding up his shortfingered vulgarian hand to administer the oath of office of president let s make sure that doesn t happenfeatured image via facebook
Title_Text: theres one thing trump is more sensitive about than his hair  and its hilarious image

Text: on thursday morning donald trump did the unthinkable he canceled an interview with one of his biggest cheerleader sean hannity trump had been scheduled to appear on the fox host s show thursday night but a spokeswoman for the network say the donald will not be showing upthis announcement come in the wake of pussygate trump s mid s admission that he love that he can get away with grabbing woman by the pussy because he s rich a well a revelation that he barged into dressing room to creep on model some a young a year old his admission that he thought paris hilton wa hot when she wa audio of him hitting on a yearold surfacing and his upcoming child rape caseapparently mr trump doesn t think even sean hannity a joke of a man who ha done nothing but pitch underhand to trump the entire election season can find kid glove to fit this situationthings are not looking good for trump lately with his poll number in a nosedive since everyone learned about his special handshake while it is gratifying to see the republican party and even some of trump s formerly vocal supporter running away from him it is frightening that it is only happening now the gop is fine with islamophobia racism his open courting of white supremacist his constant attack on woman because of their look and weight his desire to build a wall to keep brown people out of the country muslim concentration camp his incessant remark about banging his daughter the child rape allegation and his love of welldone steak at one point it seemed like trump wa right when he said he could shoot someone and not lose a single supporterapparently groping wa the linefeatured image via getty imagesjoe raedle
Title_Text: trump terrified of losing now hes even running away from sean hannity detail

Text: presidential election are won by wellprepared well organized multimillion dollar effort that are executed at the state level some of the best model of this have been president bush s campaign in and president obama s campaign in and what need to be done and how it should be done are known by seasoned campaign operative and candidate who put the people in place to make it happendonald trump s presidential campaign and the republican party s planning to help his campaign in multiple state that are key to winning are a complete disaster with only four month to go until the election according to a new report from the associated presswith early voting beginning in less than three month in some state the review reveals that the national gop ha delivered only a fraction of the ground force detailed in discussion with state leader earlier in the year and that is leaving anxious local official waiting for reinforcement to keep pace with democrat hillary clinton in the state that matter most in the republican party s massive failure get even worse when you zoom in to swing state a the associated press hassome example of republican shortfall ohio republican thought they were going to see paid staffer by may in reality there are about plan for pennsylvania called for paid staffer there are about iowa s planned ground force of by may actually number between and in colorado recent staff departure have left about two dozen employee far short of the that were to have been in placeap even found that trump s headquarters in florida one of the most important state in the fight for the electoral college wa closed and it voice mailbox full florida ha electoral vote and in wa decided by a margin of percent on the ground organizing is key to winning itthese failure at the state organizing level don t even take into account the massive disparity in campaign advertising between clinton and trump while she ha been pumping out ad in important state like ohio pennsylvania florida colorado and new mexico along with super pac that support her trump hasn t been advertising at all in mitt romney s campaign wa outspent by president obama but he wa actually spending money trump isn t spending on much besides many of his own entity who showed up a campaign vendorsrepublicans especially in derided president obama s background a a community organizer but they could do with one right now to organize for their candidate in the community he need in order to have a chance at winning that doesn t seem to be happeningfeatured image via flickr
Title_Text: bombshell report show gop presidential campaign a complete disaster in multiple state

Text: it s become clearer than ever that republican don t care about woman they also don t care about freedom one iota and they most certainly don t care about woman s freedom to affordable and accessible reproductive health care this ha become more clear than ever especially in florida and because it s florida it s become a circus of the absurdin a recently passed bill that will be signed by gov rick scott r it basically strip all funding from planned parenthood because really why should woman have access to affordable care however republican tout the same old fictitious line that planned parenthood is just an abortion clinic so it doesn t deserve to be funded let s be clear though even if it were only an abortion clinic it still deserves funding because abortion is legal and it a woman s right to make her own medical decisionshere s the most obscene part of the whole bill though you know besides stripping freedom away from hundred of thousand of female floridian the list of alternative clinic for woman to receive reproductive healthaccording to the tampa bay time antichoice advocate want that money to be spent in other kind of clinic like crisis pregnancy center and federally qualified health center what are those other federally qualified health center well according to the guardian several state lawmaker who have insisted that plentiful alternative exist for reproductive and sexual healthcare have cited a list of health center that includes dentist optometrist and elementary school when the cosponsor of the bill colleen burton wa asked about these alternative resource alternative resource for birth control pap smear breast exam and other reproductive service she answered we have federally qualified health center the county have health department physician office independent clinic would be eligible if they applied and met the requirement fellow state lawmaker lori berman pressed further saying i have seen the list of the group and some of those group include podiatrist correctional facility healthcare schoolbased healthcare clinic proponent of the bill insist there are ample number of alternative where woman can go to receive the care that they need but that s a false narrative considering most of the place are in no way capable of providing woman s health servicesit s absolutely reprehensible that republican are playing politics with woman s life like this all because they know defunding planned parenthood play to their base of idiotic voter who don t even know what it is and rely on the lie being spread by rightwing mediawe need to stop allowing woman s life to be controlled by politician and ironically the same politician who come from a party that boast it s chefd oeuvre is perpetuating freedom to all which clearly is a lieplanned parenthood is an integral part of community health and family planning defunding it not only hurt the woman and men who need their service but also entire communitiesfeatured image via flickr
Title_Text: here are the absurd alternatives florida now ha for woman instead of planned parenthood

Text: washington reuters  u representative adam schiff the top democrat on the house intelligence committee said on monday it wa not known whether any american helped russia in an alleged hacking campaign aimed at swaying the nov election in donald trumps favor we do not yet know whether the russian had the help of u citizen including people associated with the trump campaign schiff said at a congressional hearing on possible russian intervention in the election it is no crime for trump or his associate to have tie to russia he added on the other hand if the trump campaign or anybody associated with it aided or abetted the russian it would not only be a serious crime it would also represent one of the most shocking betrayal of our democracy in history he said
Title_Text: top democrat say not clear if american helped russian in election hack

Text: london reuters  british prime minister theresa may said on monday the government would maintain it commitment to protecting europe after brexit a she accused russia of military aggression and meddling in election the prime minister said britain would continue to provide assistance to state that were victim of aggression the uk will remain unconditionally committed to maintaining europe s security may said in a speech at the guildhall in london s financial district the comprehensive new economic partnership we seek will underpin our shared commitment to open economy and free society in the face of those who seek to undermine them the british government is playing one it strongest card in the brexit negotiation by offering to put it defense and security asset at the disposal of the eu in the hope of winning concession on future trading and economic relation the country ha bigger defense budget than any other eu member state and it diplomatic and intelligence service are among the most extensive in europe it government also argues it is one of the leading eu contributor to a range of security measure such a data and evidence sharing extradition measure and to the eu s police agency europol may on monday accused russia of fomenting violence in eastern ukraine of repeatedly violating the national airspace of several european country and mounting a campaign of cyber attack she also accused russia of meddling in election and hacking the danish defense ministry the german parliament and it statemedia of planting fake story and photoshopped image in an attempt to undermine western institution may said the government is working to reform nato so it is better placed to counter russian hostility and ha stepped up military and economic support to ukraine we will take the necessary action to counter russian activity she said may also said she wanted better relation with russia if it worked to promote peace russia can and i hope one day will choose this different path she said but for a long a russia doe not we will act together to protect our interest and the international order on which they depend
Title_Text: british pm may pledge to protect europe from russian threat

Text: van jones humiliated them so badly that one guy actually changed his opinion of himduring the rnc convention last week van jones wa approached by a trio of trump supporter including altright department the only thing you see in ferguson and this is where my heart break the only thing you see in ferguson is that there wa a protest about a case that later turned out to be a false situation and yet the same department also who you already said wa credible came out and said that there wa massive widespread abuse of the black population which is part of why they believed what wa going on and yet with that i don t see the same level of concern it is much worse to me to hear that a whole police department ha been giving extra ticket to a community that s terrible than if somebody wa wrong about some protest and when shroyer accused van jones of being antipolice because he support black life matter jones masterfully explained what the blm movement is all about in a single sentence i believe in law and order i just want the police to obey the law too i don t want anyone going to a funeral black or blue in the end shroyer wa forced to change his opinion of van jones and went from hating him to having a growing respect for himhere s the video via youtubeand that s how you take down a rightwing trollfeatured image screenshot
Title_Text: watch van jones put racist trump supporter in their place during street confrontation

Text: juba reuters  a south sudanese army commander on trial for his role in an attack on aid worker ha been found dead in military custody an army spokesman said on friday the attack by soldier at the terrain hotel in the capital juba wa one of the worst on aid worker since south sudan plunged into civil war in the rape of five foreigner and murder of their local colleague occurred on july a president salva kiir s troop won a threeday battle in juba over opposition force loyal to exvice president riek machar lt col luka akechak wa found dead last weekend army spokesman santo domic chol told reuters on friday chol said akechak had fallen sick some week ago and received medical treatment in juba but did not recover the military custody told u that the man wa found dead in the morning akechak wa the unit commander at the hotel on the day of the attack and is one of more than a dozen south sudanese soldier standing trial in a military court the army spokesman said that in the last hearing one of the rape survivor who testified said she witnessed akechak directing the soldier to raid property at the hotel the next hearing in the trial is scheduled for wednesday lawyer philip manyang who is representing survivor of the attack in court told reuters that survivor would be testifying by video conference in a closed session
Title_Text: south sudan commander on trial for rape murder of aid worker found dead

Text: washington reuters  the republicancontrolled u house of representative will start drafting legislation to overhaul the nations tax code after lawmakers upcoming summer recess house speaker paul ryan said on wednesday the budget thats going through congress now is just the budget its not the actual tax reform bill thats something that will be written in the fall ryan said in an interview with wisconsinbased wbelam radios the stan milam show
Title_Text: house to write tax reform bill this fall house speaker

Text: it can likely be said that iowa is one of the whitest state in the entire nation so white in fact that it seems many of the people in the state haven t come into too much contact with any people of color to notice that no they don t all look the same proof of this can be found in triumph the insult comic dog s ben carson social experiment according to hulu triumph go to iowa to discover if white people tell the difference between snl comic tim meadow and presidential candidate ben carson spoiler alert not so much in fact the people who meadow came into contact with while dressed a carson really didn t seem to notice the difference between the men whatsoever he spoke with several people at a local diner some who even seemed very excited to finally be meeting who they though wa carsonmeadows wa so convincing that he wa able to persuade one of the folk at the diner to stab him in the belt buckle just like from the infamous fable carson had told time and time again from his childhood however this time meadow made it seem like he wa actually stabbed and left the diner in a hurry to go to the hospital by the end of the segment the snl alum even had an entire arena full of people fooled a he sang the star spangled banner before a basketball gameall in all it seems a though far too many people in iowa can t tell the difference between carson and just any random black man which is sad yet somehow not at all surprising featured image youtube
Title_Text: iowa voter couldnt tell the difference between ben carson and a black comedian video

Text: washington reuters  when johnathan smith resigned from the u justice department on inauguration day he looked forward to spending time with his infant son but that plan unraveled a week later when president donald trump unveiled his explosive foreign travel ban within two week smith had a new job a legal director of civil right group muslim advocate and wa drafting brief for a successful court challenge to the ban joining other former top obama administration lawyer now fighting trump it is not surprising that smith and some of his colleague political appointee of democratic president barack obama would leave the justice department now led by republican what is unusual is how fast they have signed up to be trump adversary some republican lawyer say they were less hasty in moving into oppositional role postelection george terwilliger a senior justice department official under president george hw bush described the obama lawyers action a unprecedented to my memory  and really bad form one reason for the obama lawyers quick move some of them said wa trumps aggressive use of executive authority from day one which wa guaranteed to attract court challenge obama faced legal fight over executive power and some of his challenger were formerly lawyer for president george w bush over issue such a immigration and obamacare but those came later in obamas presidency besides smith other lawyer who have jumped into the fray include former attorney general eric holder who is advising californias legislature on challenging trump over immigration environmental regulation and healthcare and former acting solicitor general neal katyal who is helping hawaii contest trumps revised travel ban influential manhattan prosecutor preet bharara and another obamaera u attorney are out of job after the trump administration asked them to resign on friday many of the obama lawyer keep in touch but reject the notion proffered by some republican that obama is behind resistance effort some of the lawyer credit their rapid transition to trumps hardline position on key issue and to ethical concern about his presidency and business interest theres a unique threat to our democracy and constitution that we see in the assault the president is mounting on the muslim community said smith who worked on religious discrimination issue at the justice department norman eisen who wa obamas top ethic lawyer and later ambassador to the czech republic had expected to focus on his work at a think tank after trumps election but instead he said the ethic emergency of constitutional dimension ha galvanized me back into my initial obama role eisen is now also chairing citizen for responsibility and ethic in washington a watchdog group he cofounded the group ha already sued trump over alleged ethic violation other obama appointee taking on trump include former white house lawyer ian bassin who ha founded united to protect democracy a new group probing trump over ethic and james cadogan who worked with smith at the justice department and is now at the naacp legal defense and education fund a civil right group already clashing with the new administration some career government lawyer who are not political appointee and normally do not resign in power shift have also resigned to oppose trump one is sharon mcgowan who worked on lgbt issue at the justice department on inauguration day she wa offered a job a director of strategy at lambda legal an lgbt advocacy group mcgowan said she decided to leave justice when trump named jeff session a hardline conservative alabama senator to be attorney general that wa a gamechanger she said i knew there would be no chance for me to preserve what ive been working on so hard
Title_Text: obama lawyer move fast to join fight against trump

Text: just when everyone thought the crazy fat kid couldn t get any crazier this ha to be the funniest thing we ve seen in a long time don t think about asking your barber for the kim jong un in north koreanorth korean can choose between sanctioned hairdo none of which appear to include their leader s signature sweptback styletwitter user mika m kel inen share an image board with different snappy style men are allowed to choose from when they visit their barber in n koreanorth korean men can choose between approved haircut style i had the most popular one and it not like kim jong un ylemaailmalla pictwittercombvdcrgqgr mika m kel inen mikareport april because nothing say trendy like this handsome devil s hairstyle equality in north korea both sex have approved haircut model you can forget about dyeing your hair though reporter mika m kel inen tweetedthe north korean leader and hair icon reportedly first started wearing his hair in the voluminous style a a nod to his grandfather kim ilsung nyp

Text: a it turn out year old hillary cinton used to hear her grandparent talk about the immigrant experience when she wa a young girl so she just thought they were immigrant mission accomplished no more clarification is necessaryon wednesday in iowa hillary clinton invented three immigrant grandparent to push for more foreign worker all my grandparent you know came over here and you know my grandfather went to work in lace mill in scranton pennsylvania and worked there until he retired at she reportedly said so i sit here and i think well you re talking about the second third generation that s me that s you but according to a buzzfeed report three of her grandparent were born in the united state while her paternal grandfather wa an immigrant from england last year clinton also falsely claimed that her paternal grandmother hanna jones rodham immigrated with her family a a young girl to scranton a buzzfeed noted according to census record hanna jones rodham clinton s paternal grandmother the wife of hugh rodham sr wa born in pennsylvania in according to the census while her paternal grandfather hugh rodham sr wa born in england and immigrated with his parent a a child clinton s maternal grandparent were both born in illinois according to census recordsa clinton spokesperson told buzzfeed that clinton s grandparent always spoke about the immigrant experience and a a result she ha always thought of them a immigrant a ha been correctly pointed out while her grandfather wa an immigrant it appears that hillary s grandmother wa born shortly after her parent and sibling arrived in the u in the early s he addedclinton invented her immigrant grandparent while pushing for more foreign worker which may not resonate with the everyday american who have not recovered from the recession and are trying to move up the economic ladder we are turning down people who really want to work i mean they are here to work and a lot of them now have child who are american citizen and they are doing the best they can to try to make a good life for themselves and their family she reportedly said at a campaign event at capital city fruit and we are saying to all these other people who want the same dream and the same aspiration and the willingness to work hard just like our family did that no we re not going to make it easy for you we re not going to make it legal for you and i just think that s such a short term unfortunate outcome for u and well a for them via breitbart news
Title_Text: flashback hillary court illegal alien vote by lying about her three immigrant grandparent

Text: washington reuters  u president barack obama will travel to poland and spain next month to attend the nato summit including a bilateral meeting with polish president andrzej duda to discus security issue the white house said on monday obama will attend his last nato summit in warsaw from july to july the white house said in a statement he then travel to meet with leader in spain a nato ally from july to july it said
Title_Text: obama to visit poland spain in nato summit trip in july white house

Text: paris reuters  french bank societe generale on wednesday rejected the farright national front s accusation that it had acted to suffocate the party by closing account societe generale group s decision on whether to open or close a bank account depend purely on banking reason and in respect of all regulatory requirement without taking into account any political consideration it said in a statement regarding the opening of an account at credit du nord a financial representative of front national asked the bank of france for the right to have a bank account a an individual credit du nord responded to the bank of france s requirement and offered the service required within the right s regulatory framework credit du nord is part of the french retail banking network of socgen
Title_Text: socgen say no wrongdoing in handling of national front account

Text: newport news va reuters  president donald trump said on thursday he want a u military buildup of more ship and plane to project american power in distant lands making his case for a proposed  billion increase in defense spending that ha u lawmaker squabbling wearing an olive military jacket and hat aboard a new aircraft carrier the gerald r ford in newport news virginia trump said he wanted the u military to have the finest equipment in the world trump this week proposed a  billion increase over last year in defense spending boosting the pentagon budget to  billion and said he wanted to launch the biggest military buildup in american history to make up for what he called a depleted armed force some republican lawmaker want more money for defense and others along with democrat are opposed to his option for offsetting the cost of the buildup in the u budget he would cut foreign aid and other nondefense program by  billion trump said he would like to get the u navy back up to having aircraft carrier the navy currently ha i just spoke with navy and industry leader and have discussed my plan to undertake a major expansion of our entire navy fleet including the aircraftcarrier navy we need trump said receiving applause we also need more aircraft modernized capability and greater force levels he said additionally we must vastly improve our cyber capabilities there are question about how the increase in the budget will be spread across the different service branch and which weapon program will get priority during the campaign trump said he would increase the armys troop strength and increase the number of ship in the navy to from about ship the timeline and the exact cost of the buildup is unclear trump said the navy will soon be the largest its been the u navy peaked at ship in at the end of world war two and by it still had ship even though the ship now are more advanced and capable we are going to have very soon the finest equipment in the world he said we will give our military the tool you need to prevent war and if required to fight war and only do one thing you know what that is win win trump said the gerald r ford and other new ship project american power in distant lands hopefully its power we dont have to use but if we do theyre in big big trouble he said
Title_Text: trump say want defense buildup to project u power abroad

Text: lima reuters  peruvian president pedro pablo kuczynski s political trouble will likely continue despite his surprise victory over a bid in congress to oust him this week a key opposition leader said on saturday citing ongoing graft probe and opposing demand from ally jose chlimper secretary general of the rightwing popular force said his party could eventually emerge stronger from this week s political crisis despite failing to garner enough vote in the member congress to remove kuczynski from office for u having lawmaker wa an asset but also a liability because whatever congress did wa our fault chlimper told reuters in a rare interview the party which grew out of the populist movement of imprisoned expresident alberto fujimori sought to remove kuczynski from office this week over business link he once denied having to a company at the center of a massive graft scandal ten popular force lawmaker broke rank to keep a presidential vacancy motion from succeeding chlimper called the defection a painful betrayal but said the rest of popular force lawmaker have reaffirmed their commitment to staying in the party and voting a a bloc kuczynski on the other hand could see the crossparty alliance that defended him this week evaporate going forward said chlimper i don t see how he can come out stronger he said chlimper said kuczynski lured the rebel popular force lawmaker with a promise to free their movement s political leader fujimori from prison  an accusation denied by kuczynski s government the dissident faction wa led by fujimori s youngest son kenji who ha challenged his sister keiko s leadership of their father s following and who could receive a boost if the oncepopular patriarch is released from prison kuczynski would lose the support of fujimori s leftleaning foe if he make good on the deal to secure the elder fujimori s release said chlimper in coming day the left may have achieved what fujimori s supporter have been unable to a pardon for fujimori chlimper said at the same time ongoing probe in congress and in the attorney general s and comptroller s office threaten to implicate kuczynski in new allegation of wrongdoing he added his ally are going to have to explain themselves for the document that will keep coming out said chlimper this isn t a picture it s a video and we re going to keep seeing the scenery change in coming week and month chlimper said
Title_Text: peru opposition leader skeptical president victory will last

Text: the obama trifecta a muslim an illegal alien and a victim of the unfair law of the united state that target minority an illegal migrant who wa convicted in wisconsin of sexually molesting the body of a dead girl is seeking to have his conviction on sexual violence charge overturned by claiming that a dead body can t be sexually assaulted because it cannot be forced or coerced into a sex actthe vibrantly diverse migrant eusebio variblegaspar wa convicted in wisconsin of a violent sexual act a well a entering the country illegally and wa given a month sentencehis lawyer have now filed a motion to have the conviction reversed because they say a corpse can t be raped or sexually abusedthe trial court disagreed with that claim and held that variblegaspar committed an act of sexual violence by having sex with the dead bodyit is this decision that variblegaspar want to have appealed so on january he filed this claimvariblegaspar argues that the district court erred in applying the level enhancement for a crime of violence he contends that his wisconsin conviction for first degree sexual assault of a child doe not qualify a a crime of violence or a an aggravated felony because the offense doe not fall within the generic contemporary meaning of sexual abuse of a minor variblegaspar asserts that an individual may be guilty of the wisconsin offense if the offender had sexual contact or sexual intercourse with a corpse for the first time on appeal variblegaspar argues that the conviction doe not qualify a a forcible sex offense because a corpse cannot be forced or coerced into sexoddly a the center for immigration study note this isn t the only case where migrant might benefit from someone else being deadobama s dhs is seeking a change in rule that would aid illegals entering the country to have their status legalized if their return would have harmed someone they left behind even if that someone is already dead via breitbart news
Title_Text: muslim illegal alien claim sex with dead girl is not a crimelawyers fight to have charge dropped

Text: istanbul reuters  turkish president tayyip erdogan on saturday batted back an apology from the nato military alliance after his name appeared on an enemy poster at a drill saying such disrespectful behavior could not be so easily forgiven you have seen the disrespectful behavior at the nato drill yesterday there are some mistake that are done not by fool but only by base people erdogan said in a speech broadcast live on television this matter cannot be covered over with a simple apology he said erdogan said on friday that turkey wa pulling soldier out of a nato exercise in norway after his name appeared in a list of enemy on a poster at the drill nato and oslo have since apologized
Title_Text: turkey erdogan rebuff nato apology over enemy poster

Text: on trump s birthday the washington post published an explosive story alleging that the fbi under mueller s direction wa currently investigating trump for obstruction of justice for his treatment of former fbi director james comeythe special counsel overseeing the investigation into russia s role in the election is interviewing senior intelligence official a part of a widening probe that now includes an examination of whether president trump attempted to obstruct justice official saidthe move by special counsel robert s mueller iii to investigate trump s conduct mark a major turning point in the nearly yearold fbi investigation which until recently focused on russian meddling during the presidential campaign and on whether there wa any coordination between the trump campaign and the kremlin investigator have also been looking for any evidence of possible financial crime among trump associate official saidtrump ha no one to blame for this new line of inquiry but himself in testimony his staff hasn t even bothered denying comey noted that trump once asked everyone to leave the room before directly asking the fbi director if he could find a way to drop the russia investigation then trump fired comey when the investigation continued then he went into an interview with nbc s lester holt and explicitly admitted that he fired comey because he wouldn t stop investigating his connection to russiarather than make his problem go away firing comey and trump s subsequent confession seem to have triggered a new investigation this time in his attempt to obstruct justice by interrupting the investigative processdespite the avalanche of evidence against him trump s team had a painfully predictable response to accuse the washington post of lying in the hour after publishing trump staff and friend repeatedly claimed there wa no investigation into trump they screamed fake news the chairwoman of the rnc went further claiming mueller had smeared trump with unfounded accusation hint mueller hasn t even commented publicly yet and an investigation isn t an accusation muellers unfounded accusation against potus change nothing there still no proof of obstruction of justice httpstcogypcfdyj ronna romneymcdaniel gopchairwoman june then trump woke up and promptly confirmed it wa realthey made up a phony collusion with the russian story found zero proof so now they go for obstruction of justice on the phony story nice donald j trump realdonaldtrump june the they here appears to be the investigator looking into trump the yearold man throwing a temper tantrum on twitter seemed to reinforce that when his followup tweet included an attack on the investigator themselvesyou are witnessing the single greatest witch hunt in american political history led by some very bad and conflicted people maga donald j trump realdonaldtrump june saying conflicted people wa the tell trump s team latest attack on mueller a pretext to firing him some might say is that he ha a conflict of interest in the case it s never clearly articulated what that conflict of interest is trump ha repeatedly implicated himself in wrongdoing despite his staff s best effort in hushed tone white house aide are telling reporter that they are furious with the president who they say is completely to blame for this endless investigation trump may be really good at getting into trouble but he is terrible at getting out of itin his rage and panic he s managed to step on every rake in the yard how long before he find a way to say he is totally guilty in character or lessfeatured image via chip somodevillagetty image
Title_Text: ranting trump accidentally confirms he is under investigation after staff claimed it wa fake news

Text: washington reuters  president donald trump would oppose any unilateral declaration that would undermine japans administration of disputed island in the east china sea a senior u official said on thursday ahead of trumps meeting with japanese prime minister shinzo abe the official said in a conference call with reporter that any discussion about sovereignty of the island wa not expected to be addressed in the talk on friday at the white house there have been longstanding tension between china and japan over what japan considers their territorial water in the east china sea including island known a the senkaku in japan and the diaoyu in china the official said any discussion about allegation of currency manipulation on the part of japan is not at the top of trumps list for the talk but did not rule out the issue could come up informally after meeting in washington abe and trump were scheduled to travel to palm beach florida to stay at trumps maralago retreat and play golf on saturday the u official said any discussion on trumps strategy toward north koreas nuclear program is premature but urged pyongyang not to take provocative action any such action would help inform trumps strategy the official said a for a letter that trump sent to chinese president xi jingping on wednesday the official said it included a message that trump look forward to discussing with xi issue of mutual cooperation and wellknown differences
Title_Text: trump opposes undermining japan control of disputed island u official

Text: trump supporter are furious after a member of the choir took a courageous standdonald trump and his team have been desperately searching for talent to perform at his inauguration on january th with very little success so far they have a former america s got talent contestant to sing the national anthem and the mormon tabernacle choirof course mormon voted for trump despite claiming that they opposed him throughout the campaign even bill maher applauded the mormon church a the only religious organization that seemed to not want to vote for someone hypocritical to their faith but they did anyway a utah went for trump on election daythe rockettes are being forced to dance at the inauguration a well which set off a firestorm among the member because trump is a creepy pervert and sexual predatorand for one member of the mormon tabernacle choir looking at herself in the mirror every morning wa getting more and more difficult so after much thought and prayer she announced that she is resigning rather than sing for a tyrantin a facebook post jan chamberlin courageously explained why she had to quit the choir she love after five yearssince the announcement i have spent several sleepless night and day in turmoil and agony i have reflected carefully on both side of the issue prayed a lot talked with family and friend and searched my soul i ve tried to tell myself that by not going to the inauguration that i would be able to stay in choir for all the other good reason i have highly valued the mission of the choir to be good will ambassador for christ to share beautiful music and to give hope inspiration and comfort to others i ve tried to tell myself that it will be alright and that i can continue in good conscience before god and man but it s no use i simply cannot continue with the recent turn of event i could never look myself in the mirror again with self respect i also know looking from the outside in it will appear that choir is endorsing tyranny and fascism by singing for this man she continuedand choir s wonderful image and networking will be severely damaged and that many good people throughout this land and throughout the world already do and will continue to feel betrayed i believe hereafter our message will not be believed by many that have loved u and adored what we have stood for i know that i too feel betrayed tyranny is now on our doorstep it ha been sneaking it way into our life through stealth now it will burst into our home through storm i hope that we and many others will work together with greater dilligence and awareness to calmly and bravely work together to defend our freedom and our right for our family our friend and our fellow citizenschamberlin went on to note that her father wa distraught over the holocaust and that her parent despised tyranny she see history repeating itself and warned that we need to educate ourselves and fight back before it s too latei only know i could never throw rose to hitler and i certainly could never sing for him much love to you all i wish you all blessing and happiness my heart is shattered and broken but my conscience is clear and that really is all that matterspredictably trump supporter lashed out at chamberlini bet all of these bully hated president obama for the last eight year and cheered on the republican obstructionism and utter disrespect they showed him yet they have the gall to accuse chamberlin of not being a true christian sadthe other member of the choir should follow this brave woman s leadfeatured image via screenshot
Title_Text: mormon tabernacle choir singer quits because singing for trump would be like singing for hitler

Text: reuters  u president donald trump signed an executive order on tuesday allowing the dakota access pipeline to go forward after month of protest from native american group and climate activist pushed the obama administration to ask for additional environmental review for the controversial project the u army corp of engineer in december turned down the request for an easement for the dakota access pipeline to build under the missouri river most of the pipeline ha been constructed already with the short stretch under the missouri river remaining unbuilt the following is a timeline of the project december energy transfer partner lp applies to the north dakota public service commission to build a mile km barrelperday pipeline to deliver crude oil from north dakotas bakken shale field to patoka illinois crossing south dakota and iowa kicking off a year of public hearing in north dakota january north dakota regulator approve the pipeline unanimously april u army corp of engineer hold a hearing for native american on the pipeline july the u army corp of engineer approves three easement for water crossing for the pipeline at sakakawea the mississippi river and lake oahe which is an ancestral site for the standing rock sioux tribe july the standing rock sioux tribe sue the army corp of engineer in u district court for the district of columbia citing violation of multiple federal statute that authorize the pipelines construction and operation and seek an emergency order to halt construction the tribe also alleges the pipeline threatens their environmental and economic wellbeing and would damage and destroy site of historic religious and cultural significance the sioux tribe say because the pipeline go underneath lake oahe approximately half a mile upstream of the tribes reservation leak from the pipeline would be directly in the tribes ancestral land sept private security guard hired by energy transfer partner use attack dog and mace after violence erupted at a private construction site along the pipeline route six people are reportedly bitten by dog a scene captured on video and broadcast widely sept brian cladoosby president of the national congress of american indian which represents more than tribe speaks to nearly a dozen of president barack obamas cabinetlevel adviser at a sept meeting of the white houses threeyearold native american affair council cladoosby delivers an impassioned request stand with native american who have united with the standing rock sioux tribe and block construction of the dakota access pipeline sept u district judge james boasberg in washington reject a broad request from native american to block the project but herules that no construction activity on the dakota access may take place between highway and mile to the east of lake oahe construction activity to the west of highway may proceed the tribe appeal the decision sept less than an hour after boasbergs decision the u justice and interior department and army make an unprecedented move and order a stop to construction near lake oahe until the army corp of engineer review it previous decision and decides if it need to conduct a fuller environmental and cultural review sept energy transfer partner tell employee in a letter provided to medium that it is committed to completing the project citing that the pipeline is percent complete and that it ha already spent  billion so far on equipment material and the workforce oct the u court of appeal of the district of columbia circuit say an administrative injunction related to the emergency motion of the standing rock tribe would be dissolved citing that dakota access ha right to construct on private land up to lake oahe oct environmental activist across four state disrupt the flow of million of barrel of crude from canada into the united state in a rare coordinate action that target several key pipeline simultaneously the protest group the climate direct action say their move is in support of the standing rock sioux tribe a a safety precaution company operating the pipeline shut off section of the line for several hour while they investigate oct governmenttogovernment tribal consultation begin across six region on how federal government decisionmaking on infrastructure project could better include tribal concern nov energy transfer partner say it ha built the pipe to the edge of lake oahe and reiterates it intention to complete the project nov following the surprise victory of donald trump in the u presidential election climate activist and the standing rock sioux say they still hope president obama will be able to kill the pipeline definitively analyst say the line is more than likely to go through nov the u government in a joint notice issued by the department of the interior and the army corp of engineer delay a final decision on permitting they say the permit had followed all legal requirement but more consultation with native american tribe is needed nov energy transfer partners ceo kelcy warren tell the associated press that the pipeline would not be rerouted nov about activist gather on a bridge between the camp protest and the construction path law enforcement officer respond by using tear gas and water cannon on them in freezing temperature nov the u army corp of engineer tell protester they need to leave the oceti sakowin camp the primary protest camp located on federal land by dec they later say they have no plan to enforce this order nov north dakota governor jack dalrymple issue an evacuation order for the oceti sakowin camp citing harsh weather on the way official the next day tell reuters they plan on blockading the camp so supply cannot get in they later back off that plan and say they may just issue fine but retreat from that idea a well nov a group of u veteran announce they will bring more than service member to north dakota to stand a human shield between the protester and law enforcement they begin arriving over the next several day dec the u army corp of engineer denies energy transfer partners request for an easement to run under lake oahe sparking a celebration amongst protester etp say it will continue to fight for the line the incoming trump administration ha said it support dakota access along with other pipeline project jan the army corp say it will publish a notice in the federal register stating it intent to prepare an environmental impact statement for the easement at lake oahe etp file a motion asking a court to bar the action in an effort to move the pipeline forward jan president trump who previously owned stock in energy transfer partner sign an order aimed at moving the pipeline along with an unrelated pipeline keystone xl to go forward
Title_Text: factbox dakota access pipeline long journey

Text: the following statement were posted to the verified twitter account of u president donald trump realdonaldtrump and potus the opinion expressed are his own reuters ha not edited the statement or confirmed their accuracy realdonaldtrump  the weak illegal immigration policy of the obama admin allowed bad m gang to form in city across u we are removing them fast est  i will be interviewed on foxandfriends by ainsleyearhardt starting at am enjoy est  source link bitlyjbhlu bitlyjpexyr
Title_Text: factbox trump on twitter april  obama administration interview

Text: london reuters  british prime minister theresa may will meet former u president bill clinton on thursday morning to discus the political crisis in northern ireland may s spokesman said during his time a president clinton played a central role in brokering peace in the british province where a powersharing administration collapsed in january and opposing side have since been unable to break the political deadlock clinton traveled to belfast this week to meet political party and try to break the impasse he and the pm wanted to take this opportunity to discus northern ireland may s spokesman said obviously work is ongoing in trying to reach a solution and to get the compromise that are necessary to get the devolved administration up and running again he added earlier the british government minister for the province said the chance of reaching a deal there were not positive the meeting with clinton is due to take place at gmt in may s downing street office
Title_Text: uk may to meet bill clinton to discus northern ireland crisis

Text: wow this guy deserves a medal of honor for his act of superhuman strength and courage an israeli man attacked by a palestinian tuesday allegedly pulled his assailant s knife from his own neck and then proceeded to kill the attackerthe yearold israeli wa apparently collecting money for charity at a store in the suburb of petah tikva at the time he wa assaulted after receiving several wound to the neck and upper body in what police described a a frenzied attack he removed the attacker s knife from his own body and together with the store owner used the knife on the attackerthe man is currently hospitalized in moderate condition the store owner received no injury israeli police confirmed that the incident wa a terrorist attack countering earlier report that it may have been the result of an altercationnati ostri a paramedic who helped treat the victim said he wa found on the floor of the store before being transferred to a local hospital via daily caller
Title_Text: badass israeli stabbed by palestinianpulls knife from neckwhat he did next is stunning

Text: kampala reuters  uganda is launching a drive against online pornography that critic condemn a a diversion from deeper problem of graft unemployment and crumbling social service facing president yoweri museveni the campaign is the latest salvo in a culture war between conservative fighting what they see a foreign moral influence promoting criminality and a more liberal often younger population this is an invasion it s western culture said simon lokodo a yearold catholic priest who serf a minister of ethic and integrity over consumption of pornography the consequence are very dire he told reuters this week the government had released billion shilling  to his office to combat online pornography some money would go to pornographyblocking software he said some ugandan expressed anger at the cost of the ban saying it served only to divert public attention from failure of president museveni s government critic of museveni who ha ruled for year say he presides over widespread corruption and human right abuse parliament is considering a removing a constitutional age cap to allow museveni to serve longer he is also widely considered to be grooming his son a presidential adviser and the former commander of an elite military unit to succeed him andrew karamagi a right activist and lawyer in kampala said he could not understand government obsession with what people watch who sleep with whom how and when while it struggled to fund social service such a hospital and school uganda s only radiotherapy machine broke down last year and hasn t been replaced due to funding shortage drug shortage are common in public hospital where and in dilapidated public school poorlypaid teacher often don t show up for class the regime doe not have the moral authority to combat pornography karamagi said they are themselves an obscenity
Title_Text: uganda in antionline pornography drive seen by critic a diversion

Text: chicago reuters  democrat from pennsylvanias congressional delegation sent a letter to a federal rail regulator on monday raising concern over the possible negative impact of a merger between canadian pacific and norfolk southern corp the letter sent to the surface transportation board raised concern over the impact it could have on railroad job in pennsylvania and said the merger could lead to disinvestment in rail infrastructure in the state senator bob casey and five member of the u house of representative all democrat also wrote that they were deeply concerned about the voting trust structure canadian pacific ha proposed in it bid for the no u railroad the canadian company in midnovember disclosed it  billion offer to buy the norfolk virginiabased railroad norfolk southern ha rejected canadian pacifics advance setting the stage for a possible proxy battle the surface transportation board would have to review a merger of the two railroad which would be a test case since the regulator rewrote the rule for approving takeover in the review process would include public hearing where rail customer labor group and elected official would be allowed to weigh in in their letter the pennsylvania democrat wrote that they believe the acquisition could hurt thousand of rail shipper manufacturer and local community a well a rail worker in the state and urged a thorough review of any proposed merger canadian pacific ha said that a takeover of norfolk southern would lead to  billion in annual saving in early january two senior democrat in the u house of representative urged the board to reject any merger of canadian pacific and norfolk southern a number of industry group and rail customer plus a couple of the union representing worker at norfolk southern have also come out against any merger last week the board posted letter from some rail customer who argue that on the contrary a merger of canadian pacific and norfolk southern would create a transcontinental railroad that would result in better service
Title_Text: pennsylvania democrat raise concern over cps norfolk southern bid
